apps.title: Wellness At Your Side
apps.description:
REQUIRES a WebMD Health Services account through your employer or health plan.

Take charge of your well-being with Wellness At Your Side. The WebMD app lets you access your well-being wherever you are. We made it easier to find what you’re looking for and make progress on your health.

This app integrates with the Health app.

———

WHAT’S NEW:

 • Personalized experience:  —  Tell us your interests and we’ll build the experience around you. Get a custom action plan based on your Health Assessment, health screening results and other information.

 • Apple Health Kit:  —  Sync steps from Apple Health Kit to your personal health record. Automatically track steps in team challenges with coworkers.

 • Simplified navigation:  —  It’s now easier to move between sections like Interests, Conditions, Rewards, Benefits, Health Coaching, and more.

 • Content Hub:  —  Level up your knowledge with educational health and wellness content.

———

Our most popular features haven’t changed:

 • Health Assessment:  —  An easy way to find out which areas of your health you might want to focus on. 

 • Daily Habits:  —  Guided plans to help you get support in areas that matter to you.

 • Rewards:  —  Earn rewards like gift cards, extra time off, health insurance discounts, and more!

 • Health Coaching:  —  Free, confidential and friendly health coaches help you be the best version of yourself.

 • Sync your data:  —  Automatically sync data from your smart devices.

 • Team-based wellness challenges:  —  Engage in a little friendly competition with friends and coworkers.

———

KEEP IN MIND
Wellness At Your Side requires a qualified WebMD Health Services account. Some features described above may not be available in your well-being program. Ask your benefits administrator if you have any questions about the app or your program.

apps.title: Habit Tracker
apps.description:
Habit Tracker: A simple daily planner to schedule and track your routine, making it easy to build lasting habits. 
Join 15M+ happy users, achieve your goals, and make every day count!
More than a self-care companion, it lets you share with others to grow and improve together. 

----Useful Features----

Sync with Apple Health: Track water intake, steps, sleep, exercise, and calories to seamlessly monitor your wellness journey.  

Build & Quit Habits: Create positive routines or break free from bad habits with tailored tracking.

Flexible Goal Tracking: Measure progress with specific units (e.g., minutes, glasses of water), not just checkmarks.  

Group Habits: Stay motivated by building, reminding, and tracking habits with friends or loved ones.  

Insightful Stats: Get detailed analytics to evaluate and celebrate your progress.  

Habit Reports: Weekly, monthly, and yearly reports to visualize your growth.  

Mood Tracking: Monitor your mental wellness to stay balanced and mindful.  

Smart Reminders: Set time- or location-based reminders to stay on track effortlessly.

Multiple Reminders: Add as many reminders as needed for any habit.  

Custom Sounds: Record or import unique reminder sounds for a personal touch.  

Widgets for Easy Access: Use Home Screen & Lock Screen to log habits instantly without opening the app.

HRV Stress Monitor: Track your heart rate variability (HRV) to measure stress levels and gain insights into your well-being

Habit Diary: Jot down notes to reflect on your journey in a personal habit memo.  

Focus Timer: Stay focused with natural sounds & create a calming, distraction-free environment

Cloud Sync: Back up and sync your data across devices for seamless access.  

Daily Inspiration: Enjoy motivational wallpapers and quotes to keep you inspired.  

Privacy Protection: Secure your data with FaceID or TouchID.  

Friendly Competition: Compete with friends to see who’s crushing their habits.  

ADHD Planner: ADHD friendly plans built-in to help.

Dark Mode: Sleek design for a comfortable experience, day or night.  

Habit Tracker helps you simplify your daily routine, clear your mind, stay on track with your goals, and build a better life.
Download now! Perfect for ADHD users, this app simplifies planning and tracking to help you stay focused, build routines, and thrive with ease.



NOTE: Habit reads data for some habits from Apple Health app (Steps, energy, walking, running ..etc). No data is being sent outside of your device. Health app access required.

EULA: https://www.eulatemplate.com/live.php?token=MRcYNs6U8BXMLSDWG0BzEqLPPtL2Vc46

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- optimize for iOS 26
- fix syncing between iPhone & iPad
In app setting - more setting, you can change check-in method between swipe or tap
---------------------------------
If you have widget issues, restart your iPhone then add it again
If you have any questions, you can contact us at [IG: Tiny Useful Apps or davetech.app@gmail.com]

apps.title: Mindbody: Fitness & Wellness
apps.description:
Mindbody is the world’s #1 booking platform for fitness, beauty, and wellness experiences. We encourage people to try new things and find what makes them feel physically, mentally, and spiritually their best.  
Whether it’s a class, salon service, or meditation session, we’ve got options.  
 
With over 40k+ studios around the world, we offer top fitness classes like yoga, Pilates, barre, dance, HIIT, bootcamp, and more. Looking for something along the lines of a massage, hair treatment, or cryotherapy? We’ve got that too. Plus, you’ll find promoted intro offers and last-minute deals—it’s all on the app. 
 
How it works: 
* Download the free app, then create a Mindbody account (or log in to your existing account) to get started. 
* Enter your location at the top of the screen to see local intro offers, price drops, and deals near you.  
* Looking for something in particular? Jump to the “SEARCH” icon at the bottom of the window to find businesses near you. From there, you can type in the desired service or browse popular categories. 
* Need to refine your results? Filter your search by business, class, date, time, distance, or category. You can also sort based on what’s recommended, top-rated or closest to you. 
* Once you select a class or appointment, you can read up on reviews, instructor & service provider bios, and how to get there. You can also choose a business first to learn more about their amenities, schedule, services, location, and pricing. 
* When you’re ready to secure your service, select the “Book” button in the right-hand corner. From there, you will be asked to confirm your payment information. Plug in your info, then hit “BOOK AND BUY” to make it official.  
 
Why you’ll love it: 
* Variety: You’ve got local fitness, beauty, salon, spa, and wellness options in the palm of your hand—you decide what works for you. 
* Value: You'll get the best deals to try a new studio or drop-in on a fitness class without committing to a membership. 
* Verified reviews: Know what people are saying about services before you book, with reviews from verified users.  
  
*Flexible Pricing available in the US only 
  
*Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thank you for using the Mindbody app! Included in this release are bug fixes & improvements to make the app easier to use.

apps.title: Mantra - Daily Affirmations
apps.developer: Broftware House Yazilim Tasarim Anonim Sirketi
apps.description:
Our brains are wired to repeat negative feelings if fed with negative thoughts. Luckily the same goes for the positive side. Daily affirmations help us rewire our brains and fix these negative patterns. 

“If you practice saying positive things in non-stressful situations, it has been found that you can change your brain’s reactions” - Caroline Miller 

Affirmations are simple yet powerful statements that help us validate our core values. The latest researches indicate that practicing positive mantras and daily affirmations decreases stress, improves performance on challenging duties, builds self-esteem, and overall, makes us happier. As a result; we feel better, make healthier decisions, and live a happier life. Now, unleash your subconscious mind’s power and take your first step in the world of affirmations with Mantra.

All the affirmations inside our app are constantly updated. Instructions are clear: Think positive and hold down the button! Your affirmation will glow and you will light up! Give it a try and observe how you start your days in a better mood! Besides your daily affirmations, you can always read as many affirmations as you like by simply swiping.

Here is what you will get with our application:
• Affirmations for any situation from 30+ different categories and topics.
• More than a thousand "I am" affirmations
• Smart daytime and bedtime affirmation reminders (as push notifications)
• Uniquely new daily affirmations
• Practice as many affirmations as you want
• Create your own collections of affirmations 
• Add your own affirmations if you can’t find what you’re looking for
• Record your voice and listen on repeat
• Manifestation sessions and guided affirmation sessions
• Personalize your theme with hundreds of cherry-picked background images, videos and fonts
• Ambient sounds that uplift you
• Share your daily affirmations to any platform in portrait or square mode
• Like your affirmations to see them anytime in your favorites
• And much, much more…

If you have any feedback please contact us via email: mantra@broftware.com  We will get back to you immediately :)   Love you!

--

Private Policy:
https://getmantra.app/privacy-policy

Terms of Use:
https://getmantra.app/terms

In this update, we’ve added many new affirmations and made some improvements to enhance your experience.

If you're enjoying the app, consider leaving a review for other people! Your reviews mean the world to us, and we read every single one.

If you encounter any issues, please email us at mantra@broftware.com. Your feedback is essential in helping us improve!

Thank you for making Mantra a part of your day.

apps.title: Quabble: Daily Mental Health
apps.description:
Maintain Daily Mental Wellness with Just One Joyful App!

Quabble is here to make mental wellness practices joyful, engaging, and a natural part of your daily life, so that you are better equipped to handle life’s daily challenges. Quabble’s wide range of unique and easy mental wellness routines and mental health games, (designed as per mental therapy elements) along with unique community support features ensure consistent mental well-being. The best part: with Quabble, you don’t have to juggle between multiple apps for sleep, meditation, anxiety and depression management, journaling, virtual pet care, community support etc. You can now maintain daily mental wellness with JUST ONE joyful mental health app, effortlessly!

- 98% of regular users reported that our mind workouts have helped them manage their mental health
- 184k+ mental wellness routines have been completed on Quabble so far

What You’ll Love About Quabble:

1. HOLISTIC MENTAL WELLNESS TOOLS:

Our diverse range of mental health management tools (mind workouts), personalized mental wellness routines, goal-tracking features, and virtual pet experiences will let you pick your favorites or mix-n-match to ensure a joyful and customized experience. This is the only mental health app you will need to maintain your mental wellness consistently.

2. INTERACTIVE & CUSTOMIZABLE:

You can create your own uplifting spaces with ‘Safe Place,’ ‘Proud Dandelion,’ ‘Treasure Box,’ and more to keep yourself motivated and make the mental health management experience even more joyful.

3. A CUTE COMPANION-CUM-GUIDE:

Get a cute friend-cum-guide who will guide you through your daily mental wellness journey, and add joy to your daily life. This thoughtfully-designed feature will help you combat anxiety and depression.

4. ANONYMOUS CONNECTIONS & SUPPORT:

Connect anonymously with the caring Quabble community through the Bamboo Forest for unconditional support and guidance that will help you cope with your anxiety, depression and self-doubts better.

- Some of our best mind workouts for holistic mental wellness:

(We keep adding to the list)

- Clair de Lune:

Let Clair de Lune by Claude Debussy lull you into a restful night's sleep.

- Bamboo Forest:

It is a place where you can express yourself without fear of judgment by anonymously connecting with the community.

- Gratitude Jar:

Regular practice of gratitude has been proven to enhance general mood, improve symptoms of depression and anxiety, and strengthen emotional resilience.

- Proud Dandelion:

As you reflect and write down one thing of yourself you're proud of each day, your dandelion grows, symbolizing your personal growth.

- Safe Place:

It is an effective psychological tool for coping with mentally challenging situations with a ‘safe place visualization’.

- 1-min Breathing:

It activates your body's natural relaxation response by focusing on deep and rhythmic breaths.

- Worry Box:

It is a cognitive-based toolkit designed for stress and anxiety management.

- Mindful Meditation:

Mindful Meditation lets you take a break from your busy and stressful day in just 3 minutes.

- Mood Diary:

It is a proven tool that helps you understand your feelings better, making it easier to handle stress and control your emotions.

Quabble Club (in-app purchases)
Get more access to mental wellness workouts. For example, paid subscribers can send more letters to other community members. Another example is the automatic weather recording when writing a journal. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions in Settings and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

Terms and conditions: https://quabble.app/terms

Privacy policy: https://quabble.app/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes: - Fixed several bugs

apps.title: Headspace: Meditation & Health
apps.description:
Welcome to Headspace, your expert-led guide to mental health, mindfulness, and meditation. Whether you're navigating stress, anxiety, sleep trouble, or life’s ups and downs, Headspace is here to support you. Explore science-backed exercises, courses, and programs that help you build everyday skills to care for your mind. For more support, you have access to licensed therapists, mental health coaches or Ebb, your empathetic AI companion. Headspace is always here, so you can always put your mind first.

DAILY MEDITATIONS
Discover mental wellness and mindfulness with over 500+ guided meditations. From quick 3-minute mental resets to longer sessions, we'll help you make meditation a daily practice. Meditate, practice mindfulness and relax. Headspace is proven to increase happiness and reduce stress in just 10 days.

BETTER SLEEP
Headspace helps improve your sleep with expert-led sleep tools, guided sleep meditations, sleep sounds, sleepcasts, and more. Explore sleep music and meditation for sleeping to reduce stress and anxiety.

ANXIETY & STRESS RELIEF
Headspace is the mental health app here to help you manage your stress through personalized recommendations, guided meditations, and exercises. Learn calming breathwork and breathing techniques to help with panic attacks, anxiety relief and calm. Just 2 weeks of Headspace reduces anxiety.

AFFORDABLE THERAPY 
From finding the right therapist to easy scheduling, Headspace therapy makes it easier to start feeling better. You’ll also get access to mindfulness tools and Ebb, your empathetic AI companion, for support anytime you need it. Plus, with partnerships with major insurance companies, your sessions could cost as little as $0.

COACHING & MENTAL HEALTH SUPPORT
Get matched and text with your own mental health coach and schedule sessions at your convenience. Headspace mental health coaches are trained professionals that provide personalized care to help you set and reach goals, manage everyday anxiety and stress, navigate major life events, and more.

WELLNESS & BALANCE
Increase balance with guided meditation and focus music. Calm and relax with quick breathing exercises, improve focus with binaural beats and calm your mind with relaxing music for studying.

MINDFUL MOVEMENT
Relieve stress, release tension, and strengthen your mind-body connection with mindful movement. Practice CBT techniques and CBT therapy exercises to reduce stress and anxiety.

PROGRESS TRACKING
Self-care tracker to follow your mental health journey. Share insights with your mindfulness coach or therapist so they can keep you on track towards your goals.

Headspace is the everyday mental health app that’s proven to help. Stress less, sleep better, and feel happier with do-anywhere exercises and personalized recommendations from Ebb, Headspace’s AI mental health companion.

Access online therapy and psychiatry through your organization.* (Check coverage with your coach or benefits team.)

Start your free trial and experience the benefits of meditation, mindfulness and expert mental health therapy & coaching. Subscription options: $12.99/month, $69.99/year. These prices are for United States, pricing in other countries may vary. Coaching and therapy pricing varies by subscription.

The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Headspace saves your meditation sessions to your Apple Health app.
Read the terms and conditions here: http://www.headspace.com/terms-and-conditions
Read the privacy policy here: https://www.headspace.com/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Headspace! This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

As always, if you run into any troubles, let us know at help@headspace.com

Self-care tracker to follow your mental health journey. Share insights with your mindfulness coach or therapist so they can keep you on track towards your goals.

Headspace is the everyday mental health app that’s proven to help. Stress less, sleep better, and feel happier with do-anywhere exercises and personalized recommendations from Ebb, Headspace’s AI mental health companion.

Access online therapy and psychiatry through your organization.* (Check coverage with your coach or benefits team.)

Start your free trial and experience the benefits of meditation, mindfulness and expert mental health therapy & coaching. Subscription options: $12.99/month, $69.99/year. These prices are for United States, pricing in other countries may vary. Coaching and therapy pricing varies by subscription.

The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Headspace saves your meditation sessions to your Apple Health app.
Read the terms and conditions here: http://www.headspace.com/terms-and-conditions
Read the privacy policy here: https://www.headspace.com/privacy-policy

apps.title: Routine Planner, Habit Tracker
apps.description:
TRANSFORM YOUR LIFE WITH ROUTINERY

► Voted 2025 App of the Day by the App Store
► Trusted by 5 Million Users Worldwide

Building a routine is the foundation of a better life, but in today’s busy world, sticking to one isn’t easy. 
That’s where Routinery comes in—your personal assistant to help you easily create routines and build habits.



POWERFUL ROUTINE EXECUTION FEATURES

* A Timer That Keeps You on Track :
Start your routine and get voice alerts (TTS) and push notifications guiding you on what to do next and when. It’s okay if you miss a step; we’ll keep you on track. No need to remember what to do—we’ll make sure it gets done.

* Flexible Timer Functions :
Sometimes things don’t go as planned. With our timer, you can pause, skip tasks, adjust times, or add new tasks on the fly.

* Seamless Integration :
Use your preferred device—whether it’s a tablet, smartwatch, or smartphone. Execute your routines anytime, anywhere.



CUSTOM ROUTINES JUST FOR YOU

* Over 800 Emojis :
We offer a wide variety of emojis to help you design habits and routines for any purpose. (e.g., charging your smartwatch, walking your dog)

* Flexible Scheduling :
Create routines that fit your life—whether it’s for weekdays, weekends, or specific times of the day. (e.g., morning school routine, weekend workout routine, medication reminder routine)



A SUPPORTIVE AND INSPIRING ENVIRONMENT

* Progress Tracking : 
Review your routine performance daily, weekly, and monthly. Your completed routines and reviews become a journal of your growth. Visualize your progress with plant badges that grow as you keep your streak going.

* Recommended Routines :
Explore and challenge yourself with popular habits and routines, including those followed by celebrities. Discover a variety of habits and routines you might not have considered before.

* Motivational Features :
Get inspired by a chatbot that cheers you on, and by seeing the routines and habits of other users in real-time. (Displayed only with user consent)



ROUTINERY IS BUILT TOGETHER WITH YOU

► We’re Here to Listen: hello@routinery.app
If you have any feedback, suggestions, or issues, please feel free to contact us anytime!



REAL USER SUCCESS STORIES

"Mornings Are No Longer a Nightmare"
United States, B***
A mother of three shares, "Getting my kids ready for school while preparing for work was the biggest challenge of my day. I used to forget things and had to redo tasks, but now I start my day with a sense of accomplishment by following my planned routine."


"I Finally Achieved My Target Grades"
Australia, A*****
A student reflects, "It was hard to stick to my study schedule until I started using Routinery. After a month of consistent use, I finally achieved the grades I had been aiming for. I worried about relying too much on a tool, but I realized I was just making good use of it."


"I Can Control My Time Now"
Japan, A***
An ADHD user reports, "Even with a plan, I would often forget or get sidetracked. But with Routinery’s structure and timer, I can stay on track without losing time. This app is essential for anyone with ADHD."



Would you like to share your success story with us?

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've made the app faster and it doesn't heat up as much anymore.

apps.title: Well Digital
apps.description:
Well is your personalized daily health partner.

With Well, you’re treated like a name instead of a number. Well works to understand you, then suggests the next step fit for you — while rewarding you every step of the way. Get your first bonus just for signing up.

With Well, you are…

- WELL known: We get you. Answer just a few questions and we’ll share the next thing you can do for your health. Personalized multi-day health journeys and “look ahead” suggestions, designed by our experts and suggested by Well’s advanced health engine. Well knows your next healthy step even before you do.

- WELL rewarded: Healthy is job one. So why not get paid to do it? Earn hundreds in rewards by taking simple, healthy steps. Celebrate the small wins, because they add up over time. And when you’re ready to cash in on your good work, choose gift cards from a wide variety of your favorite brands.

- WELL empowered: It’s easier to take that next step when you know the facts. Build confidence and momentum in your health journey with do-able tips that fit into your regular day and help move you towards your goals. With someone in your corner, you can get started on that new health routine.

- WELL guided: Every now and then, we all need a little human guidance. Need help understanding bills and coverage, healthcare navigation guidance, and finding and scheduling a local provider? You’ll be happy to know our Well Guide team does it live and on-demand. Does that sound like typical healthcare to you? 

Well also integrates with the Apple Health app! This means your suggested health tips can be personalized to any real-time data you may store in Apple Health. (If you want to integrate, you can opt-in through your settings within the Well app.)

What others are saying about Well:

- “It's not just about losing weight, getting exercise, or lowering blood pressure. It's about all of that. It’s about your overall health.” — Kim W.

- “Thank you so much for finding them (a urologist) for me! I’ll be able to stay within the group for all of my needs…Thank you again for your help!” — Pablo L.

- “I love the emphasis on mental health in the workplace, because for a very long time, all I did was work.” —  Hannah L.

- “Well is by far my favorite app on my phone.” — Mark D.

Learn more about us at well.co

apps.title: MWH: Fitness + Wellness
apps.description:
MWH is a health, wellness & lifestyle platform on a mission to create a more mindful way of life, accessible and attainable for all.

• Get unlimited access to a library of 1000+ workouts & meditations.
• Move and meditate with Melissa and our MWH Creators
Pilates, Yoga, Guided Meditations, Pre & Postnatal, Barre & Standing Series, Treadmill & Water Workouts, and more, all designed to help you transform yourself from the inside out.
• New classes added every week.
• Custom schedules for Workouts and Meditations. There is something for everyone!
• Access to recipes & video tutorials + coveted lifestyle & nutrition tips.

Melissa Wood-Tepperberg started sharing her workouts on her iPhone and a simple tripod from her living room. The community has grown a lot since then, but the heart of MWH has remained the same. The foundation of this practice has always been about using what you have available to you, whenever, wherever you are. No matter how much time you have available to you (5, 10, 20 minutes, etc), there is something you can do, everyday, to better both your body and your mind.

Welcome to MWH... the destination to better every single aspect of your life.

All paid accounts on melissawoodhealth.com automatically renew at the end of their terms. The subscription renewal date will always be the day immediately following the end date of your current subscription period. The card used for the subscription purchase will be charged at the end of the term outlined in your receipt, unless it is updated prior to the renewal date. If you wish to cancel your account, you can do so at any time. Once your account has been cancelled, you will retain access to all paid features throughout the remainder of the term you purchased. If we are unable to process your renewal, your account may temporarily be suspended from access to paid features; your account will not be deleted, and no information will be lost or removed. Your account will remain suspended until a valid payment method is used. If you have any questions or concerns regarding your account, please contact us at support@melissawoodhealth.com.


If you subscribe to MWH via iTunes, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership will automatically renew unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscription will be renewed within 24-hours before the end of each period at the rate of your selected plan. Turn off auto-renewal anytime through iTunes.

App Privacy Policy: https://melissawoodhealth.com/privacy-policy

Terms of use: https://melissawoodhealth.com/terms-of-use

apps.title: Do Habits: Get It Done
apps.description:
Do Habits guides you in building healthy habits by helping you set goals, track your progress and motivates you to get them done. Unlike so many other habit apps, Do Habits lets you set a goal and track it MULTIPLE times a day, not just one time per day.

Do Habits will help you build great new habits and break existing bad ones.

After setting tangible daily or weekly goals, Do Habits will help you track your habits and tell you when you've met your goal. Do Habits also keeps track of Streaks when you've met your goals in consecutive periods.

The FREE version of Do Habits allows you to create up to 3 habits. For more than 3, you'll need to upgrade to the Premium Version.

Do Habits Features:
• Allows you to set and track goals on a daily or weekly basis
• Let's you set a goal for MULTIPLE times a day, not just once like most habit apps
• Totally customizable habit display (icons and colors) - you choose what will motivate you!
• Daily journal lets you keep notes about your habit
• Fun color options and icons let you customize your list
• Easy to edit activities in the past
• Multiple reminders for each habit
• Exportable CSV data with totals and time stamps
• Passcode protection with FaceID/TouchID
• Track activity with Apple Watch or Home Screen Widget
• iCloud and Dropbox data backup 
• Shortcuts and Siri Integration

Do Habits also integrates with Apple HealthKit. This lets you set and track goals automatically based on your activity. Ex. if you want to build a new great habit of getting more steps every day, our HealthKit integration will help you with this by attributing your steps data from HealthKit directly to your steps habit. Building amazing new habits has never been easier!

Do Habits PREMIUM:
• Unlimited habits/goals.

Do Habits contains optional subscription plans. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, for the chosen plan's price. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes/App Store Account Settings after purchase.

Read our full Privacy Policy and Terms of Service here:
https://growthbundle.com/privacy-policy
https://growthbundle.com/terms-of-service

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Today’s update includes:

• Some overall performance improvements
• Fixes a few pesky little bugs

Remember to drink water, get enough sleep and have fun tracking your habits!

If you’re loving Do Habits, please let us know by leaving a review :)

apps.title: Wellness Coach
apps.description:
Wellness Coach is a global wellness platform that inspires and engages workforces through personalized wellness offerings. We offer Challenges, Coaching, Rewards, Next Generation EAP, and Weight Management to support mental and physical health. Our high-impact solutions integrate with MS Teams, Slack, and Zoom to enhance engagement, accessibility, and productivity, fostering a healthier workforce. Join us today as we embark on creating a healthier and happier workforce. 


Our Story
In the wake of burnout from relentless startup endeavors, founders D Sharma and Julie Sharma embarked on a transformative journey of self-care. Their path led them to a serene retreat in Thailand, where the wisdom of a monk/coach introduced them to the power of journaling, meditation, and living in the moment. This pivotal experience ignited a profound realization: the life-changing benefits of personal coaching, a privilege once reserved for elite athletes, should be accessible to everyone. 
Inspired to bridge this gap, they, together with their friend Bhartesh, founded Wellness Coach. With a mission to make wellness readily accessible for all, Wellness Coach offers a comprehensive suite of mental and physical health services, from multilingual digital health resources to personalized coaching and clinical solutions. It's more than a company; it's a movement to empower individuals to navigate life's challenges with grace and resilience, inspired by the founders' own journey toward healing and growth. 

-D, Julie and Bhartesh.


A Pawsitive Tale: A Journey of Hope and Healing

Meet Pawsitive, the heart and soul of our mission to help 5 billion people live their best lives. During the challenging times of the pandemic, when the world grappled with isolation and uncertainty, our team sought a symbol of hope and resilience. That's when Pawsitive came into our lives, an embodiment of emotional support and unwavering positivity.
Chosen for his joyful spirit and compassionate heart, Pawsitive quickly became more than just a companion; he became a beacon of wellness, guiding our community toward health, happiness, and mindfulness. As the mascot of Wellness Coach, he represents the journey every individual is on—seeking balance, peace, and well-being in their lives.
Pawsitive invites each user to join him on this global mission, offering a paw in friendship and support. Together, with Pawsitive leading the way, we're not just using an app; we're building a movement toward accessible, engaging wellness for everyone, everywhere.
Embrace the journey with Pawsitive, and let's walk the path to living our best lives, one step, and one paw, at a time.


Why Wellness Coach? One platform for all employee wellbeing needs.

Wellness Coach membership covers all essentials of wellness including:
- Mental Wellbeing: meditations, live classes, 1-1 coaching, audiobooks, thearpy
- Physical Wellbeing: Yoga, Fitness, Cardio, Stretching, Steps challenges, 1-1 coaches and more.
- Sleep: Bedtime stories, music, yoga for sleep and more
- Nutrition: Weight management, Live group classes, 1-1 Coaching and more
- Financial Wellness: Managing Debt, Rainy day funds, Live group coaching and 1-1 coaching


Read more about our terms and conditions here:
Terms of service: https://www.Wellnesscoach.live/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://www.wellnesscoach.live/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Coach Chat


Want to feel confident before your first session? Coach Chat lets you learn about a coach’s style and availability, ask quick questions, and book faster—all in one place.

Heads-up: Coach Chat is for discovery & scheduling only (not in-chat coaching or medical advice).
Smarter Push Tracking:  We now capture push received/opened in Mixpanel & Iterable so reminders land at the right time—and help you follow through.


Plus: performance boosts, squashed bugs, and a sprinkle of UX polish throughout the app.
Love Wellness Coach? Leave us a 5 Star review—it helps more people live healthier, happier lives!

apps.title: Daylio Journal - Daily Diary
apps.description:
Self-Care Bullet Journal with Goals - Mood Diary & Happiness Tracker

Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


** WHAT IS DAYLIO **

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your food log. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your wellbeing, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal. We build it on three principles:

1.) Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
2.) Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
3.) Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment—no learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use, create your first entry in two steps.

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. 


** HOW DOES IT WORK **

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep an old school diary. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the statistics on charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
- Make reflection a daily habit
- Discover what makes you happy
- Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities 
- Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis
- Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly or yearly charts
- Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity or group
- Customize color themes
- Enjoy nights with dark mode
- See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels'
- Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
- Build habits and collect achievements
- Share statistics with your friends
- Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
- Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
- Turn on PIN lock and keep your diary safe
- Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


** PRIVACY AND SECURITY **

We are a top private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to the iCloud Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

Journaling has never been easier!

---
Read our full Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy:

Terms of Use:
http://terms.daylio.net

Privacy Policy:
http://privacy.daylio.net

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thanks for using Daylio. We have made several small improvements and fixed a couple of issues. Enjoy the app!

apps.title: 28 Period & Cycle Tracker
apps.description:
Get daily exercise videos, nutrition profiles, and emotional insights customized to your body's natural cycle. 

28 is the world's first cycle-based fitness and wellness experience offering cycle tracking, transformative exercises, nutrition profiles, and science-backed emotional insights, all hyper-personalized to where you are in your natural cycle and controlled by you.

Designed by supermodel trainers and medical experts to work with your body's physical and hormonal fluctuations. Powered by nature and innovative technology that personalizes your daily experience while keeping you in control of your cycle data.


Painful Periods Aren't Natural


But they are common. Synthetic estrogens in birth control, plastics, and beauty products have created hormone imbalances for millions of women. 28's functional nutrition was designed to naturally restore balance to your hormones, along with phase-specific functional movements. 

Workout With Your Cycle, Not Against It


Many popular fitness methods were designed for men, not women, with no regard for the menstrual cycle. 28 is the first method of its kind designed to optimize your energy, hormones, strength, and flexibility as you experience changes throughout your cycle.

You Deserve More Than A Period Tracker

Your cycle has four phases. Each phase brings changes to the brain and body. Exercising and eating based on your cycle means changing the types of movements and nutrients during each phase to optimize your physique, hormones, and mood. 28 empowers you with simplified science, breathtaking content, and cutting-edge technology. 

Become the Expert of You


You are a mystery. Your body doesn't have to be. We've been locked in the passenger seats of our own bodies for far too long. School taught us little-to-nothing about how our cycles and hormones actually work. 28 empowers you to connect with your body by understanding the beautifully complex nature of your biology, one day at a time.



FEATURES: 

Follow Your Cycle
  - Daily Cycle Status
  - Easily Track Your Periods
  - Phase Progress Bar 

Science-based Insights
  - Daily body predictions
  - Daily emotional predictions
  - Goals, Guidance, and inspiration

Exercise Videos
  - Personalized to match your energy and mood
  - Designed by trainers of iconic supermodels
  - Lengthen, strengthen, stretch & tone
  - Sculpt booty, tighten abs, tone arms, lean legs
  - Workout anywhere, at any time
  - No equipment required
  - Lightening-fast, high-definition streaming
  - View on mobile, desktop, tablet, TV

Nutrition Profiles
  - Daily nutrition guidelines for hormone balancing
  - Specific suggestions by food groups 
  - Give your body what it needs, when it needs it
  - No more calorie counting
  - Coming Soon: Meal plans
  - Coming soon: Shopping lists

Embrace your nature and begin today!

Subscription pricing and terms:
28 offers different subscription plans. Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings in your phone after the purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription, where applicable.

Terms of Use: https://28.co/terms
Privacy Policy: https://28.co/privacy

apps.title: FORM: Strength, Pilates, Gym
apps.description:
FORM is your digital platform for all things fitness, wellness, and self-love. Our workouts are here to encourage you to be the best version of yourself. We’re excited to be your newest friend on your health & wellness journey.

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Form by Sami Clarke on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://digital.joinform.co/tos
Privacy Policy: https://digital.joinform.co/privacy

apps.title: ALO Wellness Club
apps.description:
Welcome to ALO Wellness Club. Get the VIP treatment with unlimited fitness, mindfulness, and wellness classes from our lineup of A-list instructors. Achieve your wellness goals with on-demand workouts, expert instructors, and personalized class recommendations that fit seamlessly into your schedule. Once you’re a member of ALO Wellness Club, you’ll have all the tools you need for lifelong wellness. Now let's get to work—see you on your mat. 

WHAT’S INCLUDED
3,000+ on-demand fitness and mindfulness classes 
Access to top-tier instructors, wellness professionals, and celebrity trainers 
New classes added weekly from beginner to advanced skill levels 
Programmed series to meet your fitness and mindfulness goals 
Personalized recommendations based on your interests
Stream anytime, anywhere on desktop, tablet, and mobile 

TRAIN LIKE A VIP 

All you need to do is press play. Here to help set the pace, motivate, and push you beyond your limits, our roster of trainers is one you can rely on to meet any goal—big or small.  

HIT YOUR GOALS 

Whether you’re looking to build strength, increase flexibility, relieve stress, or learn a new skill, there’s a class or series for you. Using our Class Finder, you can sort by style, difficulty, time, and instructor to suit your mood and schedule. 

Choose from thousands of studio-style yoga, fitness, and mindfulness classes, including:

Yoga: Vinyasa, Ashtanga, Hatha, Restorative, Yin, Yoga for Beginners, Kundalini, Prenatal Yoga
Fitness: Pilates, Strength, Sculpt, Cardio, HIIT, Barre, Dance, Core Workouts
Mindfulness: Guided Meditation, Breathwork, Visual Meditations, Yoga Nidra, Sound Healing

CONNECT WHEREVER 

From the comfort of your living room to a hotel room across the globe, we put your favorite classes for mind and body at your fingertips — available on phone, tablet, and web. No Wi-Fi? Download classes offline and take your practice on the go. 

Terms: https://www.aloyoga.com/en-in/pages/terms-of-use
Privacy: https://www.aloyoga.com/pages/privacy-policy

apps.title: Liven: Discover yourself
apps.description:
Liven is your self-discovery companion, a system of tools designed to help you better understand and transform yourself. 

WHO’S LIVEN FOR?  
• For you, me, anyone trying to survive in this hyperstimulated world.    
• For those under pressure, living to meet others’ expectations, or struggling to say ‘no’.  
• For those wanting to build a positive self-image, improve focus, or manage time.  
• For anyone ready to liven up!

Are you ready to take your inner dialogue out of your head and gain a new perspective on life? Because if you are, we’ve got tools to help you observe your experiences and reframe your days. Sounds good?

  

CHECK OUT OUR APPROACH:

• Personalized program

Set a clear, achievable goal—whether it's improving your self-image, saying "no," or challenging negative thoughts. Choose your direction, and we'll help you get there with evidence-based techniques and tools. 

• Mood tracker

Pause during the day to check in with your emotions. See how you're doing—Good, Bad, Amazing! Use our emotional menu to name your feelings, notice what triggered them, and track changes over time with the Mood Calendar.

• Routine builder

Check out our Tasks tool to plan new activities and get ideas for things to try each day. By adding new tasks and routines to your days, you can change your behaviour and transform.   

• AI companion

Ever wish someone would listen to you rant without judgment, even at 3 a.m.? Meet Livie, our AI companion. If you're tired of the inner dialogue or need a fresh perspective on life, just talk to her. She'll help you break down your situations and suggest new ideas to try.  

• Bite-size knowledge

Scientists have studied the human mind for over 100 years, uncovering how our emotions, thoughts, and actions connect to unconscious "auto-pilot" behaviors. We've distilled this knowledge into bite-sized insights for you to apply in your decision-making.     

• Well-being tests

Everyone loves quizzes! Take a break and answer a set of questions to define experiences you’re going through. Check back every week to track the changes in emotional and behavioural dynamics.        

• Deep focus soundscapes

When you don’t feel like listening to music but still want to wear headphones and block out the world, try our soundscapes.

———————

WHAT OUR USERS ARE SAYING ABOUT US

"Positive thoughts and a calmer attitude come after 10 minutes of use."

"Great app to use as a guide at the start of your day."

"Liven is helping me turn healthy activities into habits."

———————
SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS
After you decide to begin your growth with Liven and download the app, you can unlock all features by subscribing to the premium subscription.
If you choose to purchase a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase.


Our app aims to provide you with helpful guidance on mindfulness. However, it is important to note that the information presented in the app is for general purposes only, and should not be considered as a substitute for professional medical care.

Livie is not a substitute for professional advice. It helps you understand your feelings, discover self-care ideas, and manage overwhelming thoughts. Please consult a professional if you need medical advice.

This app is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any health conditions, and may not be suitable for everyone.

Therefore, we strongly advise that you consult with a healthcare professional before adopting any advice or activities suggested in the app.
Please use this app at your discretion, and always keep in mind your own unique needs and circumstances.

Privacy Policy: https://quiz.theliven.com/en/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://quiz.theliven.com/en/terms-of-use

apps.title: The Wellness Corner
apps.description:
If you are seeking a one-stop destination for all your health and wellness needs, the Wellness Corner is perfect for you! The app by itself will serve as your personalized assistant that tracks your daily actions and provides useful recommendations to help you develop as well as maintain a healthy lifestyle. 

The Wellness Corner app enables you to connect with various health experts, track your calorie intake and burnout levels, manage your health records, assess your current health risk(s), connect with other fitness devices to sync your steps, and explore our wellness content. 

Sync with Apple Health
By accessing your Apple Healthy data, Wellness Corner imports your activity and step data to analyze your calorie burnout and provide exciting rewards. 

At the moment, this app is only available to the corporate subscribers of The Wellness Corner platform.
For more information, visit www.truworthwellness.com

apps.title: The Vitamin Shoppe - VShoppe
apps.description:
Fueling your best self ever just got easier! The Vitamin Shoppe® app is the fastest way to shop 1000s of the hottest buzz-worthy health and wellness products with easy ways to checkout, earn points towards Cash Back Awards, and get special offers.  

Broad Inventory of Health & Nutrition Products 

Browse our massive selection of nutrition products, including vitamins and minerals, supplements, protein, probiotics, fitness and workout support, vegan and organic formulas, and more by the industry’s most popular brands. Here, you’ll find the necessary items to support your nutrition plan and overall healthy living.  

Our app is designed to act as a personal health tool, helping you shop in a way that supports your daily health. Find ingredients, ratings, nutritional values, pricing and product reviews, and even scan barcodes for full product information. Then, save your favorite vitamins, protein, and supplements on a running wish list.  

Plus, you’ve got your Healthy Awards® headquarters in your pocket! This loyalty program is free to join and offers exclusive perks for our customers. You'll earn a minimum of 1 point for every $1 spent. With more at higher member tiers. 250 points is enough for a $5 Cash Back Award! Track your points, redeem Awards, manage Auto Delivery subscriptions, and score app-exclusive deals along with personalized notifications.  

When you choose Auto Delivery, you save 10% on every order, earn Healthy Awards points, and get free shipping on all subscription orders over $25. We even have the best price guarantee with a 14-day lookback for the lowest price, so you know you’re getting a great deal.  

Use these features to promote a healthy body, fit diet, and active lifestyle while saving on the products that can help get you there.  

 

Shop Anywhere, Anytime 

You’ve got a world of healthy choices, nutrition information and clean products at your fingertips. 

Exclusive Offers 

Early access & app-only deals—just for you. 

Healthy Awards Headquarters 

Easily track points, redeem Awards, and update your preferences to support your goals. 

Auto Delivery Made Easy 

Update your subscriptions without breaking a sweat. Change the delivery location, flavors and frequency anytime. 

Streamlined Checkout 

Use Apple Pay, PayPal, Klarna or use your credit card for fast, easy checkout. 

Stay Up-To-Date 

Personalized notifications—sent right to your phone—mean you won’t miss a thing. 

Find a Store 

We’ve got more than 600 The Vitamin Shoppe locations—find one near you, get directions, and check store hours to discover exclusive store features and deals.  

2-Hour Pick-Up 

Get your order quick! 

--------------------- 

SHOP BY CATEGORY:

apps.title: Sharecare: Health & Well-being
apps.description:
Improve your health and lower your RealAge with Sharecare. Whether you’re looking to sleep better, lose weight, reduce stress or find a new doctor, we’re here to help. We recommend simple, personalized actions you can do every day to improve your well-being — and remind you to do them. From step tracking to vital signs, we store all of your health information in one secure, easy-to-use app. 

LEARN HEALTHY HABITS 
• Take the RealAge test to learn your body’s actual age compared to your calendar age
• Keep track of your daily health and wellness goals, including weight, sleep, stress, activity levels, fitness, diet and blood pressure
• Watch your progress toward lowering your RealAge directly from your phone or by connecting Apple’s Health app

MANAGE YOUR HEALTH IN ONE PLACE
• Store and access all your health information, including key biometrics, vital signs, immunizations, lab results, medications and list of medical conditions and past procedures
• Upload your health and vision insurance card for easy access for you and your family members 
• 100% secure without the hassle; Set a security PIN to stay signed in while maintaining your privacy

GET TIPS AND INSIGHTS 
• Check out personalized health and wellness tips on what you can do to live younger based on your RealAge, interests and activities 
• See daily insights based upon your progress and learn the impact on your overall health
• Follow health topics that interest you from our health and wellness experts

QUICKLY GET THE CARE YOU NEED
• Identify what could be causing your symptoms and have a better doctor’s visit with a sharable summary of your results
• Find a doctor in your area who specializes in your symptoms or conditions.

CONNECT YOUR EMPLOYER AND/OR HEALTH PLAN
• If your employer or health insurance plan is part of Sharecare, you also can find information about health screenings, open enrollment deadlines and exclusive programs to help you manage your health

See what people are saying about Sharecare -
“This app has everything you need health wise. It tracks everything, including steps, and has information on almost every topic you could think of… Oh and the RealAge is super cool. It gives you customized tips and health advice.” – Sharecare App User

“I’m always looking for apps that combine information or daily tasks into a streamlined experience. This app does that big time for all things related to health & wellness! “RealAge” is such a great motivator to make small improvements every day. Can’t wait to get my RealAge under 40!” – Sharecare App User

apps.title: EasyWellness
apps.description:
Traditional workouts aren't for everyone. And that's OK! With EasyWellness, you can craft your own personal *glow up*. EasyWellness helps you build fundamental habits so you can improve your flexibility, mobility, stress management, sleep, lung health, cardiovascular health, water intake, digestion and even cardio — in just a few minutes per day.
You don't need to sweat it out in a gym or run a marathon to be healthy— wellness can be easy, and we show you how. 

With enhanced INSIGHTS, you can track all your EasyWellness stats and see how you've progressed. Check your progress with weekly and monthly statistics in graphs and highlights. Tracking your progress is one of the best tools to achieve your goals.

If you’re trying to get healthier, but keep quitting when life gets in the way, you can benefit from EasyWellness. We’ve got programs to help you on the road to a healthier life – Stretching Routines, Breathing Exercises, Water Tracker, Step Counter and the Wellness Library. 

HOW DOES EASYWELLNESS WORK?
EasyWellness programs are fundamental to your health. These are habits that you CAN keep up! They don’t require a huge time or energy commitment. Add a little EasyWellness to your day and you will reap the benefits in the long term.

#Stretching - Improve flexibility and mobility. No matter your age or body type, flexibility and mobility are the key to completing daily activities easily and without injury. Stretching can also improve with pain and posture.

#Breathing - There is no denying that stress and sleep are huge factors in our overall health. Breathing exercises are a powerful tool in stress reduction and better sleep. Our app will guide you through these exercises so you can be at your best.

#Hydration - Staying hydrated and drinking more water can be difficult, but not with our water tracker. Improve digestion and curb cravings when you hit your daily water needs.

#Movement - Walking has incredible benefits as a form of exercise and is low impact: It helps with weight management, cardiovascular health and can boost your mood. The EasyWellness Step Counter helps beginners create the habit of walking more throughout their day.

#Wellness Library - Articles, tips and quizzes to help you along your wellness journey. 

BENEFITS:
- Change your approach towards healthy living with simple programs you can do regularly
- Loosen tight muscles
- Improve flexibility, mobility and balance
- Gently fight the effects of aging
- Easily combined with your personalized nutritional needs
- Boost energy
- No burnout
- Sleep better
- Improve focus and concentration
- Increase lung capacity
- Curb cravings
- Reduce stress and increase mindfulness and more!

** Taking motivation out of the equation! ** 
Motivation isn’t something that we can rely on when it comes to getting healthier and self care. That’s why EasyWellness has customizable time frames. Do what you can and keep up your streak! 

MORE FEATURES:
- Create your own stretch routines: Users can now create their own routines with the Create Your Own Mix feature. This is perfect for people with injuries that need to work on (or avoid) certain areas.
- Weekly and monthly insights show how you've progressed. 
- Audio, Visual Graphics and Text Instructions
- Haptic Vibrations for discrete breathing exercises
- Friendly reminders
- Easy scheduling calendar
- Challenges, streaks and achievement badges
- Dark mode for night time stretching, breathing exercises and browsing

JOIN THE COMMUNITY
Instagram: https://instagram.com/easywellness.app
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/easywellnessapp
Contact: support@littlebylittlelabs.com

Terms of Service: https://www.easywellness.app/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.easywellness.app/privacy

Copyright © 2021 LITTLE BY LITTLE LABS LLC

apps.description:
Transform your life and take care your well-being with the help of Goddess - the ultimate science-backed app that empowers you to start your spiritual and mental health journey.

Elevate your daily self care routines, healing with meditation, yoga, and breathwork, and many more well-being practices for women's health.

Embark on a sacred self love and empowerment journey with Goddess. Join our ever-growing community of empowered women.

Transformative Self care Journey for your well-being
Self-discovery, spiritual empowerment and self love by utilizing the power of ancient wisdom, mindfulness, and behavioral science.

Take care of your well-being today
Explore a massive library of over 1000 well-being practices for women's health. Uncover inner peace, self love and spiritual healing through guided meditation, breathwork, affirmations and yoga. Our well-being library caters to your needs, whether you seek tranquility, self growth, healing, or personal transformation for your spiritual journey.

Daily Self Care Routines with Meditation and Yoga
Take control of your day with intention and gratitude when you wake up. End each day with peace of mind. Goddess empowers you with daily rituals to help you stay inspired, balanced and motivated.

Feminine Energy
Dive into resources and insights that raise your feminine energy and foster self growth on your spiritual journey. Improve your self love, spiritual healing and well-being.

Personality Analysis: Explore the depths of your personality. Goddess offers archetype personality analysis to enhance your understanding and nurture spiritual self growth. Create your spiritual journey tailored to your personality with daily affirmations, meditation and self care customized to your Goddess archetypes.

All-in-one Women's Health and Holistic Well-being: Prioritize your well-being with resources and guidance on women's health. Goddess empowers you on your unique feminine journey, from menstrual cycles to hormonal balance. 

Goddess Daily Affirmations and Feminine Tips
Reprogram your subconscious mind with daily affirmations and feminine tips tailored to your Goddess personas. Prioratize your self love routines and feminine virtues.

Meet your spiritual well-being and self care coach today. Embark on this beautiful and transformative spiritual journey and awaken the Goddess within.


Any questions or suggestions? Contact: info@thegoddesswellbeing.com


Goddess App offers auto-renewing subscription options:

To unlock all content, get The Goddess App Premium.

There are three subscription plans: 1 month/$12.99, 12 months/$59.99 with a discount (50% off) subscription.

- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
- The account is charged for renewal within 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
- The cost of renewal is equal to the value that “Apple’s App Store Matrix” determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.


Privacy Policy
https://goddesswomenapp.com/privacy-policy

https://goddesswomenapp.com/terms-and-conditions/

apps.title: Workout Tracker Gentler Streak
apps.description:
Hey, welcome the Gentler Streak - the app that keeps your active life alive! An award-winning health and fitness tracker offers personalized guidance that adapts to your daily capabilities and not the other way around. For those of us who want to move consistently, not constantly.

Built with care by a small indie team.

• 2024 Apple Design Award - Social Impact | 2022 Apple Watch App of the Year | App of the Day | Editor’s Choice
• Featured in The Verge, Forbes, TechCrunch, and more.

▶UNDERSTAND YOUR DAILY READINESS◀
[KEY HEALTH METRICS]
Start your day with a summary of key vitals and sleep, helping you detect changes before you feel them. Receive workout suggestions that respond to your readiness. Set home screen widgets to bring this info closer to you.

[FULL SLEEP ANALYSIS]
See everything from sleep onset to how much restorative sleep you are getting. View trends over 14 nights in sleep duration, consistency, and stages to spot patterns and improve your sleep hygiene.

[NEW - DAILY STEPS, DONE DIFFERENTLY]
You can now track daily steps, distance, walking time, flights climbed, and walking heart rate—all with a 14-day trend overview.
Our approach doesn’t push you to chase step goals. Instead, it helps you understand your daily movement patterns—ideal for everyday walkers and those managing chronic conditions.

[SYNC ACTIVITIES WITH YOUR CYCLE]
Know daily stress tolerance of each menstrual cycle phase and receive support for your current state, with workout suggestions like "Flow Workouts" along with allowing you to take a pause when your period starts.

▶STAYING ACTIVE ON YOUR TERMS◀
[STREAK & STATUS]
Keep your streak alive by following your body’s needs, even when it calls for rest days. When life happens—be it illness, injury, or vacation—adjust your status to reflect real life and skip feeling guilty.

[AWARD-WINNING APPLE WATCH WORKOUT TRACKER]
Track real-time training effects and heart rate zones to manage your workout intensity and avoid overtraining. Get a countdown to “overreaching” to know exactly when you're close to pushing too hard for the day.

[PERSONALIZED WORKOUT TRACKING]
Track 140+ activities, from chores to a variety of workouts, with detailed maps and metric charts, and stay within your healthy activity levels.

[TAILORED DAILY WORKOUTS]
Get daily suggestions—ranging from rest to high-intensity exercises—based on your readiness. Go Gentler's on-watch suggestions allow you to scale your exercise duration and/or intensity up or down.

▶ULTIMATE WORKOUT JOURNAL◀
[PERSONALIZED SUMMARIES]
Turn your workout summaries into a personalized fitness journal. Customize them with details that matter to you: rename workouts, add notes, photos, and mark your favorite sessions. Plus, adjust the effort using the RPE chart when needed.

[PROGRESS CHARTS]
Your progress with weekly, monthly and yearly charts, including a monthly and yearly recap.

[LIVE ACTIVITY & WIDGETS]
Use Live Activity for tracking on iPhone, and interactive widgets on your Home & Lock screens.

[ACCESSIBLE TO ALL]
Full support for accessibility preferences including bold text, dynamic type, reduced transparency, increased contrast, motion adjustments, and voiceover.

[PRIVATE DATA STAYS PRIVATE]
Your health data stays on-device via Apple HealthKit, with no external processing.

Upgrade to Gentler Streak Premium with monthly, yearly, or lifetime plans for advanced features and family sharing.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage plans and turn off auto-renewal in Settings > Apple ID >  Subscriptions.

Please note, Gentler Streak is not a medical device and should not replace professional medical advice.

Terms of service: https://gentler.app/terms/
Privacy policy: https://gentler.app/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Widget. New Widget. New Period Widget.

Now, alongside Activity Status, Go Gentler, Vitals, and Single Vital, you can also add a Period widget to your Home Screen! Yay!

Different phases of the menstrual cycle can affect how workout-ready your body feels. Keeping them in view helps keep them in mind and this widget does just that. It shows the current phase, cycle day, and expected readiness.

Still, period is just one piece of your wellbeing picture, something to help you understand your patterns better. How cycle phases affect us varies greatly from person to person. It’s best to observe yourself and add notes with your workouts to learn what’s true for you, and then adapt your behaviour to it.

To add a period widget (or any other) follow these steps:
1. Touch and hold an empty spot on your Home Screen until apps start jiggling.
2. Tap the + or Edit button (depending on your iOS version).
3. Search for Gentler Streak and swipe through widgets - the Period one’s last.
4. Tap Add Widget, and drag to wherever you’d like it to be.

If you find Gentler Streak helpful, leaving a review on the App Store is one of the best ways to support us. For a small team, your reviews and ratings matter a lot! They help others discover us more easily, and help them understand what to expect from the app. Good ones also make our day.

Got feedback? Let us know!
Email: support@gentlerstories.com
Reddit: r/gentlerstreakapp
Instagram: @gentlerstreak
Threads: @gentlerstreak
Xiaohongshu: GentlerStreak

Thank you for exploring your fitness with us!

See everything from sleep onset to how much restorative sleep you are getting. View trends over 14 nights in sleep duration, consistency, and stages to spot patterns and improve your sleep hygiene.

[NEW - DAILY STEPS, DONE DIFFERENTLY]
You can now track daily steps, distance, walking time, flights climbed, and walking heart rate—all with a 14-day trend overview.
Our approach doesn’t push you to chase step goals. Instead, it helps you understand your daily movement patterns—ideal for everyday walkers and those managing chronic conditions.

[SYNC ACTIVITIES WITH YOUR CYCLE]
Know daily stress tolerance of each menstrual cycle phase and receive support for your current state, with workout suggestions like "Flow Workouts" along with allowing you to take a pause when your period starts.

▶STAYING ACTIVE ON YOUR TERMS◀
[STREAK & STATUS]
Keep your streak alive by following your body’s needs, even when it calls for rest days. When life happens—be it illness, injury, or vacation—adjust your status to reflect real life and skip feeling guilty.

[AWARD-WINNING APPLE WATCH WORKOUT TRACKER]
Track real-time training effects and heart rate zones to manage your workout intensity and avoid overtraining. Get a countdown to “overreaching” to know exactly when you're close to pushing too hard for the day.

[PERSONALIZED WORKOUT TRACKING]
Track 140+ activities, from chores to a variety of workouts, with detailed maps and metric charts, and stay within your healthy activity levels.

[TAILORED DAILY WORKOUTS]
Get daily suggestions—ranging from rest to high-intensity exercises—based on your readiness. Go Gentler's on-watch suggestions allow you to scale your exercise duration and/or intensity up or down.

▶ULTIMATE WORKOUT JOURNAL◀
[PERSONALIZED SUMMARIES]
Turn your workout summaries into a personalized fitness journal. Customize them with details that matter to you: rename workouts, add notes, photos, and mark your favorite sessions. Plus, adjust the effort using the RPE chart when needed.

[PROGRESS CHARTS]
Your progress with weekly, monthly and yearly charts, including a monthly and yearly recap.

[LIVE ACTIVITY & WIDGETS]
Use Live Activity for tracking on iPhone, and interactive widgets on your Home & Lock screens.

[ACCESSIBLE TO ALL]
Full support for accessibility preferences including bold text, dynamic type, reduced transparency, increased contrast, motion adjustments, and voiceover.

[PRIVATE DATA STAYS PRIVATE]
Your health data stays on-device via Apple HealthKit, with no external processing.

Upgrade to Gentler Streak Premium with monthly, yearly, or lifetime plans for advanced features and family sharing.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage plans and turn off auto-renewal in Settings > Apple ID >  Subscriptions.

Please note, Gentler Streak is not a medical device and should not replace professional medical advice.

Terms of service: https://gentler.app/terms/
Privacy policy: https://gentler.app/privacy

apps.title: Sadhguru- Yoga & Meditation
apps.description:
Connect with Sadhguru and practice Isha Yoga on the official Sadhguru App! Discover Yoga for beginners and benefit from free Yoga and meditation practices that can help you overcome stress and anxiety, and establish lasting calm and joy, in just a few minutes a day.

Sadhguru App is available in 12 languages – Russian, French, Spanish, German, Hindi, Telugu, Gujarati, Kannada, Marathi, Malayalam, Bengali and Tamil.

Start your day with Sadhguru’s daily quotes, stay up to date with his latest articles, listen to his podcasts, and watch videos on a wide range of topics including spirituality, success, Yoga, meditation, relationships, health, fitness, and living a joyful and stress-free life.

Sadhguru’s Guidance and Wisdom
Start your day with Sadhguru – Quotes for your daily dose of insight and inspiration
Daily Sadhguru Wisdom Videos – Short daily wisdom bites from Sadhguru to help you start your spiritual life
Sadhguru Videos, Articles, and Podcasts – Latest videos and articles on a wide range of intriguing topics, and podcasts, so you can access Sadhguru’s wisdom wherever you are.

Free Yoga Practices
Yoga for Health – A simple way to activate the energy nodules in your joints and exercise your muscles, bringing ease to the whole system.
Yoga for Immunity – Practices to help enhance your immunity and lung capacity
Yoga for Success – A vertical spine corresponds to a leap in capability in evolution. This simple practice keeps the spine healthy and active, naturally leading to success.
Yoga for Overall Wellbeing – Yoga Namaskar is a simple and powerful process that activates the lumbar region and strengthens the muscles along the spine to prevent the collapse of the spine due to ageing.
Yoga for Peace – The Nadi Shuddhi practice cleanses the nadis, - the pathways through which pranic energy flows, - resulting in a balanced system and psychological well-being.
Yoga for Joy – Nada Yoga - the Yoga of sound or reverberation, – allows you to utter the sounds that create an inner atmosphere of joy, making it a natural way to be.
Yoga for Inner Exploration - Shambhavi Mudra is an easy, effortless process that enhances your perception and makes you receptive to that dimension of life often termed Grace.
Yoga for Love – The many nerve endings in your palms make them very sensitive. By placing them together in Namaskar, you can change your chemistry to foster love within.

Guided Meditations
Isha Kriya – Learn a free 12-minute guided meditation designed by Sadhguru. Daily practice of Isha Kriya helps bring health, dynamism, peace and well-being.
Sadhguru Presence – Experience Sadhguru's presence daily at 6:20 PM through a 7-minute guided chant.
Infinity Meditation - Designed by Sadhguru, this 15-minute Infinity-guided meditation creates stability and balance in one’s energies and can bring one to an experience of boundlessness.
Chants - Meditate to bliss chants Nirvana Shatakam and Gurupaduka stotram and carry the exuberance through the day.
Chit Shakti Meditations – Using the power of the mind to create what one wants in one’s life is called Chit Shakti. 
Inner Engineering - Seven 90-minute sessions impart potent tools from the ancient science of Yoga, with the potential to transform how you live, conduct, and experience your life.

Sadhguru Exclusive - Sadhguru Exclusive is a unique video platform to explore mysticism and spirituality with Sadhguru. It contains captivating glimpses of Sadhguru, revealing never-before-seen content deep within the Isha archives. Immerse yourself in many engaging series - each one featuring a unique selection of Sadhguru’s timeless wisdom.

WEB: isha.sadhguru.org
FACEBOOK: facebook.com/sadhguru
INSTAGRAM: instagram.com/sadhguru
Read more about our terms and conditions here:


Terms of Service: https://isha.sadhguru.org/terms-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://isha.sadhguru.org/privacy
FEEDBACK: apps@ishafoundation.org

apps.title: Vivoo: Your Wellness Platform
apps.description:
MEET VIVOO

Vivoo is a personalized wellness platform that helps you take control of your wellness. The App works alongside an at-home wellness products  so you can get real-time body data and results backed by science!

You can get personalized lifestyle and nutritional advice based on your results to help improve your wellness. Results are shared in just 90 seconds through the App from the comfort of your home, so there's no need to ship samples!

HOW IT WORKS
1.⁠ ⁠Download the free Vivoo App
2.⁠ ⁠Urinate on the Vivoo Wellness Cards
3.⁠ ⁠Wait 90 seconds
4.⁠ ⁠Scan the Wellness Cards to the App
5.⁠ ⁠Get your wellness score plus personalized nutritional & lifestyle advice

It doesn't stop there, integrate your wearables to Vivoo to track your activity, sleep, and heart rate, access over +400 wellness articles, and order personalized supplements based on your Vivoo results.
It's our pleasure to introduce Welly, your new virtual wellness assistant that will take your Vivoo experience to the next level!

Welly is the perfect partner for those looking to get the most out of their wellness journey. Whether you're looking for a daily meal plan, or trying to get new, creative and delicious recipes designed to improve your body's levels of nutrients, Welly can help you get there!

• After using Vivoo,  the Vivoo App scores you on your overall wellness and provides detailed feedback on each parameter.

• We recommend using Vivoo weekly to best track and observe your wellness. However, you can use it more often if you want. It is up to you!

• Get access to +5,000 personalized advice prepared by dietitians and nutritionists.

• You can also integrate other wearable devices & Apple Health data to the Vivoo App to track your sleep, heart rate, and activity levels!

• Explore trendy wellness subjects by reading up on +500 wellness articles on the App.


LET'S TALK
Follow us on social media Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Pinterest: @vivooapp.
Email us at letstalk@vivoo.io; we value your opinion and always welcome suggestions and feedback.

Vivoo is not intended for use in the diagnosis of any diseases or other conditions, including determining your state of health or curing, mitigating, treating, or preventing any disease or its symptoms.

Vivoo Services do not contain or constitute, and should not be interpreted as medical advice or opinion. Any services of Vivoo, are not a medical professional, or they do not provide medical services or render medical advice. The Vivoo Services are not a substitute for the advice of a medical professional, and the information made available on or through the Vivoo Services should not be relied upon when making medical decisions. The information made available on or through the Vivoo Services should not be relied upon to diagnose or treat a medical or health condition. If you require medical advice or services, you should consult a trained medical professional.

Great news! Vivoo now speaks French!
