apps.title: Well Being Journal
apps.description:
Well Being Journal is dedicated to publishing cogent, concise, expert information about natural ways to prevent and heal illnesses and reverse aging. We herald the integration of medicine with physical, mental, emotional, spiritual and social aspects of health. We publish well substantiated feature articles and research notes covering those subjects as well as personal stories of healing—and we’ve been doing so for 20 years! 

The Journal also publishes research as well as personal and clinical experiences about the nutritional and natural healing and prevention of illnesses, including arthritis, cancer, cardiovascular or heart disease, diabetes, Lyme disease, Alzheimer’s/dementia and much more. Regarded as a treasure trove by subscribers, the Journal, with 52 pages each issue, provides healthy, fascinating reading cover-to-cover. 

Be forewarned! By reading the Journal you might just live with greater health and happiness. Perhaps you will enjoy giving the Journal a try. It’s our truly genuine hope that you might just delightfully discover reading the Journal will help you live a healthier, happier, longer life!

----------------------------------------------

This is a free app download. Within the app users can purchase the current issue and back issues.

Subscriptions are also available within the application. A subscription will start from the latest regular issue at the time of purchase.

-The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product.
-You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.
-Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased.
-If a subscription offers a free trial, at the end of the trial period, you will be charged the full price of the subscription. You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription settings on your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged.

Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account.

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved.
If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update, please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store

Help and frequently asked questions can be accessed in-app and on pocketmags.

If you have any problems at all please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com

--------------------

You can find our privacy policy here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/privacy.aspx

You can find our terms and conditions here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/terms.aspx

My Account controls
Numerous bug fixes and improvements

Get all your health info in one convenient place.

With our new LiveWell app, you can manage your health and wellness – as well as everyone who counts on you.

You can:

Start a video visit or e-visit to get a fast diagnosis and treatment plan

Manage care for yourself and everyone who counts on you all in one place

Find a doctor or location near you

View maps and driving directions

Schedule appointments and get medications for everyone who depends on you

Message your providers and care team

Pay your bill

Take health quizzes

Get the latest health and wellness insights

Check lab and test results

Live mindfully with guided meditation exercises

apps.title: Fitnexa: AI Wellness Companion
apps.description:
Ever wish staying healthy could be simple and enjoyable?

Fitnexa transforms your wellness journey with AI-powered guidance that fits seamlessly into your daily life. From analyzing meals with a quick photo to creating personalized fitness plans, we make healthy living effortless—helping you stay younger and live longer.


Key Features
1. Your Personal AI Health Coach
• Natural Conversations: Chat about nutrition, workouts, weight management, sleep, or stress - just like talking to a friend.
• Actionable Nudges: “Youve clocked three late nights - schedule a 10-minute walk at 3 p.m. to reboot your focus.”
• Momentum Boosts: “Crushed your weekly step goal! Lets raise the bar together - 8,000 steps is next.”
	
2. Effortless Meal Tracking
• Snap & Analyze: Take a photo of your meal to instantly see calories and macros. Want more insights? Your coach can break down vitamin and mineral content for you!
• Seamless Integration: All data automatically syncs to your health log and also supports manual input.

	
3. NexaPoints: A Simple Score to Track Your Progress
• Measurable Goals: An innovative scoring system that turns abstract health targets into countable numbers.
• Flexible Achievement: Earn points your own way and on your own schedule - making health adaptable to your lifestyle.
	
4. Personalized Nutrition Plans
• Tailored Menus: Diverse, delicious recipes crafted for your unique tastes and health objectives.
• Easy Customization: Don't like an ingredient? The AI instantly suggests alternatives you'll love.
	
5. Holistic Health Monitoring
• Complete Dashboard: Track nutrition, exercise, sleep, and mood in one app; metrics are seamlessly imported from your wearable devices via Apple Health integration.
• Lifestyle Lens: “Your heart-rate dips align with Sunday hikes - lock in that habit to keep stress at bay.”
	
6. Expanding Wellness Ecosystem
• Beyond Basics: Upcoming specialized coaches for sleep, stress management, anti-aging, and more.
• Growing With You: As your wellness goals evolve, Fitnexa AI adapts to support your longevity journey.


Why Choose Fitnexa?
• Enjoyable, Not Overwhelming: No extreme diets or punishing workouts - just sustainable habits that feel good.
• Science-Backed Guidance: Developed with nutritionists and fitness professionals for reliable, evidence-based advice.
• All-In-One Solution: Manage your entire wellness journey in a single, intuitive app.


Start Your Path to Lasting Wellness

Download Fitnexa today and discover how simple it can be to feel energetic, confident, and vibrant every day - because you deserve to stay younger and live longer.


Note: Fitnexa provides general wellness guidance and is not intended to replace professional medical advice. For specific health concerns, please consult a qualified healthcare provider.

apps.title: Ohms: Daily Mood & Wellness
apps.description:
Feeling off but don’t know why? Ohms helps you connect the dots between how you feel and what you do so you can take control of your health with real insights, not guesswork.

“This app helps me recognize things about my mood that I didn’t even notice were affecting me.” – Sio75

Why Ohms?
* Discover what boosts or drains your mood
* Track real-time health scores backed by science
* Get personalized goals to improve your mind and body
* See how sleep, workouts, heart rate, and more impact your well-being
* Breathe better with guided breathwork sessions for calm, energy, sleep, and focus
* Journal with photos, videos, and text to reflect and track your progress
* Built with Dr. Bobak Mosadegh of Weill Cornell Medicine to combine clinical insight with intuitive tracking

What You’ll Get
FOCUS ON WHAT MATTERS
* Dynamic Health Scores – Real-time mind & body snapshots that evolve with your data
* Adaptive Goals – Smart targets based on what actually improves your mood
* Personalized Alerts – Timely nudges to keep you in sync with your wellness

SEE WHAT LIFTS YOU UP
* Mood Tracking – Log how you feel and find patterns over time 
* Lifestyle Correlations – Reveal links between habits (like sleep, steps, and more) and how you feel
* Apple Health Integration (optional) – Connect HRV, heart rate, and much more for a full-body picture

STAY GROUNDED
* Guided Breathwork – Science-backed sessions to help you relax, focus, energize, or sleep better
* Reflective Journaling – Capture thoughts with photos, videos, or text
* Mental Health Check-Ins – Track anxiety with the clinically validated GAD-7 screening tool

“Thank you to the developers because this could be my favorite app! The Apple Watch syncing feature is convenient and its helped me track my health progress, both mentally and physically...” - Danny39484

Ohms is privacy-first. You control your information, and we never sell your data. Learn more at yourohms.com/privacy

Whether you're optimizing your performance or just trying to feel better day to day, Ohms helps you see what’s working and what’s not.
Download Ohms and make sense of your health today.

——

**TRIAL AND SUBSCRIPTION PLANS **
Ohms is free, with an optional Pro Plan for deeper insights. Enjoy all Pro features with a 14-day free trial, then subscribe monthly or annually—or stay with our always-free Starter Plan for unlimited mood tracking, journaling, and breathwork. Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in your iTunes Account Settings. Refunds are not available for unused portions of subscriptions. Pricing may vary by country and currency.

**TERMS & CONDITIONS**
Terms & Conditions: https://www.yourohms.com/terms-and-conditions
Report Issues: http://www.yourohms.com/contact

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This release includes two new exciting updates: 1) you'll now see a new user profile view that gives you greater access and control over your account and 2) you can now manually select your breathwork pace or calibration rate.

If you encounter any issues or have feedback, please reach out to us at help@yourohms.com or through our Contact Page.

apps.title: Soothe: Wellness On Demand
apps.description:
Spa-quality wellness and personal care services delivered to you, on your schedule –– at home, at the office, or on the go.

Soothe is the largest and most trusted on-demand wellness platform in the world. The Soothe app connects you with top wellness professionals in your area, any day of the week. Providers on the Soothe platform are licensed, certified, and highly-skilled massage therapists, estheticians, and cosmetologists who can offer:

•  Relaxing Swedish or Deep Tissue massage
•  Recovery sports massage or Percussive Therapy
•  Prenatal massage to promote wellness during pregnancy
•  Skin care, including facials to help with hydration, aging, stress and acne
•  Haircuts & styling
•  Beauty services, including spray tanning...and more


ON YOUR SCHEDULE
Simply choose the type of service you want, the time and place you want the specialist to arrive, and Soothe’s platform will match you with the highest-rated provider in your area who meets your criteria. Whether you’re looking for a facial to look more youthful or a 5-star full-body massage, Soothe has you covered from head to toe!


PERSONALIZED ENHANCEMENTS USING INDUSTRY-LEADING PRODUCTS
Providers on the Soothe network can personalize your experience to ensure you’re getting the best treatment. Having neck strain due to too much time in front of the computer? Would you like to add hot stones to your massage? We’ve got you covered.

And Soothe has partnered with industry leaders in the wellness and self-care space, including companies like Therabody, Hydropeptide, PCA, Skin Care Authority, and Dermologica to ensure you’re getting the best products that match your specific needs.


A NETWORK OF PROFESSIONALS YOU CAN TRUST
With its award-winning Trust & Safety team, Soothe only accepts the most experienced, skilled, and background-checked wellness providers onto its platform. All providers in the Soothe network are licensed/certified and insured, and are continuously monitored to ensure the highest quality standards are met. They’ve had extensive experience and often possess multiple, specialized certifications.


GET EVEN MORE WITH AN OPTIONAL MEMBERSHIP
Soothe’s optional membership plan, Soothe Plus, allows you to book unlimited discounted services to help you make wellness part of a healthy lifestyle. Various plans and packages are available to meet your needs. Download the app for more details.


ADDITIONAL SOOTHE FEATURES & BENEFITS
•  Book a Soothe spa party for a bridal shower or group pop-up event
•  Purchase gift cards to say thank you to friends, family, or colleagues
•  Refer friends to Soothe and earn free services

raw_data.releaseNotes: We regularly update the Soothe app to ensure it’s running smoothly for all our clients. Update to the latest release to see all the latest services and providers faster and easier!

The Kris Carr app is home to Inner Circle Wellness—the all-in-one wellness hub where you’ll be taken care of every step of the way.

In this private community, you can experience a powerful combination of expert coaching, monthly wellness plans, supportive connections, and simple tools to stay on track and experience your healthiest and most vibrant season yet!

Each month, you can look forward to:
+ Health & Mindset Coaching
+ Nutrition Coaching
+ Weekly Q&A With Our Registered Dietician
+ Fitness Coaching
+ Full Library of Recipes & Cooking Classes
+ Stress-Melting Meditations
+ Quarterly Surprises
+ Loving Support & Accountability

Plus 200+ easy recipes that you and your family will love!

Women in our community have…

+ Increased their strength & stamina
+ Wow'd their doctors
+ Improved their blood work

apps.title: SIX Emotional Wellness Tracker
apps.description:
SIX turns the Apple Watch or wearable you already own into a personal dashboard for mental and emotional wellness. Using 20+ years of neuroscience, it reveals what lifts your energy, lowers your stress, and helps you thrive.

You’ll see exactly how your brain responds to everyday moments—so you can do more of what moves you and less of what drains you.

WHAT YOU GET WITH SIX
• Live Emotional Fitness Scores: See how your brain responds in real time—measured as Value (emotional resonance) and Safety (stress vs. calm).
• Daily Key Moments: Automatically capture the six most emotionally meaningful moments your brain experiences each day.
• Mood & Energy Forecasts: Know how you’ll feel tomorrow—plan, recover, and perform with clarity.
• Local Recommendations: Personalized suggestions for local finds, media, and podcasts that are likely to create Key Moments for you.
• Personalized Insights: Discover what fuels your mood, energy, and focus—and repeat what works.
• No Extra Hardware Needed: Works with Apple Watch, WHOOP, Oura Ring, Fitbit, Garmin & more.

WHO IT’S FOR
SIX is built for anyone who wants to live more intentionally and feel more like themselves—whether you’re tracking health goals or avoiding burnout.

Perfect for:
• Biohackers and self-optimizers
• People focused on stress recovery or burnout prevention
• Coaches and therapists who want to track client emotional fitness
• Anyone already tracking sleep, recovery, or heart rate

WHY IT WORKS
SIX measures your brain’s emotional response using biometric signals tied to oxytocin and dopamine—neurochemicals behind motivation, connection, and well-being.

You’ll finally have an objective, science-backed view of what helps you feel and function at your best. No journaling. No guesswork.

SAFE, PRIVATE & SECURE
Biometric data never leaves your phone, and your emotional data is encrypted, anonymized, and never sold. You’re always in control—only you can choose to share your data.

GET STARTED ON YOUR EMOTIONAL FITNESS JOURNEY
1. Download SIX (it’s FREE!)
2. Connect your compatible wearable
3. Start tracking your emotional fitness and uncovering your Key Moments

GO PREMIUM FOR DEEPER INSIGHTS
Beyond free features, new users get an exclusive 5-day trial of SIX Premium:
-Full history of your daily scores
-Monthly mood and energy views
-Top 5 & bottom 5 emotional moments
-Forecasts of future energy & mood
-View Key Moments for friends
-Live emotional data (past hour & day)
-Ability to invite others to see if their brain loves your content

Subscription Details
-Auto-renewing subscription for SIX Premium
-Subscription price may vary based on location
-Payment charged to iTunes Account at time of purchase
-Subscription charged to credit card via iTunes account
-Subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before current period ends
-Free 5-day Premium trial cannot be canceled once activated; any unused portion of the trial period is forfeited if you delete the app
-Manage or cancel your subscription anytime in our app via Settings or your App Store Account Settings. We cannot cancel it on your behalf.

For help, email support@your6.com
Follow us: @thesixapp on Instagram & TikTok
Learn more: https://your6.com
Privacy Policy: https://your6.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://your6.com/legal

apps.title: Kun Being: Workforce Wellness
apps.description:
Welcome to Kun Being, the ultimate platform for stress relief, productivity, and corporate wellness. Our dynamic platform is focused on promoting wellness and meditation for the workforce, serving Arabic speakers globally.

At Kun Being, we understand the pressures of modern life, and we're here to help you manage stress, improve productivity, and enhance your overall health and wellbeing. Our platform offers a range of tools and resources, including meditation and breathing exercises, mindfulness practices, and relationship-building strategies.

Kun Being App is designed to help you manage your stress and prevent burnout, allowing you to stay focused and productive throughout the workday. We understand that stress can impact your emotional and physical health, which is why we're committed to providing you with the support you need to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

What to expect from using Kun Being?
• Dealing with Anxiety & Reducing Stress
• Self-Love & Compassion
• Focus & Concentration
• Reduce stress & Self-care
• Increase positivity
• Improve the level of focus
• Improve energy levels
• Improve sleep
• Designed for stress relief

Our platform features a variety of meditation and breathing exercises that can help you relax, reduce anxiety, and improve your overall sense of wellbeing. We also offer resources to help you build stronger relationships with your colleagues and loved ones, enhancing your social and emotional wellness.

Kun Being is the ultimate destination for corporate wellness, offering a range of resources and tools to help you build a healthier, happier workforce. Our platform is designed to help you promote mindfulness, reduce stress, and improve employee health and wellbeing.

Whether you're looking to improve your own health and wellness or enhance the productivity and wellbeing of your team, Kun Being has everything you need to succeed. So why wait? Download our app today and start experiencing the benefits of stress relief, productivity, and corporate wellness for yourself!

At Kun Being, we believe that corporate wellness is essential for maintaining a healthy and productive workforce. Our platform is designed to promote health and wellbeing in all aspects of life, from physical health to mental and emotional wellbeing. With Kun Being, you'll have access to a comprehensive set of tools and resources that will help you achieve your wellness goals and thrive in your professional and personal life.

Kun Being App Features:
• Guided Meditations: A range of guided meditations for different themes and lengths, designed to reduce stress, promote mindfulness, and improve emotional well-being.
• Mindfulness Exercises: Mindfulness exercises and techniques to help users increase awareness and presence, reduce stress, and improve emotional regulation.
• Breathing Exercises: Breathing exercises and techniques designed to improve focus, reduce stress, and promote relaxation.
• Progress Tracking: Tools for tracking user progress, providing insights into the frequency and duration of meditation sessions over time, helping users stay motivated, and measure the benefits of meditation on their health.
• Corporate Wellness Programs: Corporate wellness programs that can be customized for businesses, providing workshops on mindfulness, stress management, and other topics to improve the mental health and productivity of employees.

We also believe that strong relationships are key to a healthy work-life balance. That's why we offer exercises and resources designed to help you improve your communication skills and build stronger, more meaningful connections with your colleagues and loved ones.

So why wait? Download Kun Being today and start taking control of your health and wellbeing. With our app, you'll have everything you need to manage stress, improve productivity, and enhance your overall quality of life.

Kun Being is the ultimate destination for corporate wellness, offering a range of resources and tools to help you build a healthier, happier workforce. Our platform is designed to help you promote mindfulness, reduce stress, and improve employee health and wellbeing.

Whether you're looking to improve your own health and wellness or enhance the productivity and wellbeing of your team, Kun Being has everything you need to succeed. So why wait? Download our app today and start experiencing the benefits of stress relief, productivity, and corporate wellness for yourself!

At Kun Being, we believe that corporate wellness is essential for maintaining a healthy and productive workforce. Our platform is designed to promote health and wellbeing in all aspects of life, from physical health to mental and emotional wellbeing. With Kun Being, you'll have access to a comprehensive set of tools and resources that will help you achieve your wellness goals and thrive in your professional and personal life.

Kun Being App Features:
• Guided Meditations: A range of guided meditations for different themes and lengths, designed to reduce stress, promote mindfulness, and improve emotional well-being.
• Mindfulness Exercises: Mindfulness exercises and techniques to help users increase awareness and presence, reduce stress, and improve emotional regulation.
• Breathing Exercises: Breathing exercises and techniques designed to improve focus, reduce stress, and promote relaxation.
• Progress Tracking: Tools for tracking user progress, providing insights into the frequency and duration of meditation sessions over time, helping users stay motivated, and measure the benefits of meditation on their health.
• Corporate Wellness Programs: Corporate wellness programs that can be customized for businesses, providing workshops on mindfulness, stress management, and other topics to improve the mental health and productivity of employees.

We also believe that strong relationships are key to a healthy work-life balance. That's why we offer exercises and resources designed to help you improve your communication skills and build stronger, more meaningful connections with your colleagues and loved ones.

So why wait? Download Kun Being today and start taking control of your health and wellbeing. With our app, you'll have everything you need to manage stress, improve productivity, and enhance your overall quality of life.

apps.title: Walkingspree
apps.description:
Walkingspree: Transforming Workplace Wellbeing through Fun Group Activity Programs

Walkingspree partners with employers and insurers to reduce healthcare costs by encouraging members to stay active through an engaging and motivating group program. Our innovative wellness solution leverages modern technology to deliver proven results. Learn more at [www.walkingspree.com]

Program Overview
The Walkingspree Activity program seamlessly integrates with Fitbit, Garmin, Apple Health, and Smartphones to track daily progress, set goals, and compete in fun, company-wide challenges. Our open platform also connects with Apple Health Kit and Google Fit, allowing almost any activity tracker or mobile app to share validated data with Walkingspree. This makes it easy for members to join using their existing devices.

Membership Details
This program is exclusively available to members whose employers or health insurers sponsor Walkingspree. Your participation is funded by your sponsor.

Features
- Goal Setting & Tracking: Quickly set personal and program goals and monitor your progress.
- Detailed Statistics: View your activity statistics by day, week, month, quarter, year, or a custom date range.
- Top Walkers: See the top performers in your group and track your ranking.
- Team Competitions: Stay motivated with team challenges.
- Social Engagement: Invite friends, compare stats, and motivate each other.
- Challenge Tracking: View your individual and team challenge progress.
- Fun Challenges: Participate in virtual walks, nutrition challenges, team tournaments, and more.
- Achievement Badges & Points: Earn badges and points for your activities and challenges, which employers may use for incentives.
- Device Syncing: Automatically syncs with Fitbit, Garmin Connect, Google Fit, Apple Health, or Samsung Health.
- Progress Notifications: Receive updates for challenges, badges, and program news.
- Online Store: Browse and purchase activity trackers. Employers may enable payroll deduct or offer subsidies for purchases.
- Comprehensive Member Support: Access built-in support for device and program assistance.
- Customizable Appearance: Choose from three image sets to tailor the app's look for your organization.
- White-Glove Account Management: Enjoy premium account management services.
- Food & Calorie Tracking: Log your meals and calories on the go with access to a database of 65,000 food items and 7,000 recipes. Track calories burned versus consumed.

Need Help?
Experiencing issues with setup, device connection, or the program? Contact us via the app or at support@walkingspree.com

Interested in our Workplace Wellbeing Program?
For inquiries about employer-sponsored programs, please reach out to us at [sales@walkingspree.com]

apps.title: Simple Habit Sleep, Meditation
apps.description:
Simple Habit is the #1 app for your wellness & sleep recommended by top mental health experts.

Try Simple Habit for free today and join over 5 million people on this life-changing journey. Sleep better and be happier in your life, marriage, parenthood, work, and health.

Our wellness & sleep therapy sessions offer guided mindfulness & meditation, daily motivation, guided sleep sessions and coaching by world-renowned experts, personalized for the way you live your life. We’ll help you feel less stressed, get better sleep and be your best self whether you have 5 minutes in the morning, 20 minutes during your commute or need to fall asleep quickly. Start your Simple Habit today and live better every day.


FEATURED ON
* Shark Tank Season Premiere 2017
* #1 in Apple’s "New Apps We Love” 2016
* #1 in Apple's "Health & Fitness - Meditation & Mindfulness" 2016

WHY SIMPLE HABIT?

MINDFULNESS AND MEDITATION
• Just 5-minutes of mindfulness and meditation per day can improve your life through stress relief and improved sleep
• New meditation guided by the world’s best experts, from mindfulness experts at Google to former monks
• Track your progress and stay motivated with Mindful Minutes
• Access meditations offline with our Premium subscription so you can meditate at any time

WELLNESS FOR YOUR BUSY LIFESTYLE
• Perfect for busy lifestyles— listen when you wake up, drive, or go to sleep
• Sessions designed for life’s daily problems
• Use Simple Habit's On-the-Go feature to quickly calm your anxiety to achieve a sense of mindfulness

HEALTH AND RELAXATION
• Sleep better
• Relieve stress
• Manage anxiety and depression
• And more

FIND MOTIVATION
• Coaching content
• Motivational talks
• Streak tracking and mindful minutes to track your progress

BENEFITS OF USING SIMPLE HABIT
• Build a meditation habit
• Get a better night’s sleep
• Motivation in your pocket
• Improve focus
• Reduce stress and anxiety
• Stay calm and relaxed
• Increased self-awareness
• Be an effective leader
• Breathe deeper and easier
• Increased sense of perspective
• Achieve mindfulness on the go
• Calm down and relax at the end of a long day
• Tackle different life challenges in a calm, focused manner
• Improve relationships
• Be happier, more relaxed, and calm

APPLE HEALTH INTEGRATION
• Optionally integrate your meditations with Apple Health by connecting your meditations with Mindful Minutes!
• Accept the prompt to allow Simple Habit to record your mindful minutes in Apple Health, or manually turn it on in Settings.

GET UNLIMITED ACCESS WITH PREMIUM
Simple Habit offers two auto-renewing subscription options to help you achieve mindfulness and breathe easier. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when a subscription is purchased. These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

CONNECT WITH SIMPLE HABIT
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/simplehabitapp/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/simplehabitapp/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/simplehabitapp

Have questions or feedback? Reach out to us at feedback@simplehabit.com.

Thanks for using Simple Habit :)
Privacy Policy - https://www.simplehabit.com/privacy
Terms and Conditions - https://www.simplehabit.com/tos

apps.title: SHA Wellness Clinic
apps.description:
Enjoy new ways of taking care of yourself. With the SHA Wellness Clinic App you can take advantage of your stay and benefit from a variety of features, allowing you to optimize your experience. In fact, you will help us to protect the environment by reducing the use of paper. 

Access directly to your personalized and updated agenda in real time, add treatments according to your preferences and set alerts so you don't miss any appointment. Also, you can check your nutrition plan, health prescriptions, discover the group activities on our Healthy Living Academy and receive daily recommendations as well as plans for the next day. Available in two languages, English and Spanish. 

Do not miss the opportunity to be closer to SHA, before, during and after your stay.

apps.title: Lume: Stress & Wellness Coach
apps.description:
Lume: Your Path to Stress-Free Living

Lume is your personal stress tracker and wellness companion, designed to help you understand, manage, and reduce stress in your daily life. Whether you're dealing with work pressures, personal challenges, or just looking to improve your overall well-being, Lume provides the tools and insights you need to stay balanced and in control.


KEY FEATURES

Proactive Monitoring & Red Zone Alerts: Stay one step ahead by detecting potential stressors before they escalate. Get notified when your stress or anxiety levels reach critical points, so you can take immediate action.

Personal Check-Ins & Tailored Suggestions: Regular check-ins keep you connected to your mental well-being. Receive personalized recommendations, like taking a walk or connecting with friends, to help you manage stress effectively.

Progress Tracking & Comprehensive Insights: Track your journey with detailed analytics and gain insights into your stress patterns. See your progress over time and make informed decisions to enhance your well-being.


WHY CHOOSE LUME?

Lume is more than just a stress tracker—it's a comprehensive tool for enhancing your mental well-being. By focusing on daily wellness pillars, Lume encourages you to live a balanced life, helping you reduce stress and improve your overall health. Our science-backed techniques and personalized insights fit seamlessly into your daily routine, empowering you to take control of your stress and live a more fulfilling life.

Take the First Step to a Calmer You

Download Lume today and start your journey towards a stress-free life. With Lume, you’re never alone in your wellness journey—discover how our app can help you achieve greater peace of mind, one day at a time.


SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS

Download and use Lume for free. Choose among auto-renewing subscriptions to upgrade to Lume Pro. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. If offered, any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Lume writes & reads your data from HealthKit. Processing happens and stays on your device. Always.

Lume is NOT a medical device nor a substitute for medical advice. For that, stick to your physician.

Terms of service: https://tranquiltech.io/lume/terms
Privacy policy: https://tranquiltech.io/lume/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
What’s New in Lume

We’ve got a calming update for you:

Custom Breathing Settings: You can now personalize your breathing sessions by adjusting inhale, exhale, and hold durations to match your rhythm.

Improved Trends Screen: Dive deeper into your wellness journey with an upgraded trends screen — now more interactive, with detailed insights just a tap away.

We’re always working to help you stay balanced and in tune with your stress. Your feedback means the world — thank you for being part of the Lume community

apps.title: Therabody
apps.description:
The Therabody app gives you personalized guidance on how to recover faster, enhance athletic performance, reduce tension, and even sleep better with your Therabody products. Based on your unique needs, activity tracking, and now with Coach: Intelligent recovery planning designed to help you perform – and feel – better every day. 

Once you pair with a compatible Theragun massage gun, SmartGoggles eye and temple massager, SleepMask, RecoveryAir or JetBoots compression pants, WaveRoller, WaveDuo, WaveSolo muscle rollers, ThermBack LED advanced back wrap, or TheraFace PRO LED light and microcurrent facial device, you can start moving towards your fitness, wellness, and skincare goals. 


A COACH IN YOUR POCKET 

Powered by AI, Coach by Therabody creates intelligent, personalized recovery plans based on your fitness goals, activity data, and latest scientific research. Designed for Theragun, Coach updates your recovery plan daily with your activities and changing needs. It notifies you in real-time with customized, science-backed recommendations to help you use your Theragun for more effective recovery. 


ACTIVITY TRACKING AND WEARABLES SYNCING 

Record activities using your favorite health and fitness wearable devices or apps. You can track runs, walks, hikes, bike rides, workouts, yoga, and dozens more. Just sync the Therabody app with your favorite device including Garmin, Apple Health and Strava, and your activities from your connected wearables will sync in real-time so that you have the most effective recovery plan based on your day. 


MASSAGE GUN TRACKING 

Theragun is the only massage gun that syncs your recovery data to a fitness app in real time — tracking therapy types, session length and speed, even when you’re not using the app*. That means you’ll always get credit for your recovery sessions and receive personalized recommendations tailored to your routine.   


GUIDED ROUTINES DESIGNED BY EXPERTS 

Eliminate any guesswork and explore our library of step-by-step guided routines that show exactly how to use your device, where to use it on your body, and for how long. From recovering your legs after a long run, to relieving that pesky back pain after a long workday, you’ll find the treatment you need, designed by our team of science and physiology experts including physical therapists, trainers, chiropractors, and scientists. 


BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY FOR ADVANCED CONTROLS 

With Bluetooth connectivity, use the Therabody app to fine-tune your settings with more precise control. Adjust the exact speed of your Theragun, tweak the heat on your SmartGoggles, adjust the LED light for your TheraFace PRO, or soften the vibration of your Wave Roller to provide your body what feels best. Plus, routines will automatically apply any recommended settings and tell you when to switch positions or attachments. 

 
*Offline session tracking only available for Theragun PRO Plus, Theragun Prime Plus, Theragun Sense (1st and 2nd Gen), Theragun Prime 6th Gen, and Theragun Mini 3rd Gen.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
With this release, our app now supports our 3 newest massage guns:

• Theragun Mini Plus with heat, Theragun Sense 2nd Gen and Theragun Prime 6th Gen!
• This includes personalized Coach recommendations for intelligent recovery across all 3 devices.
raw_data.description:
The Therabody app gives you personalized guidance on how to recover faster, enhance athletic performance, reduce tension, and even sleep better with your Therabody products. Based on your unique needs, activity tracking, and now with Coach: Intelligent recovery planning designed to help you perform – and feel – better every day. 

Once you pair with a compatible Theragun massage gun, SmartGoggles eye and temple massager, SleepMask, RecoveryAir or JetBoots compression pants, WaveRoller, WaveDuo, WaveSolo muscle rollers, ThermBack LED advanced back wrap, or TheraFace PRO LED light and microcurrent facial device, you can start moving towards your fitness, wellness, and skincare goals. 


A COACH IN YOUR POCKET 

Powered by AI, Coach by Therabody creates intelligent, personalized recovery plans based on your fitness goals, activity data, and latest scientific research. Designed for Theragun, Coach updates your recovery plan daily with your activities and changing needs. It notifies you in real-time with customized, science-backed recommendations to help you use your Theragun for more effective recovery. 


ACTIVITY TRACKING AND WEARABLES SYNCING 

Record activities using your favorite health and fitness wearable devices or apps. You can track runs, walks, hikes, bike rides, workouts, yoga, and dozens more. Just sync the Therabody app with your favorite device including Garmin, Apple Health and Strava, and your activities from your connected wearables will sync in real-time so that you have the most effective recovery plan based on your day. 


MASSAGE GUN TRACKING 

Theragun is the only massage gun that syncs your recovery data to a fitness app in real time — tracking therapy types, session length and speed, even when you’re not using the app*. That means you’ll always get credit for your recovery sessions and receive personalized recommendations tailored to your routine.   


GUIDED ROUTINES DESIGNED BY EXPERTS 

Eliminate any guesswork and explore our library of step-by-step guided routines that show exactly how to use your device, where to use it on your body, and for how long. From recovering your legs after a long run, to relieving that pesky back pain after a long workday, you’ll find the treatment you need, designed by our team of science and physiology experts including physical therapists, trainers, chiropractors, and scientists. 


BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY FOR ADVANCED CONTROLS 

With Bluetooth connectivity, use the Therabody app to fine-tune your settings with more precise control. Adjust the exact speed of your Theragun, tweak the heat on your SmartGoggles, adjust the LED light for your TheraFace PRO, or soften the vibration of your Wave Roller to provide your body what feels best. Plus, routines will automatically apply any recommended settings and tell you when to switch positions or attachments. 

 
*Offline session tracking only available for Theragun PRO Plus, Theragun Prime Plus, Theragun Sense (1st and 2nd Gen), Theragun Prime 6th Gen, and Theragun Mini 3rd Gen.

apps.title: Fullscript
apps.description:
Manage your supplement and medication routine with tools that keep you on track.

The Fullscript app gives you a way to order high-quality, clinically-effective supplements. It also gives you the tools you need to keep your wellness on track, no matter how busy life gets.

With easy-to-use tools and features, it’s a simple way to manage your supplement and medication routine, as well as work more closely with your provider—all in one place.

Tools to stay on track
Unlock exclusive, mobile-only tools like dose reminders and medication tracking. You can also access Fullscript features like auto refills, or refill on-the-go in just a few taps.

Provider guidance 24/7
By using Fullscript, you’ll be giving your provider a better view of your routine so they’ll be able to suggest products, give insights, and adjust doses in real time.

Order trusted products the easy way
Use Fullscript to easily order leading supplements right to your door with fast, free shipping on orders over USD $50 and CAD $150.

Quality Assured
We invest $10 million annually in our Fullscript Quality Program, making sure you and your provider can trust the products that support your care.

Currently, the app is only available to patients in the US and Canada.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’ve made a few behind-the-scenes improvements to keep your experience running smoothly.

apps.description:
Be Well is a challenge-led wellbeing platform built to change behavior and build habits that help employees thrive, even on the most demanding days.  
 
It connects people through movement, tracks what matters and delivers personalized content across four pillars of wellbeing: physical, mental, workplace and personal.  
 
With a focus on support, connection and sustained engagement, Be Well turns healthy actions into lasting routines.

apps.title: meOrigin: daily wellness
apps.description:
Achieve your wellness goals with a daily wellness program featuring personalized health tips, quick morning workouts, a meal planner, fasting and water trackers, guided meditations, breathing exercises and more. Plus, you can order a daily multivitamin to make the most out of your wellness program by filling nutrient gaps in your diet.


ACHIEVE YOUR WELLNESS GOALS

• Achieve healthy weight with a meal planner, nutrition tips and a calorie tracker
• Build healthy habits with personalized tips and quick masterclasses about well-being
• Get fit with 100+ quick morning workouts
• Manage stress better and improve sleep with meditations and breathing sessions
• Control fasting windows and water intake with trackers
• Get support from our experts in nutrition, fitness, and mental health
• Order the daily multivitamin and use the vitamin reminder to build a new consistent wellness routine


HOW DOES IT WORK? IT'S SIMPLE

1. Build your daily wellness program
Tell us about yourself, your goals, and your lifestyle to personalize the program.

2. Follow your daily program
From guided workouts to health tips, it will take you only 10 minutes a day on average.

3. Maximize the benefits of your program
Supplement your program with the daily multivitamin to build a holistic wellness routine.


Time for a healthier you. Download now and join the community.

apps.title: Revitalize Wellness
apps.description:
Welcome to Revitalize Wellness – Your Path to Optimal Health!
Founded in 2017 by Katie and Craig Gironda, Revitalize Wellness is more than a supplement company—it’s a mission rooted in the power of orthomolecular medicine.

Katie’s journey began with frustration over her declining health and conventional medicine’s limitations. In 2014, an online health board introduced her to the life-changing benefits of Vitamin C. Inspired by her recovery, she created the Vitamin C and Orthomolecular Medicine for Optimal Health Facebook group, now a thriving community of over 90,000 members sharing scientific insights and healing stories.

Determined to make high-quality supplements accessible, Katie and Craig launched Revitalize Wellness, prioritizing purity and affordability.

In 2023, new owners—Hendrick, Marlene, and Jason Klop—joined the mission, bringing fresh expertise to continue delivering premium wellness solutions.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• New and improved user accounts
• Easier and faster checkout 
• View and keep track of your orders

apps.title: Alive by Whitney Simmons
apps.description:
It’s a beautiful day to be Alive!

Placing your physical and mental wellness at the forefront, Alive was designed to offer a safe and empowering space for women to build strength, confidence, and lifelong habits.

Created by fitness experts, Alive meets you exactly where you are in your journey and guides you toward becoming your strongest, most confident self from the inside and out

Alive App Features
- Simple, intuitive design focused on your workout experience
- 20+ guided programs to match your goals and fitness level
- 30-day mental & physical wellness challenges
- 200+ daily workouts to mix and match
- Beginner, Intermediate, and advance difficulty levels
- Select between gym and at-home equipment options

Meet the Trainers
- Whitney Simmons - Leads with a well rounded strength training, focused to help maximize strength utilizing progressive overload, and creating a balanced physique.
- Madeleine Abeid - Certified classic mat Pilates instructor with experience in sculpt & fusion practice. Bringing mat pilates to Alive in a follow along format.
- Libby Christensen - Brings your strength to the next level by utilizing progressive overload training adaptions with an emphasis on compound movements
- Marissa McNamara - Uses her power training systems to build maximum strength, placing an emphasis on compound movements.
- Felicia Keathley - Primarily focuses to help you master essential and foundational exercises. Also known for her pregnancy and postpartum programing.

Programs
Choose from over 20 expert-designed programs. Each program guides you through a structured schedule across several week so you can focus less on planning and more on showing up.

Challenges
Our 30-day challenges are where fitness and mindfulness meet with daily journal prompts, mobility sessions, and habits to support your mental and physical well-being.

Daily Workouts
Don’t want a set program? Choose from 200+ daily workouts across categories like HIIT, core, pull, push, and more. Perfect for mixing things up or staying on track when life gets busy.

Your Journey
The path to a fit, healthy life is a journey, not an overnight process. Stay motivated by logging weight, photos, and completed workouts. See your growth over time and earn achievements along the way. Sync with Apple Health for a complete view of your activity.

Alive Premium
Alive is free to download with Premium plans (Monthly or Annual), both with a 7-day free trial. Premium unlocks full access to all programs, challenges, and daily workouts.

Your subscription will be charged to your Apple account and will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends. 

You may manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. After purchase, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. You agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions by downloading and subscribing to Alive Premium.

https://aliveapp.co/terms
https://aliveapp.co/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
General bug fixes and performance updates.

NEED HELP?
Email us at support@aliveapp.co

apps.title: SoWa Health + Wellness.
apps.description:
We aim to be an essential element in the daily pursuit of health and wellness for individuals and communities by providing results-driven fitness experiences and meaningful social connections in an encouraging and inclusive environment.

Our app gives our members access to all their benefits and more and helps bring the SoWa Health + Wellness community with them everywhere they go.

With the app, you can:

-View and reserve a spot in group fitness classes
-Book time in our Trackman Golf Simulator Bays
-Book sessions with Personal Trainers
-Reserve time in our two recovery lounges
-Contact and connect with our team
-Stay in-the-know on important announcements and events

APPLE HEALTHKIT
We also use HealthKit to allow users to share their activity and workout data with the app. This data is used to incentivise users to stay active.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thanks for using our app! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. Updates will include new features, fixes and performance improvements.

apps.title: Serenity: Wellness Tracker
apps.description:
Transform Your Mornings, Transform Your Life

“The quality of your morning determines the rest of your day!”

Start each day with purpose and productivity using the Morning Routine Habit Tracker. Reduce decision fatigue, stay focused, and accomplish more everyday.

“It’s not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.” — Tony Robbins

Featured on Product Hunt

“Great Product! I find the mornings are a great time to make important decisions for the day.”

KEY FEATURES

	•	Create Unlimited Habits

Customize your routine with unlimited habits. 

	•	Voice Guidance

Enable Voice Over for hands-free voice instructions.

	•	Build Unlimited Routines

Design morning, night, school, gym routines, and more. (Premium feature)

	•	Daily Reminders

Stay on track with helpful notifications.

	•	Flexible Scheduling

Select specific weekdays for each routine.

	•	Routine Tracking

Build, adjust, and monitor your routines to develop the best habits.

	•	Smart Timer

Set a time for each task once and reuse it daily.

	•	Short breathing session. 
Take a minute to focus your mind with integrated breathing exercises, synced with the Health App’s mindfulness minutes.

BOOST YOUR PRODUCTIVITY

Our smart timer guides you smoothly from one activity to the next, even if your phone is locked. Receive timely notifications to keep you on schedule.

ENHANCE YOUR FOCUS

Join successful people who follow structured morning routines to achieve their goals. Focus on key activities that drive progress in your life.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS

View detailed stats from the past week or month to see how you’re spending your time. Identify areas for improvement and celebrate your consistency.

USER-FRIENDLY FEATURES

	•	Prevent Screen Lock

Keep the timer visible by preventing automatic screen lock within the app.

	•	Custom Alerts

Choose between sound alerts, vibrations, or both.

	•	Offline Functionality

No internet connection required; all data is stored on your device.

BIG SCREEN READY

	•	Screen mirroring capable fills your big screen with the routine's image + live timer


FEEL BETTER EVERY DAY

Completing small tasks boosts satisfaction and fosters positive thinking, leading to increased productivity and well-being.

WHAT OUR USERS SAY

	•	“Great idea and design. I try to be more effective in the morning but my time management isn’t good. :)”
	•	“Super helpful. Love not having to think about the order of my routine each day. Good work!”
	•	“I was one of the people who complained about the design of the app. The redesign looks much better.”

START YOUR TRANSFORMATION TODAY

If you’ve read books like The Miracle Morning, The Slight Edge, or The Compound Effect but struggled to implement their strategies, this app is your solution. Track your time, build new habits, and make lasting changes.

DOWNLOAD NOW AND SEE GREAT IMPROVEMENTS IN YOUR LIFE!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Morning Routine becomes Serenity: Wellness tracker. 

Thanks for your patience and feedback. The app has been improved in so many ways:

- New dashboard
- New Journaling feature - including Voice journaling for premium users
- New Todos feature (up to 5 free todos, but as many "done" as you want...) premium users can create unlimited Todos - Interactive widget included!
- New Mood tracking feature with interactive widget
- New button to add 15s to your current habit during a live routine
- You can skip a habit OR mark as completed
- Reset all habits' progress in a routine with just one tap
- Duplicate routines
- Bug fix: first habit being repeated + reordering

apps.title: Nispand: Wellness SuperApp
apps.description:
Transform your mind & body with 1500+ meditation, pranayamas & asanas. Join free daily yoga classes. Try free for 7 days – No upfront payment commitment

A journey of a 1000 miles begins with a small step.  Take the first step of your wellness journey with Nispand.

Developed by the legendary The Yoga Institute, the world’s oldest yoga institute with over 106 years of yogic wisdom, Nispand is the First of its kind and the ONLY Wellness App that brings together yoga asanas for physical fitness, strength & flexibility; Meditations & pranayamas for mental wellbeing, calmness & peace; Expert Health insights through workshops, courses & masterclasses; Daily 1 hr free live online yoga classes; 1-1 consultations for diet & counselling; Health tracking, etc. –
 
You have it All in One App. Nispand is truly a Wellness Superapp.

In Nispand, Yoga is as in scriptures. Simplified but Not Modified - “Yoga Made Simple” for the common man. 

The content is from The Yoga Institute – Authentic and well researched.
Nispand has been honoured as a winner in Startup India’s Yoga Tech Challenge 2024, supported by the Ministry of AYUSH. 

Why Choose Nispand?

Nispand offers a comprehensive and structured approach to holistic wellness that blends authentic traditional yogic wisdom with cutting edge technology. 

1000+ meditations & pranayamas that helps to manage stress, sleep better, improve mental clarity & emotional well-being.

500+ asanas to build physical strength and for fitness & flexibility.
Yoga on the go: Short & effective Yoga Sessions - 10 Minutes Yoga, 90 sec Meditations, Yoga at work.

A special section for yoga specifically curated for women. 

A special section for managing lifestyle related disorders like hypertension, diabetes, back & joint pains, respiratory problems, etc.

Get Health insights form experts from the free courses and workshops. 

Get personalised expert consultations for diet, counselling and 1-1 asana sessions.

Daily 1 hr free online live yoga classes for those who prefer live classes and to facilitate habit building.  

Nispand has it all. All in One place.

So Your Wellness is in your Palms. 

Practice yoga for What ever you want, When ever & Where ever you want and for What ever time that you may have at hand.  

Key Features of Nispand

For Your Mind:

1000+ Guided Meditations for better sleep, focus, stress relief, and personality development.

Ancient Mantras & Chants to restore inner peace.

Pranayama & Breathing exercises to calm your mind.

Binaural Beats & Solfeggio Frequencies for deeper relaxation.

For Your Body:

500+ Asana videos to build flexibility, strength, and detox your body.
Customized Yoga Routines for beginners to advanced practitioners.
Targeted Yoga Programs for weight loss, mobility, and endurance.

Live Interaction

Daily Live free online interactive yoga sessions led by certified experienced instructors

Personalized Health Insights & Consultations – Get 1-on-1 sessions with yoga experts, dieticians, mental wellness counsellors, and therapists.

Health Insights & Wellness Workshops:

Expert-Led Courses & Workshops on Happiness, stress management, pranayama and detox.

Masterclasses - Online sessions covering multiple topics on yoga & wellness

For Holistic Growth & Tracking:

Comprehensive Progress Tracking to monitor your wellness journey.
Recommendations for yoga and meditation based on ML algorithms. 

Sync with Health & Fitness Trackers to optimize results.

Curated soundscapes & playlists to enhance focus and relaxation.

Nispand is created by The Yoga Institute, backed by 106+ years of yoga expertise.  A pioneer in making authentic yogic wisdom accessible to modern lifestyles. Our techniques are scientifically researched, time-tested, and deeply rooted in traditional yoga philosophy.

Join a global movement toward mindful living. Empower yourself with Nispand’s holistic wellness solutions and take control of your wellbeing today!

Transform your mind & body with 1500+ meditation, pranayamas & asanas. Join free daily yoga classes. Try free for 7 days – No upfront payment commitment

A journey of a 1000 miles begins with a small step.  Take the first step of your wellness journey with Nispand.

Developed by the legendary The Yoga Institute, the world’s oldest yoga institute with over 106 years of yogic wisdom, Nispand is the First of its kind and the ONLY Wellness App that brings together yoga asanas for physical fitness, strength & flexibility; Meditations & pranayamas for mental wellbeing, calmness & peace; Expert Health insights through workshops, courses & masterclasses; Daily 1 hr free live online yoga classes; 1-1 consultations for diet & counselling; Health tracking, etc. –
 
You have it All in One App. Nispand is truly a Wellness Superapp.

In Nispand, Yoga is as in scriptures. Simplified but Not Modified - “Yoga Made Simple” for the common man. 

The content is from The Yoga Institute – Authentic and well researched.
Nispand has been honoured as a winner in Startup India’s Yoga Tech Challenge 2024, supported by the Ministry of AYUSH. 

Why Choose Nispand?

Nispand offers a comprehensive and structured approach to holistic wellness that blends authentic traditional yogic wisdom with cutting edge technology. 

1000+ meditations & pranayamas that helps to manage stress, sleep better, improve mental clarity & emotional well-being.

500+ asanas to build physical strength and for fitness & flexibility.
Yoga on the go: Short & effective Yoga Sessions - 10 Minutes Yoga, 90 sec Meditations, Yoga at work.

A special section for yoga specifically curated for women. 

A special section for managing lifestyle related disorders like hypertension, diabetes, back & joint pains, respiratory problems, etc.

Get Health insights form experts from the free courses and workshops. 

Get personalised expert consultations for diet, counselling and 1-1 asana sessions.

Daily 1 hr free online live yoga classes for those who prefer live classes and to facilitate habit building.  

Nispand has it all. All in One place.

So Your Wellness is in your Palms. 

Practice yoga for What ever you want, When ever & Where ever you want and for What ever time that you may have at hand.  

Key Features of Nispand

For Your Mind:

1000+ Guided Meditations for better sleep, focus, stress relief, and personality development.

Ancient Mantras & Chants to restore inner peace.

Pranayama & Breathing exercises to calm your mind.

Binaural Beats & Solfeggio Frequencies for deeper relaxation.

For Your Body:

500+ Asana videos to build flexibility, strength, and detox your body.
Customized Yoga Routines for beginners to advanced practitioners.
Targeted Yoga Programs for weight loss, mobility, and endurance.

Live Interaction

Daily Live free online interactive yoga sessions led by certified experienced instructors

Personalized Health Insights & Consultations – Get 1-on-1 sessions with yoga experts, dieticians, mental wellness counsellors, and therapists.

Health Insights & Wellness Workshops:

Expert-Led Courses & Workshops on Happiness, stress management, pranayama and detox.

Masterclasses - Online sessions covering multiple topics on yoga & wellness

For Holistic Growth & Tracking:

Comprehensive Progress Tracking to monitor your wellness journey.
Recommendations for yoga and meditation based on ML algorithms. 

Sync with Health & Fitness Trackers to optimize results.

Curated soundscapes & playlists to enhance focus and relaxation.

Nispand is created by The Yoga Institute, backed by 106+ years of yoga expertise.  A pioneer in making authentic yogic wisdom accessible to modern lifestyles. Our techniques are scientifically researched, time-tested, and deeply rooted in traditional yoga philosophy.

Join a global movement toward mindful living. Empower yourself with Nispand’s holistic wellness solutions and take control of your wellbeing today!

apps.title: SociEATy: Non-Diet Wellness
apps.description:
The SociEATy App will be your guide to building a healthy, balanced, diet-free lifestyle.

Created by a Registered Dietitian, the app uses an evidence-based mix of education, gentle nutrition, reflection, and support to guide you through giving up diets, strengthening hunger and fullness cues, breaking food rules, improving body image, self-care management and building a healthy relationship with all aspects of health and wellness that lasts a lifetime.

WHAT’S INSIDE: 
DIET-FREE MEAL PLANNER: Learn how to fuel your body from a place of self-care to feel and be your best, healthiest and happiest self… all with no food rules!
MINDFULNESS JOURNAL: Our one-of-a-kind journal will guide you through learning how to listen to your body instead of diets, plans and rules. We even wrap up all of your entries into an easy-to-digest weekly summary so you can easily identify areas of strength and ones for improvement- making navigating your journey easy and crystal clear!
SELF-CARE HABIT TRACKER: You get to decide what, when and how self-care looks for you. Use our optional “Self-Care Cups” feature to stay mindful and reminded of your chosen self-care habits on a daily basis.
GUIDED TOOLS & ACTIVITIES: We’ve got you covered for everything from eating habits (mindful eating, food guilt, nutrition tips, etc.), to movement, body image, and mental/emotional wellbeing. Our Self-Care Toolbox will be your go-to for help in managing anything life throws your way!
HUNDREDS OF RECIPES: Never question if your meals are “good enough” again. All recipes are created by a Registered Dietitian with helpful descriptions and tips to make not only fueling your body easy but understanding why and how incredibly simple! We’ve got everything you need from recipes that nourish the body to ones that nourish the soul.

The SociEATy app was created by Registered Dietitian, Colleen Christensen (@no.food.rules).

If you’re looking for a balanced, sustainable approach to intuitive eating that makes it easy- this app is for you! A one-stop-shop to replace all of your other diet-culture driven food logging, meal planner, and habit tracking apps.

Privacy Policy: https://www.colleenchristensennutrition.com/privacy-policy
Subscription Terms https://www.colleenchristensennutrition.com/subscription-terms
Terms & Conditions: https://members.colleenchristensennutrition.com/terms-and-conditions/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We've added a new Daily Self-Care Cups feature to help you stay mindful of and stick to your self-care habits.
We’ve also made improvements to your journaling experience!

apps.title: MaryRuth’s
apps.description:
Introducing the MaryRuth's mobile app! Adding vitamins, supplements, and other items you want to your cart is as easy as a few taps with our easy to navigate app right at your fingertips. Find out about special sales and promos early with push notifications, plus receive special savings available only in the app!

About MaryRuth's
Here at MaryRuth’s, we have a passion for helping others take control of their own health, and think that by doing so, everyone can Move Forward Every Day with their own health + wellness goals. MaryRuth's was created with this goal in mind- to help motivate with the very small steps toward health, so you can take the bigger steps toward achieving your dreams. We believe that making the best supplements for your health means creating products with non GMO, vegan ingredients, with the fewest number of allergens as possible. We do our best to find only the highest quality ingredients and to formulate good-tasting products that assist in maintaining your health!

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’ve updated our app to provide a better experience browsing our collections, earning rewards, and shopping your favorites.

apps.title: نفس - Nafas
apps.description:
Nafas Wellbeing App: Your Path to Personal, Professional, and Family Wellness
Powered by Labayh

Step into a new era of holistic wellbeing with Nafas, an app designed to elevate your personal growth, career development, and overall health. Whether you’re an individual seeking balance or an organization aiming to enhance workplace wellness, Nafas is tailored to help you thrive.

Transform Your Life with Nafas’ Features
	•	1-on-1 Consultations: Connect with psychologists, career coaches, financial advisors, fitness trainers, and nutritionists through video, audio, or text sessions in Arabic or English.
	•	Exclusive Master Classes: Gain insights from global wellbeing experts with specialized courses for individuals and corporate employees.
	•	Fitness Programs: Explore yoga, Pilates, strength training, and more, available for all fitness levels.
	•	Breathing Techniques: Master stress-relief methods like 4-7-8 and box breathing to find calm anytime.
	•	Relaxation Soundscapes: Unwind with curated nature sounds and custom mixes for better sleep or focus.
	•	Wellbeing Library: Access the latest research and tips on mental health, family wellness, and more.
	•	Sleep Stories: Drift into restful sleep with soothing stories and wind-down routines.
	•	Guided Meditations: Balance emotions like stress, anger, or anxiety with tailored meditation programs.
	•	Mood Tracker: Monitor your emotional patterns to make positive changes and achieve self-awareness.
	•	Wellbeing & Career Assessments: Use personalized results to set goals and track growth.
	•	Habit Builder: Develop and maintain daily routines for lasting wellness.
	•	24/7 Support: Access continuous counseling and coaching whenever you need it.

For Individuals and Organizations
Nafas caters to both personal and corporate wellness needs. Organizations can offer employees access to Master Classes, fitness programs, and tailored resources, fostering productivity and reducing stress in the workplace.

Empower Every Aspect of Your Life
Whether you’re a professional, parent, or seeking a balanced lifestyle, Nafas supports holistic wellness for everyone. Begin your journey of growth and fulfillment today.

Download Nafas Wellbeing App and unlock the tools to build a balanced, empowered, and thriving life.

https://labayh.net/en/terms-conditions/

We are updating as much as possible to make it faster and more reliable. Below are some improvements you will find in the latest update:

User Experience Improvements

apps.title: Aduro
apps.description:
Aduro: Your Health & Human Performance Partner

Aduro is more than a well-being app—it’s a complete, personalized experience designed to help you thrive in every area of life. We combine the most advanced testing, personalized digital content, and real human support powered by cutting-edge AI to create a health journey as unique as you are.
 
See your whole self. Ignite what’s possible. 

We built Aduro to care for the whole person—one powerful experience that delivers real outcomes for people and the companies they work for. 
Through lifestyle insights, health assessments, precision labs, and continuous health sensors, Aduro reveals how your mind, body, and habits are connected—so you can take action where it matters most. 

The result? A complete view of your health and human performance—and the tools to make lasting change. 

What You Can Do with Aduro

-	Connect to Apple Health to make the most sense of your key health metrics
-	Free access to precision labs, screenings and assessments 
-	See the most complete view of yourself with intelligent insights
-	Explore a powerful library of content, tools and podcasts to drive lasting change at your pace
-	Connect 1:1 with health and human performance coaches to help you get unstuck and keep you motivated
-	Participate in immersive programs to prevent, manage, or even reverse chronic conditions
-	Earn rewards and incentives for healthy habits and engagement
-	Join team challenges to spark motivation and strengthen community
-	View your employer-sponsored benefits in one place

Built for You. Paid for by your employer.
 
If your employer offers Aduro, download the app to get started.  
Start your journey and unlock your full potential.

raw_data.releaseNotes: - Minor improvements to AI meal feedback (beta users only)

apps.title: EnForma: Wellness in Mexico
apps.description:
EnForma: Your All-in-One Wellness Companion

Transform your wellness journey with EnForma, the app that combines fitness, nutrition, mindfulness, and local wellness providers into one seamless experience. Whether you’re at home or traveling, EnForma makes it simple to stay healthy, energized, and inspired.

Why users love EnForma:

“Life-changing!”

“Empoweringly simple.”

“Finally, an app that fits my lifestyle.”


At Home

* Discover trusted fitness experts, yoga instructors, and nutrition coaches near you.

* Explore healthy recipes and meal options designed for your lifestyle.

* Build habits with personalized workout and mindfulness plans.


On the Go

* Stay on track while traveling with access to wellness services in new cities.

* Now available in Tulum and Puerto Escondido – two of Mexico’s top wellness destinations.

* Turn travel into an opportunity for growth, not disruption.


Tangible Benefits

* Wellness Directory: Connect with experts, studios, retreats & healthy eateries.

* Adaptive Wellness Plans: Workouts, nutrition & meditation tailored to your goals.

* Real-Time Tracking: Celebrate progress with insights & achievements.


Intangible Benefits

* Community Support: Connect with like-minded wellness seekers & professionals.

* Peace of Mind: Confidence that you can maintain wellness anywhere.

* Personal Growth: Discover new practices & integrate them into your lifestyle.

 
Features That Set EnForma Apart

* Local & global wellness provider network

* Custom fitness & mindfulness plans for your routine

* Expert guidance & professional tips

* Community features to share, inspire & stay motivated

* Bilingual; available in English and Spanish


What Our Users Say

“EnForma turned my health around. It makes staying fit and happy simple.”

“A must-have for anyone serious about wellness.”


Join the EnForma Movement

More than an app, EnForma is a community and lifestyle built around balance, health, and happiness.

Download EnForma today and redefine what wellness means to you.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
* New wellness destinations : discover providers in Tulum and Puerto Escondido.

* Better tools for coaches : wellness professionals can now promote their services for just $14.99/month.

* App improvements : performance upgrades and bug fixes for a smoother experience.

apps.title: August, Your 24/7 Health AI
apps.description:
August is your AI-powered wellness companion, designed to support your personal health journey with helpful tools and insights. Whether you're tracking daily habits, reflecting on your wellness routines, or staying motivated with gentle nudges, August is here to help you stay mindful and informed.

Key Features:

    Wellness Insights: Explore content tailored to your wellness goals, based on general lifestyle patterns—not medical advice

    Privacy First: Your data is protected with strict privacy practices.

    Daily Encouragement: Stay motivated with customizable goals and thoughtful reminders that keep your wellness on track.

    Supportive Suggestions: Receive AI-generated lifestyle tips based on your input—designed for general awareness, not diagnosis or treatment.

    Disclaimer:  August is intended for general wellness and informational purposes only. It does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a licensed   healthcare  professional for medical concerns. 


Note: Access to all features requires a subscription based on your location.

Take a step toward better balance and wellness with August—your thoughtful, AI-powered companion.Terms & Conditions: https://meetaugust.ai/termsPrivacy Policy: https://meetaugust.ai/privacy

apps.title: Peak Health & Wellness Center
apps.description:
The Peak Health & Wellness Center and Peak West Bank Landing of Great Falls, Montana offers two state-of-the-art facilities with first-class equipment, three studios, pools, gymnasium, racquetball and squash courts, a knowledgeable and friendly staff, and a squeaky clean environment.
With the Peak App, you can check-in, register for classes, track your physical activity, participate in fitness challenges, and receive important updates directly from the Club. Looking to stream classes to your phone or home computer? Talk to us about virtual classes! You have it all in the Peak App.
The Peak App is free and will keep you up-to-date on Peak happenings, including member functions and new additions.

The Peak Health & Wellness Center app uses the Health app (HealthKit) that is pre-installed on your iPhone to sync nutrients and workouts data. Because of this, the app will ask you to grant read and write access to your nutrients and workouts data.
Your Health sync data is only visible to you and is not sent to anyone but yourself.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Enhancements to improve clarity and consistency
- Performance optimisations for smoother operation
- Behind-the-scenes improvements for increased stability
- General refinements to elevate the overall user experience
- UI updates to unify and modernise the design

We are listening, please email your feedback or queries about the app on support@smarthealthclubs.com

apps.title: Holos, your wellness journey
apps.description:
Holos, your wellness journey is the corporate wellness platform where your team will enjoy sessions to improve their physical and emotional state by the best professionals.

The content on the platform is divided into the following pillars to complement your comprehensive well-being:
MOVE: Fit activities, cardio, strength training, martial arts, active breaks and much more...
RELAX: Meditation, mindfulness and internal connection.
EAT: Conscious and comprehensive nutrition.
PROSPER: Emotional intelligence, active listening, leadership, personal finance and more...
PLAY: Balance between fun and healthy.

You can do the following activities:
- Attend one-to-one sessions on psychology, nutrition, health coaching or personal finance.
- Train in live classes guided by a coach.
- Access the on-demand wellness video library (+300 videos)
- Complete programs and challenges focused on different objectives

Download the app to discover the best wellness platform in Latin America.

Privacy Policy: https://www.beholos.com/privacidad
Terms and Conditions: https://www.beholos.com/terminos

Based in the USA

apps.title: Avibra: Well-Being & Benefits
apps.description:
Avibra is the #1-rated insurance, finance, and well-being app that turns good habits and positive steps into insurance coverage. Each time you open our free app to read wellness tips, take a quiz, watch videos or listen to meditations, your insurance coverage grows—at no cost to you. Plus, you’ll improve your health, finances, career, relationships and community in the process.

Earn $15,000 of insurance by engaging with our app
Get weekly notifications about new content you can use and apply in order to build your insurance coverage without spending a dime. This content includes:

Guided Meditations—boost your mental and physical health.
Quizzes—make learning fun while you improve your well-being.
Videos—get inspired, plus learn more about health, finances, and work.
Brain Workouts—strengthen your brain activity and improve memory.
Gratitude Journal—re-discover what you’re grateful for.
10 Tips—improve your health, relationships and finances.
Avibra Yoga Studio—bring calm, peace, and balance to your life.
Relaxation Music—ease everyday stress and anxiety.
Bonus: Also turn your daily activities from your wearables into rewards (think Fitbit, Apple Health, Google Fit).

The Dollar Benefits Store
Welcome to our Dollar Benefits Store, where you can buy peace of mind for just $1/week. Purchase one benefit or several—just pay $1/week for each one you choose.

Accident Medical Benefits: Your accident medical benefit helps protect you from those high hospital bills following a covered accident such as a broken bone, concussion or burn.

Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D) Benefits: Provides a benefit payment to you or your beneficiaries if you become disabled or die in a fatal accident.

Telemedicine: Unlimited 24/7 virtual visits, 365 days a year. Telemedicine doctors can provide treatment and advice for allergies, sports injuries, skin inflammations and more.

Teletherapy: Online therapy available 7 days a week. Teletherapy counselors can provide treatment for conditions like depression, stress, eating disorders, addiction, relationship problems, anxiety, grief and more.

Life Insurance: Paid out in a single lump sum to your beneficiary upon your death, life insurance protects your loved ones when you’re gone. The money is commonly used for funeral costs, medical bills and day-to-day bills.

Cell Phone Protection: For damage (including water damage) and theft.

Risk Advisor: To monitor your risks in life, your Risk Advisor includes myRadar, myDwelling, myHealth and myRide. Each feature allows you to check for common everyday risks. The Risk Advisor uses information about your location, real-time driving habits and more to help you live smarter and safer.

Critical Illness: This benefit covers cancer, heart attack, stroke, and renal failure. The fixed lump-sum cash benefit can be used to help pay out-of-pocket medical expenses like deductibles and co-pays, or non-medical expenses like grocery delivery, childcare, and more.

Roadside Assistance: For towing, emergency tire changes, lockout, battery and fuel delivery service.

Our commitment to you
Avibra is a socially-driven company at its core, and we give back to the community on an ongoing basis. Avibra works with TIST to plant a tree each month for active users, donates regularly to important social causes, and helps you anonymously protect another family in a different state each week when you stay active in the app.

Plus, enjoy myShield for additional insurance options
Find other affordable insurance plans available for purchase in-app, including home insurance, auto insurance, renters insurance, and pet insurance.
We partner with reputable sources like Hippo Insurance, ASPCA, MSI and Matic.

Live A VIBRAnt life with Avibra and enjoy peace of mind you can afford.

Download the app now.

By downloading and using Avibra, you agree to our current Terms of Use (https://www.avibra.com/Avibra_TermsofService.pdf) and Privacy Policy (https://www.avibra.com/Avibra_PrivacyPolicy.pdf)
