apps.title: Stressbusters Wellness
apps.description:
Meet your new wellness assistant! 

Everyday, the Stressbusters app hands you your latest campus and community event happenings, exclusive how-to videos, rapid relaxation tracks, special offers, and a place to store and share your favorite health-enhancers. Success requires wellness, and the Stressbusters app updates, inspires, teaches, tames and feeds you what you need to succeed where you are and when you need it.

Get the dates, times and locations of the next Stressbusters and other local wellness events. Learn from the exclusive Videostream of guru interviews and demos  from around the world and around you. Chill instantly with Quick Calm, Go Coastal and other timeout tracks in the Break Pad sonic spa. Join Stressbusters app'ers everywhere who are making health their prerequisite for life.

Launch the app, choose your location and let the Stressbusters app do the rest. Your campus wellness team will keep you in the know about local activities, resources and important news. Stressbusters will put even more health in your hands with segments to improve your sleep, focus, energy, test taking, interviews, athletic performances, public speaking, nutrition, moods and just about everything else.

apps.title: Revolve Wellness Studios
apps.description:
We Make it Easy to Become an Entrepreneur.

Revolve empowers personal trainers, instructors, practitioners to do what you do best – teach! Easily rent our first-class fitness and wellness studios to create and grow your own practice. Our affordable gyms and studios include everything you need for Personal Training, Wellness Services, Individual or Group classes, and Meetings or Seminar spaces.

Revolve is a NO RISK business opportunity for Instructors, Practitioners, and Trainers looking for affordable space to teach.  We rent studios at a 1-hour minimum, for most fitness disciplines. This enables YOU to do what you do best – teach.  Create and grow your own practice in a best-in-class facility. We eliminate the stress and financial burdens of having your own facility or working for others.

• No Investment
• No Hassles
• No Leases
• No Contracts

apps.title: Global Wellness Challenge
apps.description:
The Global Wellness Challenge hosted by Cigna Group is an activities-based employer wellness program promoting healthy lifestyle and getting active through various friendly competition with friends and family! 

Features include:

-	Track your activity manually or via supported wearable device like the Apple Watch
-	Earn points and badges as you make progress towards our personal goal
-	Attend various social events to get to know other participants
-	Keep up a streak of active days to lean into a consistent healthy lifestyle
-	Lead or join a team to keep each other motivated and compete with other teams

This app, integrates with HealthKit, shares your activity data with your company to allow tracking of activity minutes for healthy competition with your friends.

apps.title: Manifesting Perfect Wellness
apps.description:
This personal coaching app will help you manifest a sense of wellness. Daily messages will inspire you to raise your body’s vibration to a state of perfect health and wellbeing.  Regular use may help to improve the health of your body, mind and soul. 
 
Whether you are looking to increase your immunity, nurture a healthy body, overcome an illness, uplift your spirits, reduce stress, or maintain your sanity during a world health crisis, this app can help! The guided thoughts and holistic tips in this app will put you in a positive mindset to help you manifest your optimal health.
 
Coupled with gentle guidance of actions, these reminders and suggestions are some of the most powerful ways you can attain physical and mental health.  
 
Each day, spend just three minutes listening as Karen delivers three personalized messages that the Universe has selected just for you. Listen after waking up, during lunch or just before bed. They are short enough that you can easily fit them into your busy day. You’ll feel like you’ve gone on a spa retreat for the mind!
 
This app is FREE to download. Get weekly messages, or upgrade to a subscription for daily messages.  


FEATURES:

▶ BEGIN your day with the right mindset to attract your optimal wellness

▶ RECEIVE three personalized messages selected by the Universe daily/weekly

▶ LISTEN to Karen explain the deeper meaning of your messages

▶ COMPLETE the actions associated with each message

▶ REPLAY your messages any time before the day’s end

▶ REMINDER feature allows you to set a daily reminder

▶ SHARE your personal messages with others

▶ WAKE up to the Audio Wake-Up Alarm feature with the subscription option to remind you to listen to your daily health tips
 
 
 
Karen Kripalani, along with her husband, Michel, co-founded Beauty Everywhere and Oceanhouse Media, leading publishers of over 600 mobile apps that uplift, educate and inspire. She has been a student of conscious manifestation for over 20 years. When she was diagnosed with a brain tumor in 2011 she called upon and created some powerful processes that helped to bring her back to perfect health. The tips and lessons contained in this app allowed her to center her mind, reduce stress, practice new modalities, change her unhealthy habits, and attain a sense of wellbeing and wholeness.
 
Have questions or feedback? We’d love to hear! Send us a note at support@oceanhousemedia.com 
 
Enjoy the Manifesting Perfect Wellness app with or without a subscription!
 
To access all features, like the alarm and daily messages, sign up for a subscription and save!

About the Manifesting Perfect Wellness subscription:
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
Subscribe monthly or annually to access to all content
Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period 
Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase 
No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period 
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when purchasing a subscription

Privacy Policy
http://www.oceanhousemedia.com/privacy/

Terms of Use
http://www.oceanhousemedia.com/terms/

apps.title: Blue Wellness Rewards
apps.description:
Are you looking for a fun and easy-to-navigate way of managing your health? There's no need to feel lost on this journey anymore! Blue Wellness Rewards is here to help. We'll make sure you have your personal map and guide you along the path to a healthier life! Blue Wellness Rewards is here to empower you with unique tools to help you:

•	Understand your health
•	Know the specific steps you can take to get better or stay healthy
•	Earn fun rewards along the way
• Track your activities using Apple Health and other connected devices (if applicable).

Let's do this together and make your health a priority!

Note: Blue Wellness Rewards is only available to eligible individuals.

What's Included?

•	To do list: a prioritized list of healthy actions you can take to earn rewards.
•	Health Library: a library of topics designed to help you get or stay healthy.
•	Rewards: redeem your earned rewards for gift cards and merchandise from some of the nation's top retailers.
•	Message Center: be notified when you have new or completed actions, when new health insights are available, and when you have rewards to redeem.

THIS APPLICATION DOES NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE.  The information and other material contained on this application is for informational purposes only and is not intended or implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. All content, including text, graphics, images and information, contained on or available through this application is for general informational purposes only.  Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding medical conditions or before undertaking a new healthcare regimen. NEVER DISREGARD PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL ADVICE OR DELAY SEEKING MEDICAL TREATMENT BECAUSE OF SOMETHING YOU HAVE READ OR ACCESSED THROUGH THIS APPLICATION.

apps.title: CARROT Wellness
apps.description:
Being active has never been more rewarding!  CARROT is a free app that rewards you financially for walking. By walking and achieving individualized activity goals, users earn virtual currencies that can be used to play games, compete in challenges, bid on an auction and earn rewards (such as digital gift cards) that are available right on the app. Those rewards can be won in live, real-time “instant” auctions!
 
CARROT has successfully gamified health and wellness, including several fun features available to all users. “CARROT Survivor” is a last-person-standing competition that challenges contestants to make their personal goals each and every day. “Versus” contests include weekly fantasy football competitions during the fall as well as similar games throughout the year. And CARROT’s “Unlockables” requires you to achieve a personal goal streak to access special prizes.
 
CARROT offers iPhone users several great features:
(1) Using Apple HealthKit, CARROT gives you a personalized “Activity Goal”, based on your own activity history, which is updated daily. Push yourself just a little bit more each day, make your personal goals, and then reap the rewards!
(2) CARROT’s Apple Watch app allows users to conveniently monitor their daily activity progress with just a tap.
(3) Using iBeacon technology, users can earn bonus Reward Points for activities such as community health programs and for visiting participating businesses. This is done in the background with low-energy Bluetooth.
(4) And as a fully inclusive program, CARROT provides the opportunity for manual wheelchair users to participate by being rewarded for their “pushes”, rather than “steps”. (Note: The use of an Apple Watch is required to accurately collect push data for use on CARROT.)
 
All CARROT users earn one Reward Point for each step they take. Premium Members – including those who are sponsored by their employer through a CARROT Corporate Wellness Program – can also earn CARROTcoins for achieving personalized activity goals. You can get a one-month Premium Membership with an In-App purchase.
 
With CARROT, there’s no need to purchase a wearable tracker – everything, including your steps data and rewards, is stored exclusively on your phone. The app doesn’t even have to be on or running for you to earn points. (But if you already own a tracker, CARROT accepts data from most popular devices.)
 
Would you like your employer to offer CARROT rewards to you and your coworkers? “CARROT Health & Wellness” is a special, low-cost program that offers employees exclusive company-sponsored rewards such as digital gift cards – available directly through the app – just for meeting daily activity goals. Employers can launch their own CARROT Wellness pilot program by entering their information on the CARROT “Wellness” screen.
 
Because CARROT respects your privacy, you have the option to sign in using your phone number, Facebook or anonymously. Anonymous (“Guest”) users should beware that, since all data is stored only on the device, you will permanently lose all relevant data and earned rewards if you log out or delete the app.
 
Many exclusive rewards are made available based on your location, and you can also receive bonus Reward Points for visiting CARROT businesses and other locations -- so please be sure to allow “location services”. (Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.)
 
Easy to use. Convenient. Personalized. Free. When it comes to Fitness Rewards, nothing beats CARROT!

The app doesn’t even have to be on or running for you to earn points. (But if you already own a tracker, CARROT accepts data from most popular devices.)
 
Would you like your employer to offer CARROT rewards to you and your coworkers? “CARROT Health & Wellness” is a special, low-cost program that offers employees exclusive company-sponsored rewards such as digital gift cards – available directly through the app – just for meeting daily activity goals. Employers can launch their own CARROT Wellness pilot program by entering their information on the CARROT “Wellness” screen.
 
Because CARROT respects your privacy, you have the option to sign in using your phone number, Facebook or anonymously. Anonymous (“Guest”) users should beware that, since all data is stored only on the device, you will permanently lose all relevant data and earned rewards if you log out or delete the app.
 
Many exclusive rewards are made available based on your location, and you can also receive bonus Reward Points for visiting CARROT businesses and other locations -- so please be sure to allow “location services”. (Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.)
 
Easy to use. Convenient. Personalized. Free. When it comes to Fitness Rewards, nothing beats CARROT!

apps.title: Ohio State: Wellness
apps.description:
Finding balance and wellness in your life can feel daunting, but it doesn't have to be that way. The Ohio State University is here to support you in addressing mental health concerns and proactively building behaviors that support your overall wellness.
 
The Ohio State: Wellness app is designed to make it easy to choose the right resources and take action. Use this tool to set goals, develop healthy habits and help someone you care about access the support they need.
 
• Explore all nine dimensions of wellness through blog-style articles and scholarship written with the college experience in mind.

• Support your recovery and proactive wellness by connecting with the support resources available to you as an Ohio State student.

• Track habits that support your wellness goals.

• The Crisis tab provides clear directions for accessing support. This feature is also currently available as I'm Experiencing an Emergency or Crisis in the Ohio State app About You tab.

As always, if you have suggestions for improving the app or notice any bugs, please use the contact form within the app. We love to hear from our users!

apps.title: Alaveda
apps.description:
Use the free Alaveda app to access your company/health plan wellness program from your mobile device.  The app offers a wide range of personalized tools including:

- Take a health risk assessment to determine your risk for disease
- Learn how to reduce your risk for disease with personalized plans for wellness
- Earn incentives and rewards
- Participate in wellness challenges
- Socialize with friends and colleagues

Alaveda integrates with the Apple Health app which allows you to share steps from your iPhone and activity, workout and sleep data from your Apple Watch. We use this data to provide personalized wellness programming and help drive positive behavior change within your wellness portal.

The Alaveda app is available for anyone to download, but you must obtain login credentials from your employer or health plan before you can log in.

apps.title: Health Meets Wellness
apps.developer: Health Meets Wellness By Elizabeth Sharp MD P.C.
apps.description:
Health Meets Wellness offers concierge medicine, weight management and wellness services for adults aged 18 and up. The Health Meets Wellness app allows you to achieve your health goals with personalized nutrition and exercise programs. 

Our program is personalized to optimize your body composition with your customized HMW Method exercise and nutrition program!

*Please note: you must be a Health Meets Wellness client to use this app.

Here’s how it works:

Goals: Start by defining your short term and long term wellness goals. We’ll keep you motivated with your personalized meal plans, exercise routine and health coaching. Our goal is for you to both achieve and maintain your health and wellness goals!

Nutrition: Your personalized meals are viewable by day which makes it easy for you to plan, track, and review consistently. You’ll receive automatic updates when your new plan is published via notifications.

Exercise: Access your daily exercise routine from the comfort of your home or on the go with our app! Individualized programs are available in a short video format to help you build strength and lean muscle mass while losing fat. 

Medical Advice Disclaimer:
The content and recommendations provided by this app are for informational purposes only and are not intended to replace or substitute for any professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or another qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment. Do not disregard professional medical advice or delay seeking it because of information obtained from this app. Relying solely on the content of this app without seeking advice from a medical professional is done at your own risk.

Subscription Details：
If you choose to subscribe to Health Meets Wellness Pro for our additional features, you'll be billed annually, charged to your iTunes Account, which will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Auto-renew can be turned off anytime by going to your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

Health Meets Wellness Pro price: $169.99/year


Terms of Use: https://healthmeetswellness.com/our-terms
Privacy Policy: https://healthmeetswellness.com/your-privacy

apps.title: Nike Training Club
apps.description:
Nike Training Club isn't just another workout app — it's a portal to Nike's top trainers, athletes and experts. It's where you can access industry-leading workout programming and legit coaching for free. Whether you put in the work at the gym or at home, NTC is here to power your progress. If you're serious about your fitness, this is where you train.

Nike Members get free access to the latest strength training, conditioning, yoga, pilates, recovery and mindfulness content. Train the way you want and reach your goals with Nike Training Club.

EXPERT PROGRAMMING FOR EVERY LEVEL
• Gym workouts: Curated strength and conditioning workouts and programs designed for the gym 
• Home workouts: Whiteboard and trainer-led workouts made for small spaces, travel and lack of equipment
• Total-body strength: Programming to develop muscular strength, hypertrophy, power and endurance
• Conditioning: High-intensity workouts, including high-intensity interval and sprint-interval training 
• Core workouts: Workouts for strong abs and more
• Yoga and pilates: Flows and postures to stretch and strengthen
• Recovery: Self-myofascial release, stretching, walking and more
• Mindfulness: Guidance on staying present to improve performance and experience

ACCESSIBLE AND PROGRESSIVE WORKOUTS
• Something for everyone: Find advanced workout programming, beginner workouts and everything in between
• On your terms: Join on-demand, trainer-led classes or follow whiteboard workouts on your own
• Train for something: Achieve your goals with weeks-long workout programs for the gym or home
• Training guidance: Explore a library of in-depth training information at your fingertips
• Nike-only inspiration: Advice and insights from Nike's top trainers, athletes and experts
• Find your favorite exercise: Strength training, conditioning, HIIT workouts, yoga, pilates and more
• Strengthen every muscle: Workouts that target arms, legs, abs and more
• Bodyweight training: Equipment-free workouts that build muscle
• Track achievements: Log completed workouts and celebrate accomplishments

WORKOUT ON DEMAND
• Workouts for any level: Choose from multiple trainer-led, Video On Demand (VOD) classes*
• Workouts for all modalities: Find workouts focused on strength training, conditioning, yoga, pilates and more
• Premiere workouts: Work out with elite athletes and entertainers*
• NTC TV: Train hands-free and get group class experiences at home***

Download Nike Training Club and train with us.

APPLE WATCH SUPPORT
Focus more on your workout and less on your phone when you connect your Apple Watch with NTC. Easily advance to the next movement, pause, skip movements and more, all while monitoring your heart rate and calories burned right from your wrist.

EVERY MOVEMENT COUNTS
Enter any other daily workouts in the Activity tab to keep an accurate account of your journey. If you use the Nike Run Club app, your runs will be automatically recorded in your activity history.

Nike Training Club works with Apple Health to sync workouts and record heart-rate data.

Apple Music can be used to access music library to play music during workouts.

*VOD (Video-On Demand) available in the US, UK, BR, JP, CN, FR, DE, RU, IT, ES, MX and KR.
**NTC Live currently available in the US, UK and select countries.
***NTC TV available only in the US.

apps.title: Tapping with T
apps.description:
Rewire stress-based behaviors at the root of your chronic symptoms, release inherited & stored trauma responses, & gently guide your nervous system back to a place of safety, regulation, and genuine ease.

What if healing is allowed to be easy? What if it can feel more like play?

Tapping with T is both a community of self healers and a playground of tools intended to support you in rewiring your brain and is ultimately here to assist you in healing yourself.

With a weekly-updated library of EFT (Emotional Freedom Technique) tapping videos, breathwork, Non-Sleep Deep Rest, and guided relaxations, Tapping with T supports you to regulate at your own pace. We host group calls every 5-6 weeks to integrate and deepen your self-paced healing practice as we question & shake off old stories collectively.

The community forum is a space to ask questions, make video requests, share reflections, get updates, and ultimately to serve as a reminder that we get to heal and grow together. We were never meant to do this alone and we don't have to. Together, we learn to release what is weighing us down, step into new possibilities, and widen our windows of tolerance with tenderness!

Videos range in length from 5-25 minutes. We cover a wide range of topics including:

~Handling anxiety: about being chronically ill, having food reactions & flare-ups, panic attacks, social events, not being able to sleep, etc.

~Honoring depression: using parts work to see low energy states as opportunities to lean in, learning to move through & release emotions with curiosity.

~Confidence & Body-image: for unwanted weight-gain, unwanted weight-loss, acne, body-acceptance, binge-eating, people-pleasing, and releasing the worry about what people might think.

~Sleep support: for those with insomnia or panic, night sweats, waking up exhausted, brain fog, healing while you sleep, etc.

~Energy support: for chronic fatigue, PMS, fibromyalgia, MCAS, exercise, burn-out, etc.

~Releasing fear: around never getting better, feeling behind, feeling disabled by symptoms, not knowing the next step to take to heal, and more.

~Chronic symptom support: for Lyme & infections, mold, gut disorders, pain, PTSD, food sensitivities, fatigue, sadness, etc.

~Relationship support: for boundaries, communication, finding love, connection.

~Releasing trapped emotions: for healing physical symptoms related to anger, grudges, grief, etc.

~Pregnancy & Postpartum: TTC, depression & fatigue, & traumatic birth experiences.

~Our videos target those with complex cases of chronic illness & trauma wanting to feel grounded, hopeful, and healthy again.

With each tap, we step out of limbic loops, lower stress, and allow the body to heal & favor continual growth.

The visitor of our website/app acknowledges that the information available on or through Tapping with T is not a substitute for medical advice. The information published on our sites and app is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, and should not be construed as individual medical advice.

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Tapping with T on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.
All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service:https://www.triathlonlive.tv/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.triathlonlive.tv/privacy

apps.title: GNC LiveWell
apps.description:
Welcome to the GNC Live Well app—your on-the-go destination for all your health and wellness goals!  
 
MYGNC REWARDS IS FREE TO JOIN! 
 
Bigger. Better. More Rewarding.  Start getting 3% Cash Back Rewards every day and a $5 Cash Back reward when you enroll!  Earn 1 point for every $1 you spend.  Unlock more perks with Silver and Gold tiers. Check your points and redeem rewards—all in one convenient place! 
 
SEARCH AND SHOP 
It’s easy to shop all your favorite vitamins, protein, wellness essentials and more from the GNC Live Well app. Add items to your favorites list, quickly select products for Free In-Store Pickup, get access to trustworthy ratings and reviews and get discounts and rewards on all your purchases. 
 
EASY CHECKOUT 
Ordering online is even faster using your saved information and you can quickly checkout using PayPal or Apple Pay. 
 
MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS 
Subscribe to Save and receive 10% on every order! Manage all your subscriptions directly in the app—making it simple to get your products when you need them.   
 
READY. SET. PRO 
Want Even More Perks?  Upgrade to PRO for 10% Cash Back Rewards every day, 15% Cash Back Rewards with PRO Days, free expedited shipping, and more! A $150 value for just $39.99! 
 
Version Notes: 
Thanks for using the GNC Live Well app! 
We’ve fine-tuned the system, cleared out a few glitches, and smoothed the edges—so everything runs seamlessly while you focus on living your best life. 
 
Your feedback helps us make the app better—keep it coming! Share your thoughts by going to Account > Feedback in the app.

apps.title: Engage Wellbeing
apps.description:
Engage is your personalized health assistant. It's provided for free by your employer in partnership with Anthem and is completely confidential. 
 
• See your healthcare, medical claims, and employer benefits in one place
• Access care and telehealth on-the-go
• Discover your employer perks and programs
• Earn points for hitting your wellbeing goals
 
Engage Wellbeing is available exclusively to individuals and their dependents who have access to Engage through their employee benefits program. Your app features will vary depending on how your employer is set up.

Note: Engage Wellbeing supports major activity trackers including Apple Health, Fitbit, and Garmin to conveniently synchronize your steps, food, and sleep data.
 
Not sure if your employer offers Engage? Ask your Human Resources department.

apps.title: Goodville: Farm Game Adventure
apps.description:
Goodville is a unique blend of classic farm game with an emotional well-being app. 

Goodville combines the gaming industry expertise with the scientific approach to address mental health issues from a completely new angle. Unique interactive content produced with the involvement of psychologists and scientists to achieve and maintain emotional well-being.
Raise awareness about modern and effective approaches to achieve emotional well-being and improve your lifestyle. 
Help Jane to renovate her farm and discover all the secrets of Goodville. You will meet a bunch of vivid characters, who will assist you on each step of your journey, so you won’t stay alone with the challenges that Goodville has to offer. 
Feed animals, harvest crops, milk cows, fulfil the orders, develop and renovate your farm. Explore the neighborhood, solve quests and tests to be aware of your cognitive and psychological condition.
Build your own safe haven and get ready for the next big adventure during expeditions.

FEATURES:
-        1st game to maintain emotional well-being: learn more about mental health by communicating with in-game characters and fulfilling exciting tasks.
-        Test your cognitive and psychological condition to be aware of your current state and improve your lifestyle
-        Explore, renovate and customize your farm
-        Fulfil orders, harvest crops and fresh goods
-        Build your own safe haven
____________

Details on Subscription

1. Subscription Pricing & Billing

You can subscribe within the game for 'Weekly Subscription' for $6.99/week, 'Premium Weekly Subscription' for $11.99/week, 'Deluxe Weekly Subscription' for $14.99/week.

2. Subscription Content

Subscribers can enjoy the following privileges during the period:

Weekly Subscription:
- One-time instant pack of rubies +50
- 1 ruby every 25 minutes during subscription period

Premium Weekly Subscription:
- One-time instant pack of rubies +50
- 1 ruby every 25 minutes during subscription period
- Free Goodwheel spin daily
- Access to the Hidden Passages
- Store up to 100 rubies

Deluxe Weekly Subscription:
- One-time instant pack of rubies +50
- 1 ruby every 25 minutes during subscription period
- Free Goodwheel spin daily
- Access to the Hidden Passages
- Store up to 100 rubies
- Early access to Events
- Golden Key every 3 days
- Deluxe Status Badge

3. Auto Renewals

The App Store Subscription feature renews automatically via your iTunes Account. Users can manage the subscription through your iTunes/Apple ID Settings Manager. The subscription will auto-renew for the assigned billing period if the auto-renew feature is not turned off 24 hours before the current subscription expires.

4. User Agreement and Privacy Policy

User Agreement - https://www.goodville.me/EULA_SL.pdf
Privacy Statement - https://www.goodville.me/PP_SL.pdf

5. Subscription Cancellation

If you would like to cancel your subscription, go to ‘Settings’ on your iOS device --> ‘iTunes & App Store’ --> tap ‘Apple ID’ and then ‘View Apple ID’. Enter ‘Account Settings’, tap ‘Subscriptions’ --> ‘Manage’ and select the subscription for ‘Goodville’ to cancel it.

This game requires a constant internet connection for account security and update purposes. 
Goodville is completely free to play with optional in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Subscribe to our social channels to be in the loop about upcoming updates:

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/goodvillegame
Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/goodville.official
Health blog:
https://stork-goodville.medium.com

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:

We’ve rolled out an important hotfix to keep your adventures running smoothly! 
This update improves stability and ensures your Goodville experience stays as enjoyable as ever.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@goodville.me.

apps.title: LiveHealth Online Mobile
apps.description:
Speak with board-certified doctors, licensed therapists, psychiatrists and more through live video on your smartphone, tablet, or computer. LiveHealth Online is an easy and convenient way to get the care you need whether you’re at home, at work, or on the go! Download the app and sign up to get started. 
    •	24/7 virtual urgent care with board-certified doctors for the whole family. 
    •	Counseling and talk therapy with licensed therapists. 
    •	Scheduled consultations with psychiatrists. 
    •	Primary care, dermatologists, dietitians, lactation consultations and other benefits may be available depending on your health insurance.

apps.title: HeiaHeia
apps.description:
HeiaHeia is a global platform for improving employee wellbeing and fostering a sense of community. 
It is fun and easy to use—for both employees and employers! 
HeiaHeia also has a free version available for everyone.

=== For Work Communities ===

HeiaHeia Pro: HeiaHeia Pro is a wellbeing solution offered by your employer. You can access it with an employer's invitation or code. To learn more about HeiaHeia Pro, please visit our website.

PRO: JOIN WELLBEING CHALLENGES AND VIRTUAL COMMUNITIES
• HeiaHeia challenges are an inclusive, inspiring, and collaborative way to improve team spirit and promote wellbeing in work and other communities.
• To learn more about HeiaHeia challenges, please visit our website.

PRO: FUN WAY TO IMPROVE HOLISTIC WELLBEING
• Earn wellbeing points with activities that improve holistic wellbeing.
• Micro actions: small daily actions that have a big impact on your health (note: availability based on ongoing challenges).

PRO: INSPIRATION FROM GOALS, PROGRESS AND CONTENT
• Body-themed wellbeing content: endurance, mobility, and strength (programs, exercises, and reminders).
• Mind-themed wellbeing content (exercises and reminders).
• Workday workout content (exercises and reminders).


=== For Personal Use ===

HeiaHeia Free: The basic version of HeiaHeia is free. You can upgrade to the Pro version with an employer code or an invitation.

FREE: YOUR PERSONAL WELLBEING JOURNAL
• Keep a journal of your exercises and hobbies — over 600 different activity types supported, from yoga to ice climbing and karate to CrossFit, as well as hobbies like crafts or culture.
• Built-in GPS for tracking the duration, distance, and speed of outdoor activities.
• Log your activities on the HeiaHeia app or sync data automatically from a device. Easily connect with Apple Health or other devices and apps (e.g. Garmin, Fitbit, Polar, Suunto, and more).

FREE: CONNECT WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY
• HeiaHeia is all about peer support. Connect with your friends and family and motivate one another with cheers and comments.

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This update makes HeiaHeia's "milestone challenges" even more fun and engaging for company-wide and team use! The improvements also support rewarding programs — making HeiaHeia the perfect choice for recognizing activity!

Update your HeiaHeia app now and continue your journey to a healthier, happier you.

If you like HeiaHeia, we appreciate your rating of the app!

apps.title: Sprout at Work
apps.description:
Sprout At Work is scientifically designed to help you embrace wellbeing and support your overall health.

- Compete against your colleagues in wellbeing challenges

- Set personal goals and track your activity to help build and maintain healthy habits

- Measure your overall health with your wellbeing score

- Connect with colleagues by sharing tips, ideas, and photos in interest-based communities

- Enjoy our original articles and videos that cover physical, mental, and dietary health

Sprout At Work syncs with health devices like Apple Health, Fitbit, Garmin, and more, and offers you the tools and resources to support your personalized journey.

*Please note: Your company must be registered with Sprout At Work for you to use this app.

apps.title: Wellness360
apps.description:
Wellness360 is a corporate wellness program provider supporting employee wellbeing with holistic wellness solutions. Our fully customizable corporate wellness portal is built using the latest wellness software and robust technology.

The Wellness360 app is the mobile counterpart of the health and wellness web portal from Wellness 360 Technologies, Inc. Employees who are a part of Wellness 360’s employer-sponsored workplace wellness programs can access the Wellness360 app using the right login credentials. Our comprehensive mobile engagement tools allow execution and fulfillment of many wellness program modules, with easy access to all the features.

The wellness portal and mobile app are flexible and scalable to meet specific employee wellness needs.

The key features of our mobile app include –

•	Dashboard - The clean interactive dashboard gives an overview of your entire program progress and upcoming activities.

•	Activity Logs - Track nutrition, physical activity, water intake, sleep time, calorie count, and more.

•	Notification Center - Stay connected always with constant updates about the program and alerts from health coaches.

•	Gamification - Fun and engaging strategies like reward points, incentives, and more, to improve employee health and wellbeing.

•	Challenge Library - Many wellness challenge ideas with progress tracking and communication tools.

•	Incentive Management - View incentive milestones and track progress to achieve goals.

•	Event Management - Register and get reminders for upcoming wellness events from the mobile app.

•	HealthKit Integration - Sync your Apple HealthKit data with our Wellness360 app.

•	Device Integration - Connect other popular apps and devices to sync all activity and health data.



If you have any trouble regarding the app login or features, kindly contact us at support@wellness360.co with all the details concerning the query. We will respond at the earliest.
The free Healthier 901 app is designed to work with Wellness 360 platform.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using the Wellness360 App! We update our app regularly.
This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

apps.title: Results Wellness Lifestyle
apps.description:
LOSE WEIGHT FROM THE COMFORT OF YOUR HOME

Give us just 20 minutes per day and we'll help you to lose weight and keep it off for good!

We understand that no two weight loss journeys are the same, which is why we offer personal 1-2-1 support from a team of experts dedicated to helping YOU reach YOUR goals. Our team will work with you to create a Customised exercise programme, meal plan, and mindset strategies tailored to your unique needs and lifestyle, so you can finally achieve your weight loss goals while loving the journey.

But that's not all. Our team is available to answer any questions or concerns you may have throughout your journey, so you can feel confident and supported every step of the way. Plus, with our cutting-edge technology, we can track your progress in real-time and make adjustments to your plan as needed, ensuring you get the best results possible.

Don't settle for a one-size-fits-all weight loss plan. Choose us for personalised support and a Customised plan that fits YOUR life and YOUR goals. Download our app now and start your journey to a happier, healthier you!


NO MORE:
> Travelling to the gym on a cold winter's day Overpaying for private PT
> sessions Not knowing what to do to get fast results

Our goal is to work with YOU to achieve the body YOU desire.

Yes, there are other workout apps out there, but none that understand your specific needs and support you every step of the way like we do.

Say goodbye to yo-yo dieting and join the thousands of women who are already smashing their goals with our app!


WHAT’S INCLUDED:
> Weekly LIVE workout classes
> 1000+ mouth-watering recipes
> Weight loss coaching
> Weight loss meal plans
> Motivation courses
> Calorie calculator
> Daily food planner
> Sleep & mood tracker
> Step counter
> Achievement badges
> Weight loss classes
> Accountability groups
> Online cook-along classes
> Sync to smartwatch
> Exclusive app community
> Variety of fun workouts
and so much more.

Join the thousands of women who are already smashing their weight loss goals. Download our app now and start your journey to a happier, healthier you!



HEALTH APP:
The RWL “Daily Planner” feature will pull data from Apple’s Health Kit and from Fitbit. This data is used so that the user can track their personal journey.

RWL app will ask the user for permission to approve access to the following Health Kit data types. (Both Read and Write):

- Active Energy
- Flights Climbed
- Sleep Analysis
- Steps


This information will allow the user to track how many calories they have burnt each day, adding the total to their calories consumed, calculating their calorie deficit.

The user has full control over the permissions granted to the RWL app and can deactivate each of the data types via the app at any point.

Once the user has authorized the Health Kit data types, they will be allowed to sync their iWatch to the RWL app.

The data as a collective (de-identified) can be used to better improve the function of the app and other RWL services. The user's data will not be shared with any third parties.



PAYMENT:
This app offers 7 days for FREE with full access to all content.After that period users will join a monthly, quarterly or annual subscription to unlock all content.

• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
• Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
• Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
• You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.


Please find a link to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy below:
https://app.rwl.fitness/termsandcondition

raw_data.releaseNotes:
In this update, we’ve made it easier to stay on track with your goals. Recommended playlists now show duration times, so you can plan your workouts more easily. We’ve also refreshed the design of the measurement and progress photo upload section for a smoother experience, and improved how favourite videos are displayed on the dashboard, making them easier to access at a glance.
Update now to enjoy these helpful changes!

apps.title: Unleash Health
apps.description:
Unleash Health® brings you snackable wellness, powered by science, personalized by AI, and gifted to you by brands you trust. Just as brands sponsor elite athletes, on Unleash Health® they sponsor you, providing lifetime access to a world-class experience built by the world’s leading health and longevity scientists.

Unleash Health® is grounded in decades of research and designed to fit seamlessly into your day. By committing just minutes a day, you can activate pathways that boost energy, sharpen focus, improve sleep quality, elevate mood, enhance digestion, support brain health, slow biological aging, and more.

What you’ll love about Unleash Health®:
 - Snackable wellness: 14,000+ bite-sized, science-backed activities you can do anytime, anywhere.
 - Built by world-leading scientists: 100+ programs grounded in decades of health and longevity research.
 - Truly holistic: covering mind, movement, nutrition, self care, social, and sleep.
 - Always something new: fresh programs added regularly to keep you inspired.
 - Gets smarter with you: The more you snack, the smarter Unleash Health® gets to deliver an experience you’ll love every day.

Whether you’re at home, on the go, or between meetings, Unleash Health® moves with you, bringing snackable wellness to any goal, any time, anywhere.

Your lifetime access is gifted by brands you trust. No subscriptions. No hidden costs. Just wellness without limits.

Join thousands experiencing the power of snackable wellness every day.

Terms and conditions of use:
https://unleash.health/terms-and-conditions
Privacy policy:
https://unleash.health/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’re always advancing the experience to bring you the best of Unleash Health. Keep your updates turned on to unlock snackable wellness and never miss a new way to feel your best!
raw_data.description:
Unleash Health® brings you snackable wellness, powered by science, personalized by AI, and gifted to you by brands you trust. Just as brands sponsor elite athletes, on Unleash Health® they sponsor you, providing lifetime access to a world-class experience built by the world’s leading health and longevity scientists.

Unleash Health® is grounded in decades of research and designed to fit seamlessly into your day. By committing just minutes a day, you can activate pathways that boost energy, sharpen focus, improve sleep quality, elevate mood, enhance digestion, support brain health, slow biological aging, and more.

What you’ll love about Unleash Health®:
 - Snackable wellness: 14,000+ bite-sized, science-backed activities you can do anytime, anywhere.
 - Built by world-leading scientists: 100+ programs grounded in decades of health and longevity research.
 - Truly holistic: covering mind, movement, nutrition, self care, social, and sleep.
 - Always something new: fresh programs added regularly to keep you inspired.
 - Gets smarter with you: The more you snack, the smarter Unleash Health® gets to deliver an experience you’ll love every day.

Whether you’re at home, on the go, or between meetings, Unleash Health® moves with you, bringing snackable wellness to any goal, any time, anywhere.

Your lifetime access is gifted by brands you trust. No subscriptions. No hidden costs. Just wellness without limits.

Join thousands experiencing the power of snackable wellness every day.

Terms and conditions of use:
https://unleash.health/terms-and-conditions
Privacy policy:
https://unleash.health/privacy-policy

apps.title: Flourish: 24/7 Wellness Buddy
apps.description:
Meet Flourish, your 24/7 mental health companion and wellness coach, ready to help you become calmer, happier, and wiser in just a few minutes a day.

Created by psychologists, Flourish integrates the latest science of well-being with advanced AI and human-centered design to support your emotional, social, and mental wellness. Loved by thousands of users, Flourish’s effectiveness is validated through randomized controlled trials (RCTs) in collaboration with researchers from Stanford, Harvard, and the University of Washington. Proven to boost mood, build resilience, and reduce stress, many users start noticing positive changes within just a few days.

Your safety, privacy, and data security are our top priorities. Flourish is HIPAA-compliant, utilizes end-to-end encryption for chat messages, and enforces strict role-based access control for sensitive user information. Our crisis support protocol follows the latest practices, ensuring you receive timely support when needed. You can also permanently delete any conversation or your entire account at any time.

-------------
Sunnie: Your personalized well-being buddy
-------------
Sunnie is a insightful and empathic AI inside the Flourish app. Think of Sunnie as your wellness coach, habit-building partner, and accountability buddy for emotional health, personal growth, and habit building.

Backed by decades of research in positive psychology, social psychology, motivation science, affective science, and leveraging techniques such as CBT, DBT, ACT, and mindfulness, Sunnie doesn’t just tell you what to do—it partners with you to:
- Build personalized well-being plans
- Guide you to take meaningful, positive actions to boost your mood, reduce stress, and strengthen relationships using science-based strategies
- Track and visualize your progress
- Offer proactive support during tough moments
- Send daily reminders and uplifting affirmations to keep you grounded and motivated
- Provide daily, weekly, and monthly science-backed insights tailored to your needs

With long-term memory, Sunnie gets to know you better over time, making each interaction more insightful and personalized. Sunnie can communicate naturally through text, voice, and images for richer and more engaging experience. 

And it goes beyond interacting with AI! With your Flourish buddies (e.g., close friends or family member) and our Flourish community, you can share well-being activities, support each other, stay motivated, and go through the ups and downs of life with positivity and resilience, together. 

-------------
Reviews from early users
-------------
"I know I would’ve had a much harder time this quarter if I didn’t have this app as a way to reflect, learn, and grow in strength. Really inspires me for future quarters.”
“I was surprised by how supported the app made me feel, specifically my conversations with Sunnie and the small activities she suggested!”
“I noticed significant changes in my mood, productivity, and overall outlook” 
”As someone who has a lot of anxiety and can get caught up in the stresses of daily life, having an app that can help build positive habits and prioritize well-being has been super helpful.”

-------------
Subscription Information
-------------
Subscriptions are completely optional and are a way to support our small team while unlocking extra content, removing limits, and getting more customization options. Manage or cancel anytime in your App Store account settings.

Available monthly subscriptions (with a 7‑day free trial):

- Just Getting Started – $2.99/month  
- Keep Flourish Online – $5.99/month  
- Sustain the Mission – $9.99/month
- Pay It Forward – $14.99/month 
- Visionary Sponsor – $19.99/month

-------------
Let’s Flourish Together
-------------
Website: myflourish.ai
Contact Us: hello@myflourish.ai
Terms of Use: myflourish.ai/terms-conditions
Privacy Policy: myflourish.ai/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:

- New Solo Mode for Toolkit — Complete activities on your own, anytime you need
- In-App Notifications for Community — Never miss a comment, reply, or moment that matters

Happy flourishing!

apps.title: Upful Blends
apps.description:
Feeling disconnected, drained, or out of sync with your body?

You deserve more than symptom relief, you deserve a full-body reawakening.

The Upful Blends app is your direct line to herbal tea blends, herbal supplements, and Indigenous plant medicine knowledge designed to detox, energize, and restore balance in your mind, body, and spirit. Rooted in ancestral wisdom and high-vibrational living, our formulas aren’t just products, they’re portals to your vitality.

Inside the app, you’ll get:

Seamless access to shop our full line of herbal teas and capsule supplements
Exclusive app-only discounts and early access to limited drops
How to healing practices 
Herbal plant based recipe videos 
Notification reminders + quick tips

This is more than tea, it’s a movement. Welcome to the Tribe. 

It's Upful, Upful, Upful!

------------------------

New to Upful Blends? Here's how to begin your herbal journey:

Download the app – This is your all-access pass to herbal teas, wildcrafted supplements, and holistic living support right at your fingertips.

Create your profile – Get personalized updates, early access to exclusive drops, and content tailored to your wellness journey.

Explore our shop – Browse Indigenous herbal blends designed to cleanse, energize, and nourish your body from within.

Activate your perks – Keep notifications on for random limited time discounts. Sign up for our Loyalty Program by creating an account or placing an order.

Subscribe and Save - Unlock 2x the savings without thinking about it with our auto ship option. Get priority access to exclusive products, flat rate shipping and up to 20% off with each order. 

Start with our bestsellers:
Try the Sea Elements Multi Vitamin Capsules, or Food for the Blood Herbal Tea for a powerful introduction to Upful living.

apps.title: Cacti Wellness
apps.description:
TAKE CARE OF BUSINESS WHILE TAKING CARE OF YOURSELF: Start your trial for 1 free week of unlimited workouts, guided meditations, and productivity workshops.


Cacti Wellness Collective is an online wellness and productivity platform that empowers ambitious women to improve their mind, body, and focus. All of our content is under 20-minutes so you can efficiently and effectively reach your work & self care goals.


NEW CONTENT WEEKLY:

Each week, we release 2+ new videos including:


Workouts Created by Personal Trainers:

-HIIT

-Bodyweight

-Core Series

-Band & Dumbbell Circuits

-Low Impact

-Stretch Flows


Meditations to Tap into your Best Self:

-Visualization -Mantras

-Breathwork


Productivity Workshops to Help You Excel Professionally:

-Software Tutorials

-Scheduling Strategies

-Organizational Techniques


JOIN THE COMMUNITY: Feel the support of our community of high-performing, ambitious women who are dedicated to becoming the best version of themselves both personally & professionally.


STAY ACCOUNTABLE: Keep yourself on track by following our weekly schedule of workouts & meditations (updated each Monday!)


FIT YOUR BUSY SCHEDULE: Cacti was designed with the busy woman in mind. We know you have a jam packed schedule, so we want wellness to be enjoyable & attainable. All of our workouts and meditations are 20-minutes or less so you can fit them into your coffee break!


Do you ever wish there were more hours in the day? Our productivity workshops will teach you how to use your working time more efficiently.


STREAM ON THE GO:

Keep up your wellness routines & productivity habits anywhere you go on our site or our mobile app!


Have a question or want to get in touch? Send us an email at hello@cactiwellness.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Cacti Wellness Collective on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Privacy Policy: https://watch.cactiwellnesscollective.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://watch.cactiwellnesscollective.com/tos

raw_data.releaseNotes:
* Bug fixes
* Performance improvements

apps.title: Pulsetto Wellness
apps.description:
Pulsetto is a novel and intriguing method for dealing with one's own issues. Working on improving yourself can be challenging, but the situation can improve. Join the ranks of Pulsetto Lite and become a part of it to see how easily everything can be handled.

Pulsetto IS NOT

• A substitute for professional mental health care

• A complex app

• An overnight fix - real habit change will only happen if you’re committed to changing your thought habits

If you're worried about any aspect of your mental health, or someone else's, you should always approach a professional.


This application complies with standard Apple EULA terms - https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.description:
The Journey of Intrinsic Health is an immersive experience and invitation to understand and integrate the foundations of intrinsic healing through the lens of Zach Bush, MD. We are outlining a new foundation for not only your physical health, but also your emotional and spiritual sense of who you are. This journey aims to drill down to find those truths that can change the course of human history. When you purchase access to The Journey of Intrinsic Health course,  you will be able to access all of the course content including over 20 hours of video content, meditations, practices, how-to’s and reflection experiences. You will also have access to our community experience, allowing you to soak in the content and connection to this mosaic of like-minded people, no matter where you are.

Connection, learning and community await. Join us!

apps.title: Mark: Wellness Assistant
apps.description:
The science of you: vitamins and lifestyle tailored by your data.
Wake up rested and full of energy. Feel and look healthy. Perform your best — with a body that works for you, not against you. Mark combines cutting-edge AI and proven science to craft your unique wellness plan with vitamins that your body really needs.
Why Mark?
 • Science-backed health score — based on  the Brussels Consultative Protocol by Dr. Thierry Hertoghe (Belgium) and methodologies from the American Longevity Institute (Miami, USA) No labs needed.
 • Personalized supplements & plans — AI tailors vitamins, nutrition, and tips to your lifestyle and goals.
 • Track your progress — see real changes in energy, mood, sleep, and focus with clear dashboards.
 • Daily micro-coaching — easy tips on sleep, stress, nutrition, and movement to keep you on track.
 • Premium supplements delivered — clinically formulated, top-quality ingredients shipped to your door.
Perfect for you if:
 - You want better sleep, more energy, and sharper focus
 - You’re tired of one-size-fits-all advice
 - You want convenience without sacrificing quality
Features:
AI health score & insights
Custom supplement plans
Progress tracking visuals
Daily wellness nudges
Auto-delivery of supplements
Built on science. Powered by AI. Designed for you.
Start your journey to lasting health today with Mark.
Disclaimer: This app provides educational content and personalized recommendations for informational purposes only. It is not medical advice. Always consult a healthcare professional before starting new health routines.

apps.title: FitPros Workplace Wellbeing
apps.description:
Your Company’s Private Wellbeing Space 
Offer a safe and private space for employees to discuss wellness topics, engage in your organization’s events, and support each other in their journey to health and happiness. 

Wellbeing LIVE Streams
Tune into LIVE broadcasts covering dozens of wellness topics ranging from stress management to fitness classes, all delivered by certified wellness professionals. Hundreds of virtual sessions are available annually, and stream LIVE every day of the business week. And recordings are always available if you miss a session. 

Unlimited Challenges
Go beyond steps and offer your teams a limitless variety of movement and wellbeing challenges. Ensure there is something for everyone by hosting any number of simultaneous challenges with a variety of durations ranging from days to years and everything in between. Pair with real world rewards and incentives to maximize employee engagement. 

Your Complete Events Calendar 
Communicate all of your wellness activities in a single calendar. Employees can quickly find the topics they’re interested in, register, and join virtual and on-site events. FitPros LIVE streaming, your custom programming, and even your internal company wellness events can be hosted on this single events calendar.

Track On-site & Virtual Check-Ins 
Employees can check in during in-person and virtual events, perfect for tracking attendance, providing accountability, and hosting fun check-in challenges.

Boost Engagement
Letting employees register in advance for their wellbeing sessions and get push notification reminders on the day of the events helps increase attendance. 

Social Feed
Promote a sense of community and support with social posts made by your colleagues as they share personal achievements, wellness content, and discuss upcoming or past events.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Updated push notifications
- Other improvements

apps.title: Bodifi Wellness
apps.description:
The Bodifi app provides features to have a enhanced experience in and outside of our clubs. Check in with your phone, view and book classes from home with a few taps. Follow workouts that we have created to get the results you want from Bodifi. 

MEMBER BARCODE
Use the app to easily and quickly access your member barcode and check into your Bodifi wellness center. 
Update your Billing information, and make payments from the app

SCHEDULING 
View group fitness schedule inside of the app 
Book your spot so you don’t miss your favorite classes. 

IN-APP WORKOUTS 
View and follow along to fitness on demand workout videos from anywhere! 
Follow along to the different workout plans we have created on the app. 

In app purchases
Purchase products right from the app and pick them up in store.

Bodifi Wellness app uses the Health app that is pre-installed on your iPhone to sync nutrients and workouts data. Because of this, the app will ask you to grant read and write access to your nutrients and workouts data.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1. Members can now set up, book, and pay for Family Members on the Mobile App.
2. The Exercise Logs and Workouts have been tweaked with new timers for each exercise and rest times between exercises. 
3. If enabled, members can now view other members who are booked into the same Class/Event. 
4. The Login page has been revamped with a new UI.
5. Bug fixes have been made to the Barcode page for users who were having trouble viewing their barcode on the app. 

We are listening, please email your feedback or queries about the app on support@smarthealthclubs.com

The Bodifi app provides features to have a enhanced experience in and outside of our clubs. Check in with your phone, view and book classes from home with a few taps. Follow workouts that we have created to get the results you want from Bodifi. 

MEMBER BARCODE
Use the app to easily and quickly access your member barcode and check into your Bodifi wellness center. 
Update your Billing information, and make payments from the app

SCHEDULING 
View group fitness schedule inside of the app 
Book your spot so you don’t miss your favorite classes. 

IN-APP WORKOUTS 
View and follow along to fitness on demand workout videos from anywhere! 
Follow along to the different workout plans we have created on the app. 

In app purchases
Purchase products right from the app and pick them up in store.

Bodifi Wellness app uses the Health app that is pre-installed on your iPhone to sync nutrients and workouts data. Because of this, the app will ask you to grant read and write access to your nutrients and workouts data.

apps.title: Wellness Hub Empowered Health
apps.description:
Wellness Hub is your all-in-one destination for movement, recovery, and strength. Our mission is simple: to help you feel your best, move with confidence, and live a healthier, more balanced life. Whether you’re recovering from an injury, building strength, or carving out time for self-care, Wellness Hub connects you to expert services designed around your unique needs.

With the Wellness Hub app, you can:

Book Sessions with Ease — Schedule physical therapy, ANF Therapy®, personal training, Pilates, massage therapy, and more anytime, anywhere, right from your phone.

Discover the Power of Pilates — Strengthen your core, improve flexibility, and enhance posture with private sessions or small group classes that meet you at your level.

Recover and Heal — Work with our licensed physical therapists or explore ANF Therapy®, a unique and non-invasive approach to reducing pain and supporting the body’s natural healing process.

Choose Your Format — Whether you prefer energizing group classes, focused one-on-one sessions, or specialized recovery services, you’ll find a path that fits your lifestyle and goals.

Stay Organized and On Track — Manage your schedule, track memberships, and receive reminders so you never miss a chance to invest in your health.

Empowered Health — From injury recovery and pain relief to strength building, balance, mobility, and overall wellbeing, our team of professionals is here to support you every step of the way.

At Wellness Hub, we believe wellness isn’t just about working out — it’s about creating a sustainable routine that integrates healing, strength, and mindful movement. No matter where you are on your journey, you’ll find expert guidance, accountability, and a supportive community ready to help you succeed.

Experience the difference of a space where everything you need — physical therapy, ANF Therapy®, Pilates, training, and holistic recovery — is in one place. Download the Wellness Hub app today and take your next step toward empowered health.

apps.title: NEOU: Fitness & Exercise App
apps.description:
Discover the NEW YOU — at home and on the go fitness, reimagined. Workout anytime with thousands of on-demand classes, tracking & motivational features and a full digital community to support you on your journey to a healthier you.

CLASS TYPES:
Bootcamp/HIT
Dance
Toning & Sculpting
Yoga
Core
Strength
Stretching & Recovery
Pilates
Barre
Boxing & Kickboxing
Meditation & Breathing
Nutrition
Running
Machine Cardio
Pre/Postnatal
Stream workouts on your iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV. Or, cast to your TV with Airplay or Chromecast. Also available on Roku and Amazon Fire TV. Real-time heart rate with Health App + Apple Watch is also available.
FEATURES:
 
Guided programs & challenges: Designed with a fitness goal in mind, NEOU experts have created curated programs and challenges to help you reach your goals or test your limits. Try favorites like “Project Weight Loss” or “Get Strong.” 

Classes for all levels and preferences: Filter thousands of workouts by difficulty, body focus, duration, equipment, and music to easily find the perfect workout for you.

Track your progress and achievements: Set goals for a number of workouts per week and track your progress within the app. Earn badges for completing a program or challenge, or hitting a workout milestone. 

Personalized recommendations: Answer a few quick questions about your goals and fitness level and you’ll see recommended classes, instructors, and programs for your preferences.

Stay connected with in-app messages: Add instructors and concepts to your favorites to receive alerts for new classes and concepts, recommended workouts, and feedback from instructors. 

Download classes: Take your workouts anywhere! Preload classes to work out offline or reduce data usage.

Ready to Join? Download the app and get unlimited access with a 7-day free trial. Afterward, subscribe to our annual membership and keep sweating with our community of instructors and members. A monthly membership is also available.


TERMS & CONDITIONS

Monthly & Annual subscriptions are available. Select the plan that works best for you!

Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and the subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of Use: https://neoufitness.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://neoufitness.com/privacy-policy

apps.title: ThinkUp-Daily Affirmations app
apps.description:
What stops you from achieving goals or becoming who you want to be?
Build your self-improvement program to develop the motivation and the positive mindset you need to succeed, using positive affirmations in the most effective way.

Our mindset and thoughts enormously impact self-esteem, health, prosperity, and happiness. Positive affirmations and self-talk are simple and proven techniques recommended by therapists, life coaches, and personal development gurus to make our minds work for us.

FIND INSPIRATION
Select affirmations from an expert-approved list or use them as inspiration and create your own.

PERSONALIZE YOUR AFFIRMATIONS
Record in the voice your brain truly trusts and understands, your own.
Add an image that inspires you.

ADD MUSIC
Inspiring music makes your affirmations meditation enjoyable and relaxing.

SET NOTIFICATIONS AND LISTEN DAILY
Develop new, positive thoughts and reduce negative self-talk.

MANIFEST
Manifest your dreams into reality.

300+ AFFIRMATIONS FOR 10+ LIFE GOALS 
Motivation, Self-Esteem, Overcome Depression, Self-Talk to deal with Anxiety, New Career, Relationships, Stress Relief, Achieve Goals, Pray with Joel Osteen, Miracle Morning with Hal Elrod, Mental Toughness, Fitness  Motivation, and affirmations by top personal development experts and coaches. 

TRACK YOUR PRACTICE with HEALTH APP
Connect ThinkUp to the Apple Health app and track the duration of your daily practice through the Mindful Minutes metric. You can also track the number of positive thoughts/affirmations you've listened to during your daily practices. Tracking this metric is important, as it trains your brain to focus on positive thoughts throughout the day when you don't practice actively.

Our mind is the key to a good, happy, and prosperous life. 
A wellness app that speaks to you... Literally.

BEST PRACTICE TIPS
- Select at least 15 affirmations
- While recording your affirmations, mean it!
- Play your affirmations in a loop for 5 minutes, at least once a day before going to sleep. Morning practice is recommended as well for daily motivation 
- Listen to the same set of affirmations for at least 21 days. Repetition makes all the difference!
- Use headphones

FREE VS. PREMIUM
The free version allows you to build a short version of the program; record up to three affirmations and use one default background music. You may change the affirmations any time and record again

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
When you purchase one of the two available premium membership plans, you get unlimited access to all the premium features for a period stated in the plan details. The features are: add and record an unlimited number of affirmations, the per affirmation recording is longer, change background music, set an auto-stop timer, control volume.

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTIONS
1. MONTHLY: $7.99 billed every month
2. ANNUAL: 60% OFF $39.99 billed annually ($3.33/month)
3. FOR-LIFE: $99.99 billed once

These prices are for US customers. Pricing in other countries may vary.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. iTunes Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to ThinkUp.

In-app purchase is NOT shareable with Family Sharing 

TERMS OF USE
https://thinkup.me/terms-of-use

PRIVACY POLICY
https://thinkup.me/privacy-policy/

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
email: info@precisewellness.com

CONNECT WITH US
IG: @thinkupapp 
Web: www.thinkup.me
Think UP!

apps.title: Burnalong
apps.description:
We are your diverse and inclusive online health and wellness solution that supports every person's individual wellness journey.

Join Burnalong to access 17,000+ live and on-demand classes taught by 2,500+ credentialed, local instructors in 50+ wellness categories—including fitness, nutrition, chronic condition management, financial wellness, yoga, mental health, sleep, kids, arthritis support, adaptive workouts, and so much more. We support every age, every fitness level, and every wellness goal with AI-powered recommendations plus thousands of new classes added each month.

What's included: 
- Share wellness with up to four accounts for your friends and family members
- Receive AI-powered recommendations to reach your individual goals
- Sign up for inclusive wellness challenges for extra motivation
- Enroll in wellness programs with curated classes to help you stay on track and progress
- Join Burnalong communities for connection and encouragement
- Schedule group classes with friends, family, and colleagues
- Track wellness habits and progress in your personal dashboard
- Burnalong integrates with the Apple Health app to collect and track step data.

We're here to empower your wellness goals with diverse content, local instructors, inclusive tools, and social motivation. Come join us today!

Terms of Service: http://www.burnalong.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.burnalong.com/privacy-policy/

apps.title: LifeSpeak
apps.description:
Your total wellbeing starts here. 
LifeSpeak Holistic Wellness is your all-in-one solution for mental, physical, and nutritional wellbeing. It’s personalized, convenient, and always available when you need it. Whether you’re looking to reduce stress, stay active, eat better, or get expert guidance, this app empowers you to take control of your wellbeing in a way that works for you. 

One app. Total support. 
Unlike other programs that focus on just one area of wellness, LifeSpeak connects the dots between mental and physical wellbeing. You’ll get access to: 
- On-demand resources by top experts spanning 8 wellness areas, including fitness, nutrition, and mental health 
- Personalized recommendations, powered by AI 
- Motivational support to help you stay on track 
- Community challenges that inspire healthy habits  
- Expert 1-on-1 coaching (available if your organization has opted in) 

Tailored to your needs. 
LifeSpeak uses AI to recommend content based on your goals, interests, and activities. You can follow these personalized suggestions or browse thousands of resources on your own terms. No matter your lifestyle, age, or background, you’ll find something that fits your routine. 

Small steps, lasting impact. 
From quick breathing exercises to full multi-day programs, you choose how you engage. Whether you’re starting small or ready to dive in, LifeSpeak meets you where you are. 

Built on experience, backed by experts. 
With 20+ years of experience supporting wellbeing, LifeSpeak brings together leading professionals and evidence-based resources to help you thrive at home, at work, and everywhere in between. 

Build a healthier, more resilient future with LifeSpeak Holistic Wellness. 

Please Note: LifeSpeak Holistic Wellness is available exclusively through employers, health plans, and other organizations. Accounts are purchased at a corporate level and are not available for individual purchase.  

Interested? Contact your organization to bring LifeSpeak to you!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Zing AI: Home & Gym Workouts
apps.description:
Zing is the ultimate AI Coach, revolutionizing fitness with AI-powered, personalized workouts designed by top health and fitness experts. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced athlete, Zing AI Coach adapts to your needs, offering real-time insights and support for a transformative fitness journey.

Advanced AI Coach

The AI Coach engages proactively, suggesting goals, scheduling workouts, and providing real-time form monitoring and feedback. It checks in daily about your energy levels, mood, and sleep, adjusting your workout plan in real-time to ensure continuous improvement.

Zing Vision

Our advanced Zing Vision technology uses your smartphone's camera to track movements in real-time, providing detailed insights to improve your technique.

AI Body Scan

Zing's AI Body Scan analyzes your body composition using your smartphone's camera. Receive insights into body fat, lean mass, and more, integrated into your fitness plan for a hyper-personalized experience. Photos are promptly deleted for privacy.

Hyper-Personalized Plans

Zing creates customized workout plans based on your unique body data, fitness background, and lifestyle. It dynamically adjusts workout intensity and complexity based on your progress, goals, and activity levels. The Strength Score helps you track and enhance your strength training, setting clear goals through increased workout intensity and repetitions.

Dynamic AI Workout Progression

Zing's AI adjusts your workout intensity and complexity continuously. Centralize all your activity data in Zing for detailed fitness insights. Seamlessly integrate with Apple Watch and Apple Health. Track your daily activity, earn milestones, and share achievements with friends for added encouragement.

World-Class Training

Zing Coach generates intuitive workouts from almost 500 exercises, adapting to your preferences and goals. It tracks muscle fatigue levels, ensuring safe and effective training sessions.

Diverse Workout Types

Zing offers various workout types including strength, HIIT, stretching, and recovery, with Pilates and yoga coming soon. Each type is designed to enhance different aspects of fitness, from muscle development and fat burn to flexibility and mind-body connection.

Fitness and Flexibility Tests

Take the Fitness Test to assess your current fitness level and the Flexibility Test to measure your mobility. Get personalized insights for your plan based on your results, and improve them with targeted exercises.

Community and Support

Join a vibrant community of over a million users. Participate in monthly challenges, invite friends to your Fitness Circle, and connect with others in our Facebook group. Zing Coach fosters a supportive environment that celebrates transformation and progress.

Subscription Plans

We offer a wide range of subscription options so that you can choose the right one for you (3 months access renewal, weekly renewal, etc.). For your convenience, subscriptions are set to Auto-Renew within the 24-hour period prior to the subscription end date. You can cancel your subscription at any moment in your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the terms. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at purchase confirmation. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://www.zing.coach/privacy-policy 
Terms of Use: https://www.zing.coach/terms-of-use 

HealthKit Integration

Zing integrates with HealthKit, allowing you to export exercise data and import fitness data and body measurements seamlessly.

Contact Us

Email: support@zing.coach
Instagram: @zing.coach

Transform your fitness journey with Zing Coach. Download now and start your personalized training experience today!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
In this version of Zing Coach, there are several quality-of-life improvements, design updates and bug fixes that will make your Zing experience even better.
Get the latest version of Zing Coach to take advantage of these updates!
If you have any feedback or questions, let us know at support@zing.coach. Happy training!

apps.title: EMPWR by Wellness
apps.description:
EMPWR helps patients to have better well-being by enabling remote health monitoring by their healthcare providers. It offers:

1. Personalized health monitoring catering to specific health requirements.
