apps.title: LSUHS Institutional Wellness
apps.developer: Louisiana State University Health Sciences Center
apps.description:
Your New Wellness Starts Here!!!

Our Mission is to promote the health and wellness of LSU Health Shreveport through education and efforts that encourage habits of wellness, inspire and empower individuals to take responsibility for their own health and support a sense of community in which health and overall well-being are recognized as an essential element of success.

Emotional, social, workplace, and physical well-being are critical to the development and maintenance of competent, caring students, faculty, and healthcare providers. In the current healthcare environment, students, residents, fellows, faculty members, and staff are at increased risk for burnout and depression. Self-care is an important component that impacts the quality of life and work. It is also a skill that must be cultivated and developed.

Wellness includes the following dimensions:

Physical: The physical dimension recognizes the need for regular physical activity and encourages learning about nutrition while discouraging the use of tobacco, drugs, and excessive alcohol consumption.

Emotional: The ability to find support in times of need, express a wide range of emotions, and deal with daily stressors.

Social: Community building is premised on shared values of respect and dignity, volunteerism, and caring valued as part of the workplace.

Financial: The ability to plan for the future, be prepared for emergencies, and have access to the information and tools necessary to make good financial decisions.

Workplace: The ability to pursue interests, values, and purpose in order to gain meaning, happiness, and enrichment professionally.

apps.title: Fabulous: Daily Habit Tracker
apps.description:
Welcome to the world of Fabulous. Unlock the power of habits and routines. Prioritize your mental health, build healthy habits and improve your life one step at a time. Fabulous started as a habit tracker, but it evolved into a self-improvement, coaching, and mental health platform. Our goal is to make healthy routines an inseparable part of your life. 

How does Fabulous work?
1 - Add structure to your life - Improve your life with a healthy morning routine that provides a system for your everyday life.
2 - Create healthy habits - Use a daily planner to remember important tasks. Your habits sculpt the person you will become — choose them wisely.
3 - Focus on deep work - Learn how to tune out all the noise and concentrate on the task. 
4 - Join a community - Live challenges will introduce you to other Fabulous members worldwide embarking on the same journey as you. Find motivation by connecting with hundreds of members all across the globe. 
5 - Learn how to be grateful - Keep your gratitude journal and listen to positive daily affirmations. 

Fabulous is an all-in-one routine & self-care app for everyday life:
– Listen to the daily coaching series.
– Write your to-do list.
– Journal your thoughts.
– Do short workouts and breathing exercises.
– Listen to daily affirmations and meditation sessions.
– Keep your gratitude journal.
– Monitor your mental wellbeing.
– Use the goal-tracker to monitor progress.
 
Upgrade your planner for exciting additional features that will take the habit tracking to a new level. Achieve your health and productivity goals today with science-proven features:
– Coaching series grouped by topics: anxiety, self-love, productivity, or depression.
– Unlimited habits for your morning and evening routines.
– New Premium Journeys for better mental health, self-care, and fitness.
– Personal one-on-one coaching for better motivation and focus.
 
Top 4 reasons to try the Fabulous app: 
1 - Need the motivation to build an indestructible morning routine?
2 - Have an irregular sleep cycle and want to learn how to get a good sleep?
3 - Want to increase your energy level, so you focus the entire day?
4 - Want to improve your mental health through mindfulness so you can cope with anxiety?

Scientifically proven, morning routines are essential to a successful life. No excuses! Start changing your life today and save money using behavioral science. Install Fabulous to get personalized daily habits and achieve your goals.

Pricing in different countries may vary, and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence. You can always see the exact price in the app. The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. When you feel the Premium plan is not what you need, you can cancel your subscription at any time. 

If you have any questions, visit our website at www.thefabulous.co and click "Contact Us" at the bottom.

 Build and track your habits, set goals, learn how to meditate, and build healthy routines. Your journey to self-improvement and better mental health starts today!

This day will come and go. That much is certain.
Making it count? Well, that's up to you!

-------

Read our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy at: https://www.thefabulous.co/terms.html

apps.title: WellBeing Magazine
apps.description:
WellBeing is Australia’s most respected natural health and lifestyle magazine. With in-depth articles written by experts, each issue offers practical information and inspiration for mind, body and soul. WellBeing covers ways to improve the quality of your life, the lives of those around you and the health of the planet. We exist to inform, entertain and enthuse people who have chosen to take steps towards natural health and natural living.
WellBeing has remained Australia’s most successful natural health magazine for over 20 years and continues to grow as topics such as sustainability, organic produce and natural therapies become more mainstream. WellBeing is an inspiring read for people passionate about natural health and therapies and for those who have just begun to take an interest in the subject. The magazine maintains its credibility by only publishing articles that are comprehensively researched and written by experts in the industry. All articles inspire, educate and enlighten.
With an exciting new look and feel there’s never been a better time to subscribe! 

----------------------------------------------

This is a free app download. Within the app users can purchase the current issue and back issues.

Subscriptions are also available within the application. A subscription will start from the latest regular issue at the time of purchase.

-The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product.
-You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.
-Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased.
-If a subscription offers a free trial, at the end of the trial period, you will be charged the full price of the subscription. You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription settings on your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged.

Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account.

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved.
If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update, please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store

Help and frequently asked questions can be accessed in-app and on pocketmags.

If you have any problems at all please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com

--------------------

You can find our privacy policy here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/privacy.aspx

You can find our terms and conditions here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/terms.aspx

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Improved app and reader stability
We always love to hear from you - please don’t hesitate to contact us at info@pocketmags.com with any feedback or if you require assistance

apps.title: Loóna: Sleep, reduce anxiety
apps.description:
- WHAT IS LOÓNA?
loóna is the first app that lets you quickly disconnect from a long stressful day and get in the right mood for sleep.

- SO, IT'S ANOTHER SLEEP APP, RIGHT?
 Not exactly. loóna isn’t a list of direct go-to-sleep techniques, but rather a mood-altering app that helps you to stay calm during the day and prepares you emotionally for going to sleep in the evening.

- WHY IS BEDTIME MOOD IMPORTANT?
Negative emotions we accumulate during the day are processed and consolidated by our brain during sleep making them more difficult to disassociate from when faced again in the future. Moreover, feeling angry, anxious, down, or, the opposite, excited, and elated, is likely to affect latencies to sleep onset and REM-sleep. People mistake it for the symptoms of a sleep disorder, but in reality, they just may be in the wrong mood for sleep.

- HOW DOES LOÓNA WORK?
From the wake up and during the busy day Loóna will support your emotional states with playlists and immersive stories. Each night you’ll have a recommended escape. An escape is a guided session that combines activity-based relaxation, storytelling, and sounds in a unique way. Complete it to shut the frantic world out, reset your mind, and create the perfect mood for sleep.

Loóna saves your escape sessions to your Apple Health app.

The upgrade to loóna PLUS provides access to the entire collection of escapes. Our subscription options are: 1-month subscription,3-month subscription and  1-year subscription with a 7 day trial, (price may vary by location).

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Terms of service: http://loona.app/terms
Privacy policy: http://loona.app/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Dear Family,

In this update, our tech mages added a few pinches of stabilisation magic to ensure seamless Loóna performance across all screens and devices.

Happy dreaming!

Team Loóna and corgi

apps.title: My Well-Being Index
apps.description: Invented by Mayo Clinic, the Well-Being Index is a 100% anonymous tool that evaluates multiple dimensions of distress in 9 questions. This app allows physicians, residents, fellows, medical students, nurses, nurse practitioners, physicians assistants, and other healthcare professionals to accurately assess well-being. It also provides resources, allows users to track wellness over-time and compare their well-being to peers, and establishes a more accurate scale of wellness across the industry.

apps.title: Go burble: Hypnosis & Wellness
apps.description:
Go burble: Your Modern Path to Wellness

Go burble is your personalized wellness companion that uses hypnosis and evidence-based techniques to help you overcome challenges, elevate your mindset, and achieve lasting transformation. Whether you're seeking deeper sleep, less stress, or focused self improvement, Go burble meets you where you are.



WHY GO BURBLE?
Harness the science of hypnosis to:
    Reduce anxiety and release stress
    Sleep deeper and wake more refreshed
    Boost motivation and eliminate procrastination
    Improve focus and increase productivity
    Support your journey through weight loss, smoking cessation, or emotional healing

Every session blends hypnosis, meditation, and mental coaching to help you rewire subconscious patterns. Each experience is fully personalized, ensuring your mind-body connection evolves in a way that’s right for you.


EXPLORE GO BURBLE'S KEY FEATURES
Create a burble
Choose your intention, tone, and pace to generate a custom hypnosis experience—tailored in real time. Access 14 categories and 100+ treatments across themes like sleep, anxiety, motivation, and more.


Sound Escapes
Immerse yourself in curated soundscapes designed to promote relaxation, focus, or sleep, using tonal therapy and rhythmic sound design.


Daily Activities
Stay grounded and inspired with daily mindfulness exercises, motivational challenges, insight cards, and a quote of the day—keeping your mindset aligned.


Thrive
Get support from a personal mindset and mentor coach. Thrive offers structured programs for meaningful growth, helping you overcome challenges and reach your goals.



REAL TOOLS. REAL RESULTS.
Go burble is more than relaxation—it's transformation. Whether you're navigating persistent anxiety, managing burnout, or reframing limiting beliefs, our integrative approach provides sustainable support for your self improvement journey.



SUBSCRIPTION PRICING
Go burble offers a freemium plan so you can explore select features for free. 


Upgrade to access our full experience:
$14.99/month or $69.99/year


Unlock all premium content: Create a burble, Daily Activities, Sound Escapes, and full access to Thrive - your mindset mentor and coach


Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the billing period. You can manage your subscription anytime in your App Store account settings.


Go burble. Go Relax. Go Change.

apps.title: I am - Daily Affirmations
apps.description:
How many negative thoughts have been endlessly repeating in your mind? Daily affirmations help rewire our brains, build self-esteem, and change negative thought patterns. Empower yourself by verbally affirming your dreams and ambitions. Choose from many daily intentions and set reminders to be delivered throughout the day.

Positive affirmations help make major shifts in your mindset, and they also serve as prompts and daily reminders about what you’re truly capable of, ensuring every day is an amazing day

An affirmation is a simple but powerful statement that helps to strengthen the connection between your conscious and unconscious mind. The more you strengthen this connection, the more resilient you’ll be when you experience difficult or challenging circumstances.

As Buddha wisely said: you become what you believe. And the best way to strengthen your resilience is to practice affirmations every single day.


There are many benefits to using affirmations as part of your daily morning routine:


- They help increase your awareness of your thoughts and words, making it easier to recognize the negative and self-doubting thought patterns holding you back.
- Affirmations define your focus. When you focus your energy on the things you want, like achieving your goals, the positive, uplifting, and good, you’re creating an abundance mindset and strengthening your resolve to make it happen.
- They open you up to possibility. Too often we get stuck in the ‘impossible’ mindset, but affirmations flip this on its head. When you begin to positively affirm what is actually possible, a whole world of opportunity opens up to you.

To get access to the I am Premium content and functionality, you can choose between a lifetime, monthly, and yearly auto-renewable subscription. This is a recurring transaction that will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged at the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.


Find tons of inspiring content on our blog: https://blog.theiam.app/

Privacy Policy: https://monkeytaps.net/privacy
Terms of Use: https://monkeytaps.net/terms

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- New themes and tons of new affirmations!
- Other fixes and improvements

Find tons of inspiring content on our blog: https://blog.theiam.app/

Love the app? Tell us in the reviews section! We read all of them. Have a happy day!

apps.title: BYOU Wellbeing
apps.description:
Improve your well-being with BYOU, your go-to app for on-demand wellness and beauty services tailored to your lifestyle needs, 
whenever you need it most!

BYOU offers a holistic approach to self-care, supporting your mental health, physical wellness, and beauty needs, 
all from the comfort of your own space.

On-Demand Services
Choose from a carefully curated selection of wellness and beauty professionals. With BYOU, certified therapists provide mental health support, 
while skilled practitioners bring rejuvenating beauty services directly to you. Connect with professionals dedicated to enhancing your well-being.

Mindfulness and Mental Health
Prioritize your mental wellness with features designed to build resilience. 
The BYOU app provides guided meditations, stress-relief exercises, and access to licensed therapists, empowering you to nurture a strong mind wherever you are.

Personalized Beauty Services
Indulge in on-demand beauty care. Whether you’re in need of a relaxing massage, a refreshing facial, or a beauty consultation, 
BYOU connects you with professionals who bring a spa-like experience to your doorstep.

User-Friendly Interface
Navigate BYOU seamlessly with an intuitive design that makes scheduling, browsing services, and connecting with experts a breeze. 
Start your wellness journey with just a few taps.

Reviews and Ratings
Make informed decisions with verified user reviews and ratings. 
Hear from others about their experiences with our professionals, ensuring you receive quality services every time.

Secure and Confidential
Your privacy matters. Our secure platform ensures your interactions with wellness providers remain confidential, 
providing a safe space to focus on your well-being.

Discover a new era of self-care with BYOU. 
Download today and start your journey toward a healthier, happier you!

Follow BYOU on Social Media for Wellness Tips and Updates:

Instagram: @byou_app
Website: www.byou-app.com
We’d Love to Hear From You!

Share your thoughts, feedback, or new ideas with us, and help us grow together.

apps.title: SINES | Tuned to Wellness
apps.description:
OUR MUSIC + SOUNDS are created by our founder and a tight-knit collective of music producers and artists with decades of experience in the science, metaphysics, tunings + resonances of music aligned with mental health, wellness, and performance optimization. We work with the finest analog and acoustic instruments we’ve collected from our world travels along with resonances and nature sounds we’ve recorded from special sites and sanctuaries around the world.

OUR TEACHERS + GUIDES are certified and trained in all aspects of their expertise for trauma, wellness, healing, and support. Many of our teachers hold doctorates in general medicine, metaphysics, chiropractic, psychology, psychiatry, and therapy. Anyone lending their voice in guidance for others have all personally experienced the events they teach in their own lives.


WHY SINES?
- The most extensive + highest quality collection of sonic wellness specifically tuned to moodstates.
- Meditation, sleep, energy, joy, focus, confidence, balance, motivation, learning, memory, positivity, creativity, fitness, yoga + more.
- Guided meditations, affirmations, stories + courses for personal growth, work, wellbeing + much more.  
- We are for everyone—women, men, children, LGBTQIA+, animals, plants… all beings are supported here!
- Extensive collection of binaural frequencies + isochronic tones


SUBSCRIPTIONS
- Individual
- Locations
- Teams
- Practitioners
- Patients, Clients + Guests


Please visit our website for more details.

apps.title: Anyo for wellness
apps.description:
Anyo: Your All-in-One Wellness App - Reimagined!

Anyo is now your one-stop spot for holistic wellness, focusing on therapy, nutrition, and overall well-being.

From instant therapist access to expert guidance on sleep, stress, nutrition, emotions and more, Anyo fosters a culture of self-care and growth.

Introducing a Fresh Look & Feel: We've enhanced Anyo's interface for a more intuitive and engaging user experience.

Expert Care, Evolved: Our team of specialists has grown to include Lifestyle Coaching, Therapy, Stress Management, Anxiety Relief, Sleep Improvement, Meditation Techniques, Self-Care Practices, Yoga Instruction, Personalized Diets, Affirmations, and a safe space for Venting.

Talk to Experts: Seamlessly book therapy sessions with qualified therapists and experts. Book a discovery call at extremely pocket-friendly prices and enjoy significant savings on booking session packages.
Build a Habit: Join our daily LIVE expert sessions to stay motivated. From morning meditation to parenting tips, nutrition bites, daily affirmations, and journaling, these short, engaging sessions can help you build healthy habits. 
Vent & Be Heard: Release bottled-up emotions with our caring Anyo Listeners who offer a compassionate and judgment-free listening ear.
Community Support: Anyo Circles is now your personalized wellness newsfeed. Ask any question to our wellness experts here. Contribute positively to the wellness feed and earn a prestigious "Top Voice" badge.
Resource Library: Explore over 100 high-quality audio and videos for self-help curated by our in-house psychologists and experts. Build mental resilience with yoga nidra, meditation, art therapy, storytelling, and more.

Anyo for Companies (EAP): Are you a HR leader? Anyo is equipped to be your comprehensive employee wellbeing partner, with effective engagement interventions suited to your work culture. You can book a demo via vamshi.vasudevan@anyo.app to learn exclusive benefits for your organization.
Your Privacy is Our Priority:
Data Security: Enjoy complete peace of mind knowing your information is protected with robust security measures.
Stay Anonymous: Choose a unique username and share freely without compromising your privacy.
Follow us on:
https://www.instagram.com/anyoapp/
https://www.linkedin.com/company/anyo-app/

apps.title: Noom Vibe: Steps with Friends
apps.description:
Make daily movement FUN with Noom Vibe, a free step counter and healthy habit tracker! Track your steps, earn rewards, and build healthy habits with friends and a supportive community.

Whether you're walking solo or competing with friends, Noom Vibe makes it fun to reach your goals and live better longer.


HOW IT WORKS

Bank Your Steps: 
Turn walking into a game! Earn in-app currency, called Vibes, for every step you take. Hit your step goals, complete daily streaks, and unlock exciting bonuses. Exchange Vibes for rewards or donate them to support meaningful causes.

Move With Friends:
Cheer each other on, reach goals together, and earn more rewards as a team. 

Build Healthy Habits: 
Track daily habits like stretching, meditating, and drinking water. Get rewarded for staying consistent.

Work Out & Recharge: 
Access 1,000+ on-demand workout and meditation videos, from strength training to yoga and mindfulness. Earn rewards for every minute you move.

Join Our Community:
Tune into live podcasts with Noom coaches, health experts, and inspiring voices. Earn Vibes as you listen, and get the support you need on your journey towards a healthier, happier life. 


WHY NOOM VIBE?

At Noom, our mission is to unlock 100 million additional healthy years for people like you over the next decade. Noom Vibe makes it fun, social, and rewarding to transform into the healthiest you — one step, healthy habit, and connection at a time.

Download Noom Vibe for free today and make every step a celebration!

apps.title: Spree: Social Health Shopping
apps.description:
The Spree social wellness platform is your bridge to a healthier, happier you. Spree empowers you to navigate the complexities of health and wellness through fun and engaging shows that help you make informed choices about your wellness and set goals. We're here to inspire, educate, and support you every step of the way. Elevate your life, connect with the community, and access cutting-edge education and products across Longevity, Sleep, Nutrition, Sexual Wellness, Beauty, Brain Health, Energy, Fitness, and more! Inspire Wellness Action with Spree's curated content and products. Discover a world of health and personal growth. Be part of a positive community making a big change in social wellness!

Discover:
Immerse yourself in a world of possibilities as you discover the latest trends and insights in wellness. From mindfulness techniques to the secrets of longevity, Spree is your go-to source for transformative knowledge.

Watch:
Engage in captivating shows that inspire, educate, and entertain you to embrace a vibrant and healthy lifestyle. Our carefully curated content covers a spectrum of topics, ensuring that every moment spent on Spree is a step toward personal growth.

Engage:
Join forces with a like-minded community of wellness enthusiasts, all on a collective journey toward better living. Share your experiences, exchange advice, and support each other in your pursuit of holistic health.

Shop:
Unleash the power of choice with Spree's thoughtfully curated selection of cutting-edge products across Longevity, Sleep, Nutrition, Sexual Wellness, Beauty, Brain Health, Energy, Fitness, and more. From sleep aids that redefine restfulness to cutting-edge wearable devices, and nutrition essentials that nourish both body and soul, Spree's marketplace is your gateway to wellness, innovation, education, and community.

Connect:
Forge connections that matter in an environment dedicated to your well-being. Engage with expert creators, thought leaders, and fellow users who are passionate about making positive changes.

Inspire Wellness Action:
Spree is a catalyst for wellness action. Explore our curated content and products that empower you to take control of your health journey.
Elevate your life today with Spree – where curiosity meets community, and where each interaction is a step toward a healthier, happier tomorrow. Join the movement that's transforming social wellness, one mindful choice at a time.

apps.title: Create Healthy Wellness Center

As part of the Hill Country Memorial system with close proximity to doctors and therapists, our services run deep and go well beyond the ordinary fitness centers packages.  We have a variety of group fitness classes including cycling, indoor rowing, yoga, Pilates, TRX, Boot Camps, Step aerobics, flexibility/stretching, HIIT training, water aerobics, arthritis therapy, and lap swimming. Our team of professionals are focused on helping you thrive at every step of your wellness journey.

Onward by NeuroFlow is a digital health app for tracking, assessing, and managing your mental wellness. We provide a fun and easy-to-use tool that guides and supports your journey towards improved, more holistic wellbeing. To learn more, visit www.neuroflow.com.

Use Onward to:
Complete evidence-based mindfulness, relaxation, and self-care activities

Contact crisis resources easily

apps.title: Beyond Body
apps.description:
We released a completely new, more stable app version for your wellness journey. Please report any bugs that you find. 

Now you can seamlessly sync your book with the app, ensuring consistency across your meals. Update now to enjoy personalized meal plans, workout tracking, recipes, and more. Achieve your goals with ease and stay motivated on your path to wellness. 


Beyond Body is a personalized, customizable wellness plan designed to help you reach your healthy weight and wellness goals in the easiest, safest way possible.

A Beyond Body meal plan includes +1000 delicious, easy-to-make recipes that are created from the ingredients you love. Beyond Body is not a restrictive diet. Instead of making you feel deprived, it offers a full variety of nutritious food that will keep you full and satisfied while maintaining healthy weight loss.

By teaching you healthy eating habits, Beyond Body aims to provide you with sustainable, long-term results. We don’t want you to feel miserable. We want to give you a diet you’ll willingly stick to in the long run!

What’s really exceptional about Beyond Body, is that it changes simultaneously with your body. When you start losing weight, your body’s needs adjust – with that in mind, we’ll also adjust your meal plan to ensure your body gets all the macronutrients and calories it needs.

Additionally, to accelerate your metabolism and boost your results, you’ll be able to add a personalized workout plan that offers simple, yet very effective exercise routines. These routines won’t require additional equipment, so you can easily complete them at the comfort of your home.

We believe that every person deserves to live the best life possible. Therefore, we made sure that you would actually enjoy this diet without feeling too restricted or forced to eat the foods you don’t like.

We work to ensure your successful transition into a healthier lifestyle and guide you along the way with 24/7 support.

Try it out today and get ready for positive, life-changing results!

Our app also integrates with HealthKit to track your steps data and calories burned.

Disclaimer: check with a doctor before making medical decisions.

Terms and Conditions: https://beyondbody.me/general-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://beyondbody.me/privacy-policy

apps.title: Home Massage & Wellness - RLAX
apps.description:
RLAX is your ultimate on-demand wellness solution, offering professional health and relaxation services at your convenience in Thailand. Whether you need a rejuvenating treatment or a beauty service, our skilled providers bring high-quality care directly to you — at home, in your hotel, or even at the office.

Join Thailand’s most trusted on-demand wellness platform, with 40,000+ satisfied customers.

OUR PROVIDERS
Every RLAX professional is fully certified, undergoes a background check, and completes a rigorous onboarding process to ensure a 5-star wellness experience.

HOW IT WORKS

1. Choose Your Service – Select your preferred service and time through our app.
2. Confirm Your Booking – Receive instant confirmation and get ready to relax.
3. Enjoy Professional Care – A certified RLAX provider arrives fully equipped for your session.


SERVICE AREAS
Enjoy RLAX services in Bangkok, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Hua Hin, and Chonburi – available 365 days a year, even on holidays!

SERVICES
RLAX offers a range of wellness services to suit your needs.


Massages & Spa Packages

* Aromatherapy Oil Massage
* Traditional Thai Massage
* Head, Back, Shoulder & Foot Massage
* Office Syndrome Relief
* Body Scrub & Nourishing Facial…and more!



Nails

* Foot Scrub & Pedicure
* Gel Manicure & Pedicure
* Essential Mani-Pedi (No Polish)
* French Tip Gel Manicure…and more!


Whether you're looking for relaxation, muscle relief, or beauty, RLAX has the perfect option for you.

KEY FEATURES

* Book in as little as 90 minutes or schedule up to 14 days in advance
* One app, multiple wellness services
* Preferred massage provider feature for a personalized experience
* Provider rating system for quality assurance


____________

SAFETY & SECURITY
Your well-being is our top priority. We conduct thorough background checks and routine performance evaluations for all RLAX providers. Any concerns or low ratings trigger an internal review to maintain the highest standards of service.

CONTACT US
We’d love to hear about your RLAX experience! If you have any questions or feedback, reach out to us at hello@rlax.me – we’re here to help.

apps.title: Rally®
apps.description:
**Please note: The Rally® app is available only to eligible Rally members. Check with your benefits manager to see if Rally is available to you.**

The Rally app for iPhone lets you take your health on the go in one convenient mobile experience. Depending upon your employer benefits, you can:

Register and Take the Health Survey - Get personalized recommendations based on your overall health

Join Missions and Challenges - Build healthy habits with simple activities and friendly competitions you can do every day

Get Rewarded  - Earn rewards for taking healthy actions which can be redeemed for a variety of rewards

Sync with Devices - Use your phone or other devices such as Strava, Garmin, or FitBit to track your activity

Access Health Plan Benefits - View your digital medical ID card as well as plan details in a single location allowing you to better understand and take advantage of your benefits

Discover Programs - Join programs available through your employer to help improve your health

Search for Care - Locate hospitals, specialists, or treatment facilities, and see if they’re in or out of network

Compare Costs - Save money with the ability to make cost-effective decisions

The Rally app puts your health in your hands.

Help us make the app experience even better. Share your feedback at rallymobilesupport@RallyHealth.com

Note: In order to best meet your health goals, our app integrates with the Health app to collect activity data.

Disclaimer: Please make sure to always seek the advice of a doctor in addition to using this app before making any medical decisions.

apps.title: inpowr: Self-management
apps.description:
Discover the latest version of inpowr, a platform focused on well-being self-management, accessible through your employer. Simple, fast, and enjoyable to use, inpowr empowers you to identify your well-being needs and take action accordingly.

To use inpowr, ensure that your employer offers our service in their health and wellness program. If not, please discuss it with your human resources department!

How inpowr can assist you:

Measure your well-being and identify areas for improvement through self-management
Choose actions to enhance your well-being
Explore health and wellness options offered by your employer based on your self-assessment
Access a comprehensive list of resources through our integrated search tool
Accomplish small daily actions to boost your well-being
Track the effectiveness of your actions and maintain full control over your progress
Reassess your well-being every 7 to 21 days and observe changes
Become aware of improvements and maintain your daily balance

With inpowr, you have all the self-management tools necessary to assess, act, and enhance your personal and professional well-being. Take charge of your well-being by downloading inpowr today!

Furthermore, anonymized data on well-being trends are accessible to everyone through a dashboard for your entire organization. This allows you to view well-being variations over time, compare your well-being with other groups within your organization, and gather information on the number of planned actions in each area of life.


TERMS OF USE AND LICENSE

inpowr is free to download and available in both French and English. Access to inpowr is provided by your employer as part of their health and wellness program. To use inpowr, please contact your employer to obtain a license and additional information regarding access.

Visit us: www.inpowr.com
Technical support: support@inpowr.com
Like us: www.facebook.com/inpowr

apps.title: Welltory: Heart Rate Monitor
apps.description:
Finally Understand What's Going On With Your Body

Trusted by 12 million users who want to reconnect with their bodies and feel better, featured by the App Store in Apps We Love, and collaborating with 25+ universities worldwide — including Harvard Medical School, Arizona State University, and Johns Hopkins — to advance health science.

— Your heart knows everything about you. Welltory helps you listen and understand —

Sometimes your body feels like it’s speaking a foreign language. Welltory translates those signals into science-backed insights — whether you’re facing hormonal changes, heart health concerns, fatigue, burnout, or just want to optimize energy and mood.

We analyze heart rate variability (HRV) — a proven heart health marker backed by 20,000+ studies — to show what your heart and nervous system reveal about your wellness.

— Your Complete Health Story, One App —

You don’t have to piece together insights from 5 health apps. When you finally have a moment for yourself, everything you need is right there. 

Connect 1,000+ devices and apps — Apple Watch, Oura, meditation apps, lab test results, and more — to create your personal health diary. 

— Stop Guessing. Start Understanding —

Sleep That Actually Restores You

Struggling with insomnia or waking up exhausted? Our Sleep Analysis goes beyond counting hours. Discover what disrupts your rest and get insights to improve recovery. With Echo — a science-based library of calming content tailored to your heartbeat — you’ll fall asleep faster and wake up truly restored.

Heart Health & Blood Pressure Simplified 

Your heart reveals what’s really happening in your body. Welltory helps you track blood pressure, hypertension, and other metrics — plus log symptoms in your personal health diary. Share reports with your doctor, or use Welltory as a tracker helping you navigate health, menopause, and aging with confidence.

Can Apple Watch measure blood pressure? No, but Welltory helps you understand your numbers if you sync a monitor or add data manually.

Stress That Makes Sense

Turn your Apple Watch into a stress monitor and catch stress before it takes over. No more wondering “why am I so stressed?” — now you’ll know, and know how to respond. See how work, sleep, workouts, and even Zoom meetings affect your stress levels, and recognize when it’s time to pause and restore balance.

Activity Boost Without Pressure

Track the 60% of activity most fitness apps ignore — we count every effort: walking the dog, house chores, running for the bus, and more. Every activity grows your Mountain in the app — the taller it gets, the more you’ve moved. We also set a Longevity goal that matches where your body is today and gently guides you toward progress, not perfection.

Start listening to your body — and feel the difference with Welltory.

PRICING & TERMS

App is free to download and use. You can upgrade to Welltory Premium with an auto-renewing subscription.

–– Subscription renews automatically unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the period.
–– Renewal is charged within 24 hours before the current period ends, the cost will be identified. 
–– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off in the user's Account Settings after purchase.
–– Free trial portions (if offered) are forfeited after purchase.
–– Please note that the Family Sharing feature is not applicable for our app.
— Welltory integrates with Apple Health.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Everything that happens to you — work, rest, movement, even a random conversation — affects your stress and energy. Our new reports help you understand these connections and see how your day truly shapes how you feel.

— Battery Timeline. Watch your energy flow throughout the day. See when it drops, when it grows, and how your choices — rest, sleep, or movement — change the curve. Learn what really charges you and what drains you, one glance at a time.

— Stress Timeline. See when your body is balanced and when it’s overloaded. Over time, you’ll start noticing clear patterns: some tasks wear you out, while others help you unwind. Knowing this, you can plan your day around what truly works for you — so tough moments become easier to handle.

— Stress-Coping Curve. See how stress builds up through the day and how effectively you deal with it. This chart shows when tension starts rising — and when your actions help your body release it. It also brings an important insight: recovery isn’t accidental — it’s the result of specific actions. Knowing when to rest or move helps keep tension from becoming chronic and lets your energy return on time.

Stay tuned & rate us if you enjoy using Welltory.
raw_data.description:
Finally Understand What's Going On With Your Body

Trusted by 12 million users who want to reconnect with their bodies and feel better, featured by the App Store in Apps We Love, and collaborating with 25+ universities worldwide — including Harvard Medical School, Arizona State University, and Johns Hopkins — to advance health science.

— Your heart knows everything about you. Welltory helps you listen and understand —

Sometimes your body feels like it’s speaking a foreign language. Welltory translates those signals into science-backed insights — whether you’re facing hormonal changes, heart health concerns, fatigue, burnout, or just want to optimize energy and mood.

We analyze heart rate variability (HRV) — a proven heart health marker backed by 20,000+ studies — to show what your heart and nervous system reveal about your wellness.

— Your Complete Health Story, One App —

You don’t have to piece together insights from 5 health apps. When you finally have a moment for yourself, everything you need is right there. 

Connect 1,000+ devices and apps — Apple Watch, Oura, meditation apps, lab test results, and more — to create your personal health diary. 

— Stop Guessing. Start Understanding —

Sleep That Actually Restores You

Struggling with insomnia or waking up exhausted? Our Sleep Analysis goes beyond counting hours. Discover what disrupts your rest and get insights to improve recovery. With Echo — a science-based library of calming content tailored to your heartbeat — you’ll fall asleep faster and wake up truly restored.

Heart Health & Blood Pressure Simplified 

Your heart reveals what’s really happening in your body. Welltory helps you track blood pressure, hypertension, and other metrics — plus log symptoms in your personal health diary. Share reports with your doctor, or use Welltory as a tracker helping you navigate health, menopause, and aging with confidence.

Can Apple Watch measure blood pressure? No, but Welltory helps you understand your numbers if you sync a monitor or add data manually.

Stress That Makes Sense

Turn your Apple Watch into a stress monitor and catch stress before it takes over. No more wondering “why am I so stressed?” — now you’ll know, and know how to respond. See how work, sleep, workouts, and even Zoom meetings affect your stress levels, and recognize when it’s time to pause and restore balance.

Activity Boost Without Pressure

Track the 60% of activity most fitness apps ignore — we count every effort: walking the dog, house chores, running for the bus, and more. Every activity grows your Mountain in the app — the taller it gets, the more you’ve moved. We also set a Longevity goal that matches where your body is today and gently guides you toward progress, not perfection.

Start listening to your body — and feel the difference with Welltory.

Clients can only use the app if they are working with a Wellness Community coach. If you are a Wellness Community client, please contact your coach to receive your invite and login credentials to be able to use this app.

The Wellness Community app allows access to HealthKit, allowing clients to automatically pull in their activity and steps data from Apple Health to their app.

apps.title: eMoods Wellness Tracker
apps.description:
eMoods Wellness Tracker is a simple tool that can help track your daily outlook, overall well-being, and routines and habits. With in-app graphs and exportable charts, this free app makes it simple to take control of your wellness and develop healthy habits to support you when times are tough and even when they're not.

YOUR PRIVACY MATTERS! eMoods never stores ANY of your data in the cloud or connects to any APIs. No data ever leaves your phone without your explicit action.

Managing your wellness just became easier and more effective! eMoods Wellness is a private and easy to use mood and habit tracker for graphing, reporting, and managing your personal well-being. Start tracking, recognize your triggers and stressors, and take control of your mood and overall health!

eMoods is a free mood and habit tracker app that lets you easily chart your daily outlook, productivity and motivation, depression and anxiety, sleep, nutrition, exercise, medications, substance use, news and social media exposure, and other factors that may affect your daily overall wellness.

View in-app graphs at any time to help you identify helpful habits and develop a routine to support your well-being. Export a printable PDF report at the end of each month to assess or email to your therapist, caregiver, family member, or friend.

eMoods Wellness includes a dark color theme and a colorblind-friendly color scheme.
Most features are free- the Pro version is strictly optional, and directly helps us continue to develop this app.

~~~ OPTIONAL PRO VERSION  ~~~

An in-app upgrade is available that allows you to track custom symptoms and store multiple timestamped notes per day.  Your data is still completely available in the app and via export if your upgrade expires.  Upgrades are auto-renewing subscriptions for one month ($0.99) or one year($5.99) terms.  They can be canceled at any time.

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

The app's terms of use can be found here:  https://emoodtracker.com/emoods-classic-reporting-app-terms-of-use/
The app's privacy policy can be found here:
https://emoodtracker.com/emoods-classic-reporting-app-privacy-policy/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Fixes a graph display issue
- Adds option to delete timestamped notes
- Adds Dark Mode to lock screen
- Fixes Dropbox integration
- Optionally secure exported PDFs with a password
- Minor security and privacy improvements

Previous version:
Log your overall health and self-care to help develop supportive habits for your wellness, mood, and outlook.

apps.title: Zonia
apps.description:
Empower Yourself with the Ultimate Wellness Resource: Zonia

Do you want to take charge of your well-being and achieve optimal health and vitality? Zonia is here to help. Our platform is the ultimate wellness resource, providing expert interviews, docuseries, and short video content on a wide range of topics related to integrative health, functional medicine, and holistic healing. 

At Zonia, we believe that true wellness is about more than just physical health - it's about nourishing your mind, body, and spirit. That's why we offer a comprehensive approach to wellness that encompasses everything from functional healing protocols, to healthy cooking demonstrations to guided meditation and movement. Our shows and health bites  are designed to be informative, engaging, and most importantly - short and easy to digest.

Whether you're interested in healthy recipes, yoga, HIIT workouts, hypnotherapy or natural healing protocols, we've got something for you. Our engaging, short videos are packed with practical tips, actionable advice, and inspiring stories from 150+ certified doctors and health experts who have transformed their health using natural therapeutic methods.

In addition, we offer a collection of award-winning short films (live action, animation and documentaries) from around the world that are sure to lift your spirit! Among them are several Oscar winners, and all of them are audience favorites.

With Zonia, you don't have to navigate the confusing and often overwhelming world of medicine alone. Our platform is your trusted partner, providing you with guidance and daily tips to keep the doctor away. 

Join the Zonia community and discover the power of natural wellness today!

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Zonia on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://zonia.vhx.tv/tos
Privacy Policy: https://zonia.vhx.tv/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
* Bug fixes
* Performance improvements

apps.title: Theta Wellness
apps.description:
Theta Wellness: Your AI-Powered Wellness Companion

Theta Wellness is created for digital health pioneers who are ready to take control of their well-being. Seamlessly integrating with your smart devices and tracking apps, Theta Wellness brings all your scattered health data together into ONE HIPAA-compliant, Intelligent, AI-driven platform.

Theta Wellness isn't just an app - it's your personalized wellness partner, built to help you create lasting habits for a healthier, stronger life. Whether you're looking to sleep better, stay fit, or improve your diet, Theta Wellness transforms small, daily actions into meaningful, long-term progress.

Powered by state-of-the-art large language models, Theta Wellness doesn't just track - it learns and adapts. The more you use it, the smarter it gets, delivering personalized insights and actionable guidance tailored to your unique lifestyle and health goals.

Start investing in your health with Theta Wellness - because every small step today builds a better tomorrow.

Important Disclaimer
While Theta Wellness provides advanced AI-driven insights and recommendations, it is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with a licensed healthcare provider for any medical concerns or decisions.

Terms of Use: https://theta.thetahealth.ai/protocol-tos.html

apps.title: Mindleap: Psychedelic Wellness
apps.description:
Mindleap is a virtual health and inner wellness platform that supports your unique self-care and healing journey. On Mindleap you can work with experienced mental health specialists, access a large library of meditations, sound journeys, and educational content on psychedelics and mental health, and monitor how you’re doing through a private health journal. 

Mindleap is also the first inner wellness platform to provide support for psychedelic integration and pre-experience support for anyone who chooses to work with psychedelic medicines and treatments.

On Mindleap, you can improve your inner wellness through a variety of unique paths:

Inner wellness specialists

Our experienced inner wellness coaches are here to support you with understanding and improving different parts of your mental health, including the sometimes challenging processes involved in healing and self-care.

Psychedelic integration specialists

Our integration coaches are here to help you in the period surrounding a therapeutic psychedelic experience. Whether you are working with plant medicines or holotropic breathing, our integration coaches can support you. Integration support can take many forms, including helping you to set intentions and mentally prepare yourself before an experience, and working with you to unpack, process, and integrate your experience afterwards.

NOTE: Mindleap and our integration coaches do not provide guidance or support for illegal activities and cannot provide advice on questions around dosing or taking psychedelic medicines.

Interviews with experts on inner wellness and psychedelic treatments

Through our inner wellness media library, you’ll find our Conversations - these are discussions with mastery-level thinkers who have a deep understanding of mental health and inner wellness. These conversations can help you to learn about inner wellness, and many focus on unpacking psychedelic research and psychedelic integration.

Meditations

Mindleap features a variety of curated meditations - including for specific topics like reducing anxiety, falling asleep, relaxing your body, and breathing deeply. 

Sound Journeys

Our selection of sound journeys is designed to help you create the mood and energy you desire in your healing environment. From nature soundscapes, to ambient meditation music, to upbeat and loving mixes, we offer a wide variety of sounds to help make you feel at home.

Educational programs

Educational programs on Mindleap help you to understand and improve specific aspects of your inner wellness. Some of our programs include The Science Of Happiness, Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, and 10-Step Addiction Advantage.

Private Health Journal

The private journal is where you can log and monitor your activities, habits, and how you’re feeling, and also take notes about what’s on your mind and what you’ve been up to. 

If you choose to work with a specialist on Mindleap, you’ll also have the option to temporarily and securely share your data with your specialist. This can help your specialist to get a better understanding of how you’ve been doing over time.

Wellness Community

On the community feed, you can get to know and learn from the professionals on Mindleap through video and image posts. Beyond deepening your understanding of inner wellness, this also helps you to get to know specialists before you decide to work with them to get support over video call.

You deserve to heal and be at peace. We’re here to support you.
Download Mindleap today and get started on a unique inner wellness journey today.

Read our terms of use: https://mindleap.com/legal/termsofuse/

apps.title: EQWELL
apps.description:
What are the Benefits of EQwell? 

Customized to each individual, EQwell unlocks your organization’s employee wellbeing and productivity. By engaging employees across all wellness domains, EQwell helps them become the best version of themselves. Through personalized solutions and engagement, individualized coaching, and group participation, EQwell helps you increase overall productivity  and the long-term wellbeing of both your business and your people.
 
Who Benefits from EQWELL?  
EQwell benefits both the organization and the individuals. The companies and institutions who want the best for and from their employees can help the individuals achieve that goal, while helping the organization itself.

How does EQwell deliver these Benefits?
EQwell delivers wellness services as they should be - providing a truly personal approach across the six domains of wellbeing, including mental, emotional and physical well-being. Participants select content and actions tailored to their goals, with personalized coaching and group participation and recognition that increases their ownership and participation, helping participants increase their mental focus on their wellbeing journey.

 

What does EQwell provide?
For the organization:
•	Clear path to positive Return on Investment
•	Increased morale, attraction and retention 
•	Increased productivity
•	Third Part Benefits Integration 
•	Aggerated & de-identified metrics and reports
 
For the workforce:
•	Personalized Goal Setting
•	Personalized Well-Being Programs
•	Live Accountability Coaching
•	Integrated Wearable Tech Interface 
•	Community Building
•	HIPAA Compliant 

Individual user data is never shared. We understand the importance of keeping personal information confidential and take this responsibility very seriously. Our policies and practices are designed to protect the privacy and security of user data. If you have any concerns or questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
 
Why wait? raw_data.description:
What are the Benefits of EQwell? 

Customized to each individual, EQwell unlocks your organization’s employee wellbeing and productivity. By engaging employees across all wellness domains, EQwell helps them become the best version of themselves. Through personalized solutions and engagement, individualized coaching, and group participation, EQwell helps you increase overall productivity  and the long-term wellbeing of both your business and your people.
 
Who Benefits from EQWELL?  
EQwell benefits both the organization and the individuals. The companies and institutions who want the best for and from their employees can help the individuals achieve that goal, while helping the organization itself.

How does EQwell deliver these Benefits?
EQwell delivers wellness services as they should be - providing a truly personal approach across the six domains of wellbeing, including mental, emotional and physical well-being. Participants select content and actions tailored to their goals, with personalized coaching and group participation and recognition that increases their ownership and participation, helping participants increase their mental focus on their wellbeing journey.

 

What does EQwell provide?
For the organization:
•	Clear path to positive Return on Investment
•	Increased morale, attraction and retention 
•	Increased productivity
•	Third Part Benefits Integration 
•	Aggerated & de-identified metrics and reports
 
For the workforce:
•	Personalized Goal Setting
•	Personalized Well-Being Programs
•	Live Accountability Coaching
•	Integrated Wearable Tech Interface 
•	Community Building
•	HIPAA Compliant 

Individual user data is never shared. We understand the importance of keeping personal information confidential and take this responsibility very seriously. Our policies and practices are designed to protect the privacy and security of user data. If you have any concerns or questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
 
Why wait? Increase your organization’s wellbeing by providing the most personalized and holistic wellness program available – because it’s the right thing for your employees – and increase your organization's productivity at the same time – because it’s the right thing for your organization. Make the most and get the most from your workforce today.

apps.title: eufy Life
apps.description:
The EufyLife app is dedicated to improving your health. We’ve blended technology and convenience into an easy-to-use app that automatically syncs your health data.
  
HOW THE APP WORKS
A EufyLife account is needed to use this app. You only need to provide an email address and registration takes two steps and only a minute to complete.

To get started, download EufyLife to your mobile device and register your email address to create an account. 

HOW TO PAIR DEVICES
Eufy products are designed to be user friendly. Pairing devices is as simple as enabling Wi-Fi and/or Bluetooth on your mobile device, turning on the Eufy product, and following the on-screen instructions to complete pairing. That's it!
 
HealthKit
The EufyLife App will synchronize the records after each weighing (Body Fat Percentage, Body Mass Index, Height, Lean Body Mass, Weight) to Apple Health.

Since the privacy of your health data is very important, EufyLife has an entry point where you can choose to sync your data to Apple Health. No data will be synced to a third party until you choose it.

Eufy’s BodySense line of health and wellness-focused products are currently available for use with EufyLife: Smart Scale. 

CONNECT WITH US
• Email: support@eufylife.com
• Website: eufylife.com
• Facebook: @EufyOfficial
